story:
AT-A-GLANCE

We need your help to begin manufacturing spexGrip and launch our company Izzi Mo:

-spexGrip is patented

-Five prototypes have been made on a 3D printer

-A manufacturer has been selected

-Local retailers have agreed to sell spexGrip

-$3,600 will pay for the product mold and our first product order of 5,000 pieces

-Physical product and sales will allow us the budget to increase marketing and order more product in different colors

We need your help so please CONTRIBUTE and SHARE!



WHY AM I HERE?

A few years ago I was driving on Interstate 75 here in SW Florida. It was dusk and I needed to change from my sunglasses to my regular eyeglasses. My eyeglasses were held in a holder that I clipped to my sun visor.

I’m sure that you have one or more of these holders in your car. They are sold all over the place for around $4. They clip onto your visor and hold your sunglasses or eyeglasses.

I reached up and clicked the button on the visor holder to release my glasses. After I clicked the button my glasses fell right out of the holder towards the steering wheel. My reflex reaction was to grab for the glasses so they wouldn't break. As I reached for the glasses my SUV swerved towards the guard rail at 75 mph. I nearly went off the road but managed to correct the steering and avoid a horrible accident... all because of an eyeglass holder.

For the next several weeks I couldn't stop thinking about how I could have been killed just reaching for my eyeglasses. I decided that there has to be a better, safer way to store them. So I started playing with some ideas and worked on some sketches and designed spexGrip.

SPEX WHAT?

Have YOU ever misplaced or left the house without your glasses? Ever have your sunglasses fall from YOUR visor holder or FLY OFF your console or dash? Or like me almost DRIVE OFF THE ROAD to grab your glasses?

Well NEVER AGAIN with spexGrip.

spexGrip's unique patented design holds eyeglasses, sunglasses or reading glasses in your car or ANY ROOM IN YOUR HOME OR OFFICE. Eyewear can be stored and removed easily with one hand. Whether they are wire rim, big designer sunglasses or any size in between spexGrip will keep your eyewear in the SAME PLACE every time and SAFE from dropping and getting scratched or broken.


WHO ARE YOU?

My name is Joe DiCioccio. My wife Diane and I live in southwest Florida. We are retired but both work to supplement our social security. Diane is a cashier in a local supermarket and I work as a chauffeur.

Before we moved to Florida I was a sales and marketing consultant for the IT industry in New York City for over thirty five years. Diane was the Payroll Administrator for one of the Colleges in the State University of New York.


HOW FAR ALONG ARE YOU WITH SPEXGRIP?

We have secured a patent for our design.

For prototypes we had several plastic cubes made on a 3-D printer based on our unique design. Suction cups that we purchased and modified were glued to the cubes. These prototypes were used to determine the best dimensions for spexGrip. The dimensions we came up with allow spexGrip to accommodate a wide range of eyewear from wire rim to large designer sunglasses while taking up a minimum amount of space.

We have researched dozens of different materials. We needed a soft material to guarantee the suction would hold and the eyewear would not be scratched or damaged. We also want to be environmentally friendly and avoid any potentially toxic chemicals. spexGrip will be injection molded as one piece using a ‘soft feel’ plastic.


Our prototypes with 'soft feel' were tested in the hottest temperatures (Florida car interiors in the summer), coldest temps (cars in New York last winter), in the shower for humidity and in the Fridge as well as the freezer. The prototypes didn’t crack, chip or melt and maintained suction. They held up beautifully!

A manufacturer has been selected and has given us formal price quotes for tooling, production and shipping. One of my first jobs was in the plastics industry so I’m familiar with this process and the materials. I was involved in developing the patented process for manufacturing the plastic foam seals that are still used today in the caps of plastic bottles.

The mechanical drawings for the spexGrip mold are complete and approved by the manufacturer.

WHAT DOES SPEXGRIP NEED FROM US?

What we don't have are the funds to manufacture our first spexGrip. This is where we NEED YOUR HELP.

Help us reach our funding goal of $3,600 so that we can pay for the mold and our first spexGrips. Any and all funding that we receive will be used for bringing spexGrip to the market.

Once we receive our spexGrips from the manufacturer we will sell the product locally. We already have a commitment from several vendors here in SW Florida. We will keep some of the spexGrips so that I can use them to begin marketing and selling to distributors and retailers. As I mentioned I have over thirty-five years of experience in sales…

Our goal is to have spexGrip sold as an ‘impulse’ item near the checkout counters for dozens of retailers. Our ‘Target’ – pardon the pun – is any  home products, auto products, convenience store, gas station, supermarket, pharmacy or Big Box store. Even Hallmark would be an excellent outlet for us.

If you can’t help fund our campaign then please help us SPREAD THE WORD to others about spexGrip. Use Indiegogo share tools, like us on Facebook, tell you friends and family about us.

WHAT'S IN IT FOR US CONTRIBUTORS?

If you’re someone that likes cool stuff and likes being an innovator then by funding spexGrip you’ll have as a perk a product that is UNIQUE. You’ll be the FIRST to have one.

When spexGrip begins replacing all those cheap, ‘needs two hands’, dangerous sunglass holders you can say ‘I had it FIRST.’

You’re ‘ahead of your time’. You my friend are an INNOVATOR, a GENIUS, a TRENDSETTER!

But seriously and most importantly you can help us with our DREAM! As you'll read below we have ideas and designs for several other products. Our dream is to bring these products to the market through our own company. With your help we can begin to build this company and make our dream a reality.

IT'S NOT A SEXY PRODUCT, IS THERE A MARKET?

OK spexGrip is not a sexy product – in fact the NAME is sexier than what it does - but it solves a problem and it’s inexpensive.

There are approximately 250 Million registered vehicles in the U.S. That’s MILLION! Even a tiny piece of that market is a win. Here’s why… each person that buys a spexGrip for their car will probably go back and buy one for their kitchen, bath, bedroom and office. You’ll even be able to store eyewear on your coffee table, kitchen counter or nightstand with our design for a spexGrip stand - a follow up product.

They will make great gifts…

Get some for your PARENTS or GRANDPARENTS! Ask them how many times they misplace their ‘READERS.’ With spexGrip they can keep their glasses in the same place all the time and SAFE FROM SCRATCHES OR BREAKING.

Get some for your friends - they would be GREAT GIFTS - to keep their sunglasses HANDY AND SAFE in the car.

WE CAN GET ANY COLOR AS LONG AS IT'S BLACK?

Well for our first order we’re going with basic black. But as we reorder we can go with FRUITY COLORS like...

GRAPE

GREEN APPLE

STRAWBERRY

or even a ‘camo’ look – like you know those Duck guys!

In fact if you have color or design ideas we’d love to hear about them. Check out our perk for colors!

We’re also designing spexGrips with BLING for all those ‘REAL HOUSEWIVES’ - precious looking stones on the two sides or your initial on the front.


NO MORE FRIDGE MAGNETS?

We’re even talking to a promotional product company about using spexGrip as company giveaways… your COMPANY NAME AND LOGO PRINTED ON THE FRONT of an eyewear holder... what company wouldn't LOVE THAT!!!

Imagine INSURANCE AND REAL ESTATE BROKERS having the opportunity to have their name in front of you while you’re driving or in your kitchen… better than those dumb calendars or fridge magnets or pens that they give away.

Just imagine how many of these we can sell!

SO WHY ARE YOU DOING THIS AT YOUR AGE?

Well there are several reasons.

First of all this one small idea began to take on a life of it's own. 

I started playing with this idea for a sunglasses holder as something that I could use for my own car. Soon I realized that others, like YOU, could use it in your car to keep your 'EYES ON THE ROAD YOUR HANDS UPON THE WHEEL.'  - Thank you, 'The DOORS.' Yeah... sorry couldn't resist that one.

Next we realized that IF IT WORKS IN THE CAR THEN WHY NOT IN THE HOUSE! Soon we had our prototypes in each of our two cars and in every room of the house. 

We gave the prototypes to friends around the country for testing... they didn't want to send them back! A few of them even had their prototype 'BORROWED' by their spouse.

So we have designed a product that solves a common problem, 'Where's my glasses?' It's EASY TO USE and INEXPENSIVE … I like that. 

The idea of seeing this product for sale ANYWHERE would be a real kick for me.

Being retired the EXTRA INCOME would also really help. I don’t want to be an 85 year old chauffeur – that’s of course assuming that anyone wants an 85 year old chauffeur.

BUT THE MOST IMPORTANT REASON FOR ME…

On September 11, 2001 I was scheduled to meet an associate in the North Tower of the World Trade Center. My meeting was cancelled the evening before. Neither one of us went to the World Trade Center that day. If not for that last minute change in plans I could have been a victim of that terrible tragedy on 9/11. I am still thankful every day that my life and that of my associate was spared.

In 1992 I had a heart attack. Then I dealt with prostate cancer in 2011. In 2014 I was diagnosed and treated for bladder cancer. Today I have clear arteries and I am cancer free. And I am VERY THANKFUL EVERYDAY!

Most of my life has been lived on the premise that you are what you think about most. The death of a great talent, Robin Williams, confirms this yet again for me although tragically… ‘Your thoughts are not who you are. Your thoughts are who you become.’

I have been blessed with an incredible, beautiful wife for over 45 years, two wonderful and talented sons and two years ago an amazing Grandson. So for my health today and my incredible family I am truly blessed and extremely thankful.

From this very simple idea to just solve a problem for storing sunglasses in my car we now have a notebook FULL OF IDEAS for products that solve other common problems. 

So now at 68 I want to start a company that makes cool gadgets and gizmos. I’m not sure why or how it happened but over the past few years I’ve been getting all these neat ideas for gadgets. Maybe the radiation treatments for my cancer sparked some creative brain cells…

So NOW that one small idea is growing into a COMPANY! A company that designs and brings to market simple, inexpensive gadgets and gizmos that solve a problem while bringing a smile to your face.

The company will be called IZZI MO...


All the blessings in my life prove for me that no matter what comes your way in life YOU AND ONLY YOU decide how it will affect you.

Maybe, WITH YOUR HELP, this one small idea and this dream, can grow into something real.

Maybe, WITH YOUR HELP, we can inspire others to NEVER GIVE UP ON THEIR DREAMS!

Thank you for taking the time to learn about us and spexGrip. We hope that you will decide to help us.

Thank you,

Joe DiCioccio

story:
The VIITA Active is designed for those who live an active lifestyle comprised of working out and keeping physically fit. VIITA Active comes with a TFT LCD color touchscreen, built-in GPS, and two additional fitness features: My Challenge & My Sets. 

 

 

The VIITA Casual is a hybrid smartwatch with a classic dial combined with a digital black and white display, designed for those who want to keep track of their health, but also want a functional, everyday watch.

 

 

Combining the best of both worlds, the VIITA Watch offers the finest watchmaking craftsmanship paired with technology of the future. Acting as a personal coach on your wrist, VIITA offers a variety of features that fit anyone's lifestyle. From avid runners to traveling businessmen, VIITA has something for you. 

 

 

The VIITA Active and Casual tell you how exhausted or recovered your body is, keeping your body safe and as healthy as possible. 

 


The body’s regeneration depends on the state of strain or recovery your body is in. We know life can get crazy, causing you to experience various situations of strain such as work, stress, exercise, sleep deprivation and poor diet. To ensure those strains don’t cause harm to your body, it is important to take appropriate measures such as sufficient sleep, rest days, stress reducing exercises, a healthy diet, etc. Those strains and recoveries are measured by the regeneration status. 

 

Heart Rate Variability is determined by the changes in your heart rate levels throughout your daily life.

 

 

Studies suggest that high heart rate variability indicates good health and high fitness levels. On the other hand, low heart rate variability indicates burnout or a stressful lifestyle. By combining the information about your heart, your movements and sleep we are not only able to calculate your stress level and regeneration status but are able to wake you up at the perfect time or provide you with the optimal training recommendation.

 


Continuously be aware of how you react to activities, breaks, stress, and sleep in real time.

 

VIITA's intelligent, self-learning algorithm calculates your stress level and regeneration status based on your heart rate, heart rate variability, 3D acceleration data, height, weight, sleep quality, training intensity, training volume, age and gender. Due to the high complexity of our algorithm and the uniqueness of each’s body, the VIITA SCAN provides health screenings in real time. 

 

After one hour of use, the VIITA Scan calibrates 10%-30%, after one day 30%-60%, after a week 60%-80% and after 2 weeks 80%-99%. VIITA SCAN continues to learn how your body works to give specific feedback to you. The more you wear it, the better it reads you and your vital signs. 

 

Wake up feeling refreshed, thanks to VIITA waking you within a 30 minute window during your lightest period of sleep.

 


VIITA Wake analyzes your personal sleep patterns, based off your heartrate, heart variability, and your movements while asleep. 

 

Stay hydrated at all times by tracking the amount of water you consume throughout the day.


Do you know how much water you need a day? It’s a known fact that water is crucial to maintaining a healthy body. To keep you perfectly hydrated, VIITA calculates the amount of water you should consume every day based on an in-house developed algorithm that considers your heart rate, heart rate variability, 3D acceleration data, height, weight, sleep quality, training intensity, training volume, age, and gender.
 

Challenge yourself to meet your fitness and overall health goals.


 

With state of the art technology and a 20 Hz heart rate sensor, VIITA offers you a wide variety of unique and specific health and fitness recommendations. 


VIITA Coach provides intelligent and personalized training recommendations that are tailored to the needs of your body.

 

VIITA Coach will tell you whether cardio or interval training, heavy or light weights are what you need depending on the stress levels your body experiences throughout the day. 

For example, if you’ve had a stressful day, VIITA will assess your heart rate, steps, and hours of sleep to recommend a walk rather than a run. On days when you’re rested and physically prepared, VIITA Coach will push you to tackle a high-intensity interval workout your body is ready for. 

 

Target your problem areas with My Mission and transform your body.

 


Set your fitness and body goals on the VIITA smartphone app and My Mission will adapt its training recommendation automatically! Want to lose weight? Select the weight loss option and your VIITA will recommend training intensities targeting your fat burn zone.

 

My Challenge allows you to set your fitness goals (distance, time, speed) and track in real time if you are ahead or behind your target thanks to the built-in GPS sensor in the VIITA Active.

 

 

Choose the VIITA Active and you get to experience My Challenge!  VIITA Active’s built-in GPS tracks and visualizes the distance you have covered on your screen. The VIITA GPS sensor also supports Glonass, Galile, and Beidou. With an update-rate of up to 10 Hz and a localization accuracy of up to 20cm, you can leave the house for a run without your phone!

 

Only featured on the VIITA Active, My Sets lets you determine the perfect timing between your resting periods and sets, to optimize your muscle growth.


Your VIITA signals through subtle vibrations when to exercise or to take a break. Exercise times and training times can be individually adjusted in the VIITA App.

 

For activity tracking, VIITA comes with 19 different activities to choose from.



The trackable activities will continue to grow as the platform continues to mature and refine. Our activity tracking comes with: running, cycling, walking, hiking, mountain climbing, rowing, skiing, cross-country skiing, cross-country skating, inline skating, nordic walking, mountain biking, treadmill running, cross trainer, rowing ergometer, nordic walking on treadmill, cycling ergometer, stepper, and racing. 
 


With a top of the line power management and software system, VIITA offers a variety of ways to stay in touch while you take care of your health. 



Through the VIITA App you can decide when and about what you want to be notified. Receive personal calls, WhatsApp, text messages, and more. Don't want to receive notifications? No problem. Simply choose the silent mode to switch off. With VIITA’s Silent Mode you can quickly and easily turn off all your notifications. 


Access all features, fitness and sleep results in easy to read charts, settings, and notifications straight from our VIITA App to your VIITA Watch.


VIITA is built with a power management system that outlasts any other smartwatch on the market. 


With customized 530mAh and 385mAh lithium-ion batteries, the VIITA Active stays charged for up to 3 weeks and VIITA Casual stays charged for up to one month. Our team has made sure that no space is wasted in the VIITA Watch. With code written as efficiently as possible and all non-essential processes turned off, we are able to optimize the settings for components such as vibrating times and strength, screen activity, or data compression to allow more space for battery power. 

 


  
 


 

 

 

In early 2016 Alex suffered a severe sports injury. Trying to speed up his recovery process, he extensively researched therapy that could aid in his recovery and he discovered the Vital Monitor. Thanks to the positive effects on his body, Alex was convinced of the Vital Monitor's capabilities and decided to reach out to the inventor, Martin.

While his invention was already an amazing product on its own, Alexander saw the opportunity to kill two birds with one stone by creating a well designed Smartwatch with the Vital Monitor technology. His dream of developing a beautiful smartwatch and giving more people access to Martin’s ground-breaking technology became a reality.

The biggest challenge was to adapt the algorithm to the smartwatch’s sensors. After months of testing and coding, Martin finally came up with a solution and the foundation of a new generation of health tracking devices was created, the VIITA Watch.

 

 

 

 


 

Alexander basically grew up in the watch industry. His passions are high quality products and selling them to the right customer.

As the technical brain behind VIITA Watches Martin leads the product development, engineering and manufacturing of the VIITA Watch. 

With a management consultant background, Michael focuses on the big picture, ensures that targets are met and the budget not exceeded.  

Patrick translates our ideas into code. With more than 8 years experience in mobile computing, he oversees VIITA’s software development.

With an industrial engineering background and an affinity for the latest digital tech gadgets, Max ensures efficient operations and is the perfect link between the development and marketing team.  

Ümit has more than 10 years experience in embedded technologies in different industries and oversees the development of the VIITA Watch

With his experience from training managers to coaching professional athletes, Bernhard takes a leading role in developing VIITA’s algorithms.  

Klemens has more than 8 years experience in online and social media marketing and is in charge of VIITA’s online presence.  

With her love for digital marketing, Viktoria explores innovative promotion techniques and takes a leading role in our social media team.  

Having gained a profound knowledge in the consumer goods industry, Christina knows how fast things change and evolve. She will create marketing strategies to ensure VIITA is at its best.
story_txt:
The VIITA Active is designed for those who live an active lifestyle comprised of working out and keeping physically fit. VIITA Active comes with a TFT LCD color touchscreen, built-in GPS, and two additional fitness features: My Challenge & My Sets.   The VIITA Casual is a hybrid smartwatch with a classic dial combined with a digital black and white display, designed for those who want to keep track of their health, but also want a functional, everyday watch.  Combining the best of both worlds, the VIITA Watch offers the finest watchmaking craftsmanship paired with technology of the future. Acting as a personal coach on your wrist, VIITA offers a variety of features that fit anyone's lifestyle. From avid runners to traveling businessmen, VIITA has something for you.   The VIITA Active and Casual tell you how exhausted or recovered your body is, keeping your body safe and as healthy as possible.  The body’s regeneration depends on the state of strain or recovery your body is in. We know life can get crazy, causing you to experience various situations of strain such as work, stress, exercise, sleep deprivation and poor diet. To ensure those strains don’t cause harm to your body, it is important to take appropriate measures such as sufficient sleep, rest days, stress reducing exercises, a healthy diet, etc. Those strains and recoveries are measured by the regeneration status.  Heart Rate Variability is determined by the changes in your heart rate levels throughout your daily life.  Studies suggest that high heart rate variability indicates good health and high fitness levels. On the other hand, low heart rate variability indicates burnout or a stressful lifestyle. By combining the information about your heart, your movements and sleep we are not only able to calculate your stress level and regeneration status but are able to wake you up at the perfect time or provide you with the optimal training recommendation. Continuously be aware of how you react to activities, breaks, stress, and sleep in real time. VIITA's intelligent, self-learning algorithm calculates your stress level and regeneration status based on your heart rate, heart rate variability, 3D acceleration data, height, weight, sleep quality, training intensity, training volume, age and gender. Due to the high complexity of our algorithm and the uniqueness of each’s body, the VIITA SCAN provides health screenings in real time.  After one hour of use, the VIITA Scan calibrates 10%-30%, after one day 30%-60%, after a week 60%-80% and after 2 weeks 80%-99%. VIITA SCAN continues to learn how your body works to give specific feedback to you. The more you wear it, the better it reads you and your vital signs.  Wake up feeling refreshed, thanks to VIITA waking you within a 30 minute window during your lightest period of sleep. VIITA Wake analyzes your personal sleep patterns, based off your heartrate, heart variability, and your movements while asleep.  Stay hydrated at all times by tracking the amount of water you consume throughout the day.Do you know how much water you need a day? It’s a known fact that water is crucial to maintaining a healthy body. To keep you perfectly hydrated, VIITA calculates the amount of water you should consume every day based on an in-house developed algorithm that considers your heart rate, heart rate variability, 3D acceleration data, height, weight, sleep quality, training intensity, training volume, age, and gender. Challenge yourself to meet your fitness and overall health goals. With state of the art technology and a 20 Hz heart rate sensor, VIITA offers you a wide variety of unique and specific health and fitness recommendations. VIITA Coach provides intelligent and personalized training recommendations that are tailored to the needs of your body. VIITA Coach will tell you whether cardio or interval training, heavy or light weights are what you need depending on the stress levels your body experiences throughout the day. For example, if you’ve had a stressful day, VIITA will assess your heart rate, steps, and hours of sleep to recommend a walk rather than a run. On days when you’re rested and physically prepared, VIITA Coach will push you to tackle a high-intensity interval workout your body is ready for.  Target your problem areas with My Mission and transform your body. Set your fitness and body goals on the VIITA smartphone app and My Mission will adapt its training recommendation automatically! Want to lose weight? Select the weight loss option and your VIITA will recommend training intensities targeting your fat burn zone. My Challenge allows you to set your fitness goals (distance, time, speed) and track in real time if you are ahead or behind your target thanks to the built-in GPS sensor in the VIITA Active.  Choose the VIITA Active and you get to experience My Challenge!  VIITA Active’s built-in GPS tracks and visualizes the distance you have covered on your screen. The VIITA GPS sensor also supports Glonass, Galile, and Beidou. With an update-rate of up to 10 Hz and a localization accuracy of up to 20cm, you can leave the house for a run without your phone! Only featured on the VIITA Active, My Sets lets you determine the perfect timing between your resting periods and sets, to optimize your muscle growth.Your VIITA signals through subtle vibrations when to exercise or to take a break. Exercise times and training times can be individually adjusted in the VIITA App. For activity tracking, VIITA comes with 19 different activities to choose from.The trackable activities will continue to grow as the platform continues to mature and refine. Our activity tracking comes with: running, cycling, walking, hiking, mountain climbing, rowing, skiing, cross-country skiing, cross-country skating, inline skating, nordic walking, mountain biking, treadmill running, cross trainer, rowing ergometer, nordic walking on treadmill, cycling ergometer, stepper, and racing.  With a top of the line power management and software system, VIITA offers a variety of ways to stay in touch while you take care of your health. Through the VIITA App you can decide when and about what you want to be notified. Receive personal calls, WhatsApp, text messages, and more. Don't want to receive notifications? No problem. Simply choose the silent mode to switch off. With VIITA’s Silent Mode you can quickly and easily turn off all your notifications. Access all features, fitness and sleep results in easy to read charts, settings, and notifications straight from our VIITA App to your VIITA Watch.VIITA is built with a power management system that outlasts any other smartwatch on the market. With customized 530mAh and 385mAh lithium-ion batteries, the VIITA Active stays charged for up to 3 weeks and VIITA Casual stays charged for up to one month. Our team has made sure that no space is wasted in the VIITA Watch. With code written as efficiently as possible and all non-essential processes turned off, we are able to optimize the settings for components such as vibrating times and strength, screen activity, or data compression to allow more space for battery power.     
 
  In early 2016 Alex suffered a severe sports injury. Trying to speed up his recovery process, he extensively researched therapy that could aid in his recovery and he discovered the Vital Monitor. Thanks to the positive effects on his body, Alex was convinced of the Vital Monitor's capabilities and decided to reach out to the inventor, Martin.While his invention was already an amazing product on its own, Alexander saw the opportunity to kill two birds with one stone by creating a well designed Smartwatch with the Vital Monitor technology. His dream of developing a beautiful smartwatch and giving more people access to Martin’s ground-breaking technology became a reality.The biggest challenge was to adapt the algorithm to the smartwatch’s sensors. After months of testing and coding, Martin finally came up with a solution and the foundation of a new generation of health tracking devices was created, the VIITA Watch.     Alexander basically grew up in the watch industry. His passions are high quality products and selling them to the right customer.As the technical brain behind VIITA Watches Martin leads the product development, engineering and manufacturing of the VIITA Watch. With a management consultant background, Michael focuses on the big picture, ensures that targets are met and the budget not exceeded.  Patrick translates our ideas into code. With more than 8 years experience in mobile computing, he oversees VIITA’s software development.With an industrial engineering background and an affinity for the latest digital tech gadgets, Max ensures efficient operations and is the perfect link between the development and marketing team.  Ümit has more than 10 years experience in embedded technologies in different industries and oversees the development of the VIITA WatchWith his experience from training managers to coaching professional athletes, Bernhard takes a leading role in developing VIITA’s algorithms.  Klemens has more than 8 years experience in online and social media marketing and is in charge of VIITA’s online presence.  With her love for digital marketing, Viktoria explores innovative promotion techniques and takes a leading role in our social media team.  Having gained a profound knowledge in the consumer goods industry, Christina knows how fast things change and evolve. She will create marketing strategies to ensure VIITA is at its best.

story:
The desire to simplify this bag-switching process is what gave birth to Kristin Ashford Bags! Four sizes of pouches that can organize all the contents of your bag -- pencil case, small pouch, medium pouch (make up) and large pouch. Use one for cables and computer accessories, another for keys and pens, and another for make-up.

I wanted the style to be basic, but not boring. I also wanted them to feel great, have a bit of zing, and be made in the USA with the highest quality materials. I’ve been fascinated with neoprene and excited about the possibilities it holds for fashion so I decided to make one side leather and the other side neoprene. The neoprene is dyed to match the leather, and the bags are finished off with my signature cobalt blue zipper. For a touch of pizzazz, inside I use a patterned outdoor fabric, which can be wiped clean. I started with four classic colors – black, red, camel, and grey.

 

Color Swatches


 

 

These bags, not only look and feel amazing, but they are functional. I carry a lot around especially when I am working, and my pouches keep everything within easy reach. I don’t have to dig around for days to find pens, keys, lipstick, or that dose of Advil. It also makes changing bags so simple. No more dumping the entire contents of my bag out to see what I need take. I just pop the pouches in the bag I want to wear and off I go!

When I sat down and thought about the values I wanted to build my company on, four qualities came to mind:

  • style
  • quality
  • function
  • community

I am proud to bring you bags that are built on those values.

Outdoor Furniture Lining For Easy Cleaning

 

The pouch sizes:

  • Small 4.5" x 6"
  • Pencil Case 3" x 8.5"
  • Make-up (medium) 6.5" x 8.5"
  • Large 8" x 10.5"

Risks and challenges

I've already experienced a few opportunities for learning thus far. I changed manufacturers due to quality and reliability issues which turned out to be a blessing in disguise because I now have a manufacturer who provides better quality and stellar dependability.

There are always challenges when it comes to relying on multiple vendors and manufacturers for the completion of your product, but I've learned that clear communication and follow through helps to avoid many of the problems that can arise.

I'm committed to working honestly, diligently, and intelligently to produce the best possible product I can.

Your donation will get you a Kristin Ashford pouch before it goes to market and will allow me to complete the samples in all colors, manufacture additional sizes (like an eyeglass case, wallet), design a tote, attend a trade show, and roll out a PR plan.

I am trying to raise $ 17,000 with $4000 allocated to finishing the samples in all colors and making the tote. The rest of the money would be divided evenly between public relations and a trade show.

story:
Would you like to be a part of the First SOCIALLY CONSCIOUS and ECOLOGICALLY SUSTAINABLE LUXURY fashion company? 

Sound impossible? Not any more…

Welcome to GALLOTTI!


One week left ...BUY NOW

YOUR COUPON !!


Want to know more about us? Here are the facts:


-Gallotti is an ITALIAN HIGH FASHION COMPANY  based in Florence, the Cradle of Art

- Our clothes are completely Hand Made or Hand finished and always 100% MADE in ITALY

- Everything we make can be Tailored and Personalized (Big and Tall INCLUDED)

- We have 50 years of Experience in the fashion industry

- Everything we produce is of the highest quality and represents Excellent Value for Money

- AND we are SOCIALLY CONSCIOUS and ECO Friendly (Strong Commitment to CSR) Learn More.


  NO LUXURY BRAND MARK UP!


                               SHARE US!!!!!


 First Month Exclusivity on Tailored and Customized goods JUST for IndieGoGo users!



Gallotti Taylor and Sustainable Project

 


Gallotti Luxury: https://www.gallotti.luxury/


What’s more, you could be the right candidate to fill our publishing content position, read on to find out more…

              


  We offer Espresso & Dolce Vita





Product Descriptions

  The 59$ Espresso & Dolce Vita perks are limited to just 50 per jacket.

Buy NOW to make sure you obtain this extra low price.


 

  ESPRESSO

Description: Goose down blazer with leather lambskin trimmings. Horn buttons and a zip out, goose down, vest. A very light jacket.
Direct down injection for increased quality and lightness (total weight 900 gr)

-  45g nylon, lightweight and soft

-  145g down injected directly

Water Resistant.

Colors:

  • Green Blue

  • Blue Midnight

Unlock BLACK . Help us to reach 50 K. Buy your 59$perk on Indiegogo and pay just €225 on the Gallotti website - a saving of $470 compared to our e-commerce website!

The Gallotti Game could make you a further saving of 49$ plus a free engraved Tag Monogram.

Typical Luxury Brand price 1200-1500$

360 view






DOLCE VITA


Description: Fitted Nylon Coat with diagonal double zipper. Goose down.
Beautiful leather details (Belt, Trimming). 

Total weight 800 g

-  151 g nylon, lightweight and soft.

-  140g down injected directly
Suitable for cold weather, all the day long, and in all occasions.
Water Resistant.

Colors:

  • Marine Changing to Black 

  • Black

Unlock Ferrari Red. Help us to reach 50 K.

Buy your 59$ perk on Indiegogo and pay just €225 on the Gallotti website - a saving of $470 compared to our e-commerce website!

The Gallotti Game could make you a further saving of 49$ plus a free engraved Tag Monogram.

Typical Luxury Brand price 1200-1500$

360 view




The Gallotti Story

Gallotti is a luxury fashion brand that pursues superior value for clients looking for something unique, distinctive and Genuinely Made in Italy.
Our gorgeous collections of beautifully made outerwear can be tailored and personalized to meet your exact requirements.

At Gallotti we want to enhance our customers’ shopping experience by offering a unique, exciting concept that goes much deeper than a simple purchase.

Gallotti was founded in 1965 by two brothers, Francesco and Orlando, on their return from a long stay in South America. Driven by their experience and talent in tailoring, and full of initiative, they quickly got to grips with establishing their own business in the leather industry in the outskirts of Florence, a city well known through the centuries for producing the finest and most beautiful leather.

With determination, intuition, a constant search for style and an innate ability to hand-craft, the two brothers enabled a distinctive company to flourish. The enterprise soon entered the international market under the brand name”GALLOTTI” which immediately became synonymous with “quality and elegance”.

Nowadays, truly brilliant craftsmanship, a result of centuries of practice, is disappearing; big brands get the lion’s share and trample upon the values of this ancient tradition.

However, Gallotti, one of the few companies left in the Florence market, continues to grow, thanks to its dedication to Made In Italy, craftsmanship, passion, history and quality. Gallotti proves that traditional values and art are still appreciated around the world. We hope that you share these values and will help us to reach our goal.   Learn More

Who we are!

Arash Gholamzadeh Nasrabadi

Andrea Paci


STRETCH GOALS

We need your support to launch properly our e-commerce, to spread the word about our company and, in particular, to give life to our sustainable fashion project.

We’ve set a number of goals:





And if we receive even more... we will be beside ourselves with excitement and give away lots of prizes whilst doing lots to help the planet.

Don't forget that by getting involved you will be supporting an Eco-friendly, socially conscious company working hard to make things better for people and the planet.


What you get and what we expect!

If you participate you’ll have access to amazing perks and discounted prices.

We’d love you to take part in the Gallotti Game or the Facebook Contest "I Love Gallotti", tell your friends all about us and leave feedback and comments on our website after you make a purchase.

There will be a prize for the winners of both competitions,plus participants in the Gallotti Game who reach the required contribution levels (see below for more details) will have the chance to unlock a discount and a free engraved monogram.

What are you waiting for? Get on board!

Please remember that by purchasing our product you’re enabling us to be sustainable and spread the importance of shopping green. We’re certain that you’ll enjoy shopping with us and we can’t wait to introduce you to our amazing service.


GALLOTTI’s COMMITMENT to CSR


    


At GALLOTTI we believe in and are highly committed to Corporate Social Responsibility, working to be a part of the Green Economy Revolution.
We ensure that our products are safe and respect the strictest environmental legislation, avoiding all materials that could be harmful to the consumer or the environment.

At Gallotti we’ve chosen to carry out “LEAN PRODUCTION”. That means producing to order, no mass production. When you order an item of Gallotti clothing, we produce that item just for you. This minimizes waste and the impact on the environment.
We are committed to drastically reducing our CO2 emissions to help the planet.

We also have a keen social conscience and use our business to help people less fortunate than ourselves who want to change their situation through our collaboration with KIVA .

We are involved in 2 Projects:


Gallotti & Treedom


Gallotti collaborates with “Treedom”, an organization that supports our efforts to improve the environment.
Our website already has “Zero-CO2 Impact” status and with YOUR help we will strive to rapidly make our Company completely “Zero- CO2 impact”.

For every purchase we will donate a tree to CANCEL OUT the CO2 produced by shipments.

From the second year onwards, the tree will continue to create oxygen for the world and will start to provide fruits for the people of the poorer countries where the trees will be planted.



Gallotti & Kiva

Kiva is a not-for-profit platform whose main aim is to alleviate poverty by connecting people through social lending.

GALLOTTI supports Kiva’s initiative to assist poor entrepreneurs to build up their business and guarantee them a minimum salary to help them escape the grip of poverty.

For every purchase over 500 € GALLOTTI will make a donation to Kiva.

Customers can discover who their purchase is helping and what the person would like to do with the money by logging on to the Kiva website using the Gallotti profile.

                                     

 

JOIN THE GALLOTTI GAME: THE MORE YOU SUPPORT US, THE LESS YOU PAY


The GALLOTTI GAME enables you to support our company and its ideals, whilst giving you the chance to win an ESPRESSO or DOLCEVITA.

When you and the network that you attract with your unique Indiegogo refferal code reach 600$ you'll unlock a 49$ discount for the Espresso or Dolcevita or for any of the other jacket perks available on the site and, in addition, you will receive a free TAG with an engraved  monogram worth 39€, if not already included in the perk.

If you are announced as the winner of the Gallotti Game and you've already bought the perk, you will receive a full refund.

If you reach the 600$ target and have already ordered and paid for the perk, you will receive the refund of 49$ at the end of the campaign.

WHAT ELSE? If you're the first ranked player in a country that Gallotti is interested in you may have the opportunity to collaborate further with us.

Still Thinking about it? COME ON, Get in the game.

Rules:First you’ll need to get your Indiegogo referral link, click on the link below and be inspired by our tips for success:

•  Participate in the Facebook Contest and include your referral link,

• Spread the Word using your referral link in Fashion Blogs, Fashion Communities and Fashion Magazines;

• Invite your network to participate via email to increase your chances of winning; studies show that sharing your referral link in this way is more successful than via social networks.

• Share the referral link your Social Network.


To get the referral code and be tracked, follow this link: Click Here


WIN AN ESPRESSO OR DOLCE VITA by taking part in our FACEBOOK CONTEST

                   "I LOVE GALLOTTI"!


Work with Us! (Content Publisher)-->:)


HAVE YOU A GOT A WIDE NETWORK IN THE FASHION WORLD?

ARE YOU keen TO MONETIZE YOUR NETWORK AND BE A CONTENT PUBLISHER?


DO YOU HAVE THE RIGHT SKILLS TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN OUR TEAM?

GALLOTTI would like to give any interested participants in the Gallotti Game the possibility for further similar rewarded collaboration using a personal referral link. If you live in a country of interest to Gallotti and you achieve a high ranking in the Gallotti game you may have the opportunity to publish content in your country and receive credit or vouchers for use on our website.

Of course, the larger your social network and greater your fashion expertise the easier it will be to monetize your network with minimum effort.

The Gallotti Game is your chance to show us what you’re worth :)


Other Ways You Can Help


We are doing all we can to spread an innovative new way of doing business; creating unique clothing whilst helping society and the environment. 

Our Motto is ""WAY TO BE UNIQUE".


UNIQUE for TWO reasons: first of all because of the high quality of our clothes and the chance to personalize and tailor the products; secondly because we love this world and want to make our business zero impact and sustainable.

We would LOVE to share this experience with all of YOU and we hope that you’ll enjoy getting our campaign talked about.


 


Engraved Tag Monogram, Piping & SILK LINING


                                                       1           2             3


Estimated Delivery & Shipment Fees

We estimate that we will be able to finalize your order at maximum 45 days after purchase.

We PRODUCE our clothes on request, in line with our lean production policy, in order to minimize costs and the waste.Every item you order is made just for you and can be personalized or tailored to make it perfect. 

Delivery is by courier and is estimated to take from 1 to 6 days, depending on your location.

              

                *Russia Standard delivery in 10 days




FAQ

[Contest & Referral]

What happens if I win the FB Contest or the Referral contest and I’ve already bought a perk?

No problem, if you win the Facebook contest or you are the first ranked player in the Gallotti Game, you’ll receive a full refund; If you reach the 600$ target and have already ordered and paid for the perk, you will receive the refund of 49$ at the end of the campaign.

Can I participate in a contest even if I can’t afford to make a purchase or if I just want to support you and try to win a prize?

Of course, we’d be delighted to have you as part of our community and you’ll still have a chance to win prizes in both contests.

What happens if I reach the Referral contest target of $600; how do I get my 49$ discount?

First, you’ll need to make your purchase using the perk. We will then produce our list of winners for both contests and return the money to the same account used to make your purchase. Of course, we’ll need a bit of time to name our winners and make the refunds at the end of the campaign so please bear with us.

Can I take part in both contests?

Of course, we encourage you to do that. Use the Facebook contest to share your referral link, raise awareness, and increase your chances of winning the Gallotti Game.

Do I have to buy a perk to take part in the contests?

NO, anyone can participate in the contest.

[Shipment &Delivery]

How long will I have to wait for my order to arrive?

It takes one month to produce each product.

Delivery is by courier and is estimated to take between 1 and 6 days, depending on your location.

We PRODUCE our clothes on request, in line with our lean production policy, in order to minimize costs and the waste. Every item you order is made just for you and can be personalized or tailored to make it perfect.


Is the cost of delivery included?

No, check the price list above for delivery charges to your country.

How do I pay import tax?

Tax will be charged on delivery of your order. There is no import tax for customers from Europe.


What are the risks?

There is NO RISKS associated with this campaign.
The company has been running for 50 years and the quality of its products is guaranteed.
Delivery could be subject to some small delays if the campaign is very successful, but we promise it’ll be worth the wait.

Gallotti was founded in 1965 by two brothers, Francesco and Orlando, on their
return from a long stay in South America. Driven by their experience and talent
in tailoring, and full of initiative, they quickly got to grips with establishing
their own business in the leather industry in the outskirts of Florence, a city well known
through the centuries for producing the finest and most beautiful leather.

With determination, intuition, a constant search for style and an innate ability
to hand-craft, the two brothers enabled a distinctive company to flourish. The
enterprise soon entered the international market under the brand name”GALLOTTI” which
immediately became synonymous with “quality and elegance”.
Nowadays, truly brilliant craftsmanship, a result of centuries of practice, is disappearing; big brands get the lion’s share and trample upon the
values of this ancient tradition. However, Gallotti, one of the few companies left
in the Florence market, continues to grow, thanks to its dedication to Made In Italy, craftsmanship, passion,
history and quality. Gallotti proves that traditional values and art are still
appreciated around the world. We hope that you share these values and will help
us to reach our goal.   Learn More

Who we are!
Arash Gholamzadeh Nasrabadi

Andrea Paci

STRETCH GOALS
We need your support to launch properly our e-commerce, to spread the word about our company and, in
particular, to give life to our sustainable fashion project.

We’ve set a number of goals:And if we receive even more... we will be beside ourselves with excitement and give away lots of prizes
whilst doing lots to help the planet.
Don't
forget that by getting involved you will
be supporting an Eco-friendly, socially conscious
company working hard to make things better for people and the planet. 

What you get and what we
expect!
If you participate you’ll have
access to amazing perks and discounted prices.
We’d love you to take part in
the Gallotti Game or the Facebook Contest "I Love Gallotti", tell
your friends all about us and leave feedback and comments on our website after
you make a purchase.
There will be a prize for the winners of both competitions,plus participants in the Gallotti Game who
reach the required contribution levels (see below for more details) will have
the chance to unlock a discount and a free engraved monogram.
What are you waiting for? Get
on board!
Please remember that by purchasing
our product you’re enabling us to be sustainable and spread the importance of
shopping green. We’re certain that you’ll enjoy shopping with us and we can’t
wait to introduce you to our amazing service.

GALLOTTI’s COMMITMENT
to CSR


     

At GALLOTTI we believe in and are highly committed to Corporate Social
Responsibility, working to be a part of the Green Economy Revolution.
We ensure that our products are safe and respect the strictest environmental legislation, avoiding all materials
that could be harmful to the consumer or the environment.

At Gallotti we’ve chosen to carry out “LEAN PRODUCTION”. That means producing
to order, no mass production. When you order an item of Gallotti clothing, we
produce that item just for you. This minimizes waste and the impact on the
environment.
We are committed to drastically reducing our CO2 emissions to help the planet. 
We also have a keen social conscience and use our business to help people
less fortunate than ourselves who want to change their situation through
our collaboration with KIVA . 


We are involved in 2 Projects:

Gallotti & Treedom

Gallotti collaborates with “Treedom”, an organization that supports our efforts to
improve the environment.
Our website already has “Zero-CO2 Impact” status and with YOUR
help we will strive to rapidly make our Company completely “Zero- CO2
impact”.


For every purchase we will donate a tree to CANCEL OUT the CO2 produced by shipments. 
From the second year onwards,
the tree will continue to create oxygen for the world and will start to
provide fruits for the people of the poorer countries where the trees will be
planted.



Gallotti & Kiva
Kiva is a not-for-profit platform whose main aim is to alleviate poverty by
connecting people through social lending.


GALLOTTI supports Kiva’s initiative to assist poor entrepreneurs to build
up their business and guarantee them a minimum salary to help them escape the
grip of poverty.


For every purchase over 500 € GALLOTTI will make a donation to Kiva. Customers
can discover who their purchase is helping and what the person would like to do
with the money by logging on to the Kiva website using the Gallotti profile.

                                       
JOIN THE GALLOTTI GAME: THE MORE YOU SUPPORT US, THE LESS YOU PAY 


The GALLOTTI GAME enables you to support our company and its ideals, whilst giving
you the chance to win an
ESPRESSO or DOLCEVITA.

When you and the network that you attract with your unique Indiegogo
refferal code reach 600$ you'll unlock a 49$ discount for the Espresso or Dolcevita or
for any of the other jacket perks available on the site and, in addition, you
will receive a free TAG with an engraved  monogram worth 39€, if not already included in
the perk.
If you are announced as the winner of the Gallotti Game and you've already
bought the perk, you will receive a full refund.If you reach the 600$ target and have already ordered and paid for the
perk, you will receive the refund of 49$ at the end of the campaign.
WHAT ELSE? If you're the first
ranked player in a country that Gallotti is interested in you may have the opportunity
to collaborate further with us.

Still Thinking about it? COME ON,
Get in the game. 
Rules:First you’ll need to get your Indiegogo referral link, click on the link
below and be inspired by our tips for success:
•  Participate in the Facebook
Contest and include your referral link,
• Spread the Word using your referral link in Fashion Blogs, Fashion
Communities and Fashion Magazines;
• Invite your network to participate via email to increase your chances of
winning; studies show that sharing your referral link in this way is more
successful than via social networks. 
• Share the referral link your Social Network.

To get the referral code and be tracked, follow this link: Click Here



WIN AN ESPRESSO OR DOLCE VITA by taking part in our FACEBOOK
CONTEST 



       
           "I LOVE GALLOTTI"!Work with Us! (Content
Publisher)-->:)

HAVE YOU A GOT A WIDE NETWORK IN THE FASHION WORLD? 
ARE YOU keen TO MONETIZE YOUR NETWORK AND BE A CONTENT PUBLISHER?

DO YOU HAVE THE RIGHT SKILLS TO MAKE A DIFFERENCE IN OUR TEAM?
GALLOTTI would like to give any interested participants in the Gallotti
Game the possibility for further similar rewarded collaboration using a
personal referral link. If you live in a country of interest to Gallotti and
you achieve a high ranking in the Gallotti game you may have the opportunity to
publish content in your country and receive credit or vouchers for use on our
website.
Of course, the larger your social network and greater your fashion
expertise the easier it will be to monetize your network with minimum effort. 
The Gallotti Game is your chance to show us what
you’re worth :) 

Other Ways You Can Help

We are doing all we can to spread an innovative new way of doing
business; creating unique clothing whilst helping society and the environment.  Our Motto is ""WAY TO BE UNIQUE".
UNIQUE for TWO reasons: first of all because of the high quality of
our clothes and the chance to personalize and tailor the products; secondly because
we love this world and want to make our business zero impact and sustainable.

We would LOVE to share this experience with all of YOU and we hope that you’ll
enjoy getting our campaign talked about. 


 

Engraved Tag Monogram, Piping & SILK LINING 







                                                       1           2             3





Estimated Delivery & Shipment Fees
We estimate that we will be able to finalize your order at maximum 45 days after purchase. We
PRODUCE our clothes on request, in line with our lean production policy, in
order to minimize costs and the waste.Every item you order is made just for you and can be
personalized or tailored to make it perfect. 
Delivery is by courier and is estimated to take from 1 to 6 days, depending
on your location.
   
           
               
*Russia Standard delivery in 10 days
FAQ


[Contest & Referral]
What happens if I win
the FB Contest or the Referral contest and I’ve
already bought a perk?
No problem, if you win the
Facebook contest or you are the first ranked player in the Gallotti Game,
you’ll receive a full refund; If you reach the 600$ target and have already
ordered and paid for the perk, you will receive the refund of 49$ at the end of
the campaign.
Can I participate in a contest even if I can’t
afford to make a purchase or if I just want to support you and try to win a
prize?
Of course, we’d be delighted to have you as part of our community and you’ll
still have a chance to win prizes in both contests. 
What happens
if I reach the Referral contest target of $600; how do I get my 49$ discount?
First, you’ll need to make your purchase using the perk. We will then
produce our list of winners for both contests and return the money to the same
account used to make your purchase. Of course, we’ll need a bit of time to name
our winners and make the refunds at the end of the campaign so please bear with
us. 
Can I take part in both contests? 
Of course, we encourage you to do that. Use the Facebook contest to share
your referral link, raise awareness, and increase your chances of winning the
Gallotti Game.
Do I have to
buy a perk to take part in the contests?
NO, anyone can participate in the contest. 
[Shipment &Delivery]
How long will I have to wait for my order to
arrive?
It takes one month to produce each product. Delivery is by courier and is
estimated to take between 1 and 6 days, depending on your location.
We PRODUCE our clothes on request, in line with our lean production policy,
in order to minimize costs and the waste. Every item you order is made just for
you and can be personalized or tailored to make it perfect.

Is the cost of delivery included?
No, check the price list above for delivery charges to your country.
How do I pay import tax?
Tax will be charged on delivery of your order. There is no import tax for
customers from Europe.





What are the risks?

There is NO RISKS associated
with this campaign.
The company has been running for 50 years and the quality of its products is
guaranteed. 
Delivery could be subject to some small delays if the campaign is very successful,
but we promise it’ll be worth the wait.

story:
TS4A - T-Shirts for Africa...Apparel with a conscience. 

TS4A was carved out of a need to be more socially responsible, without an extra cost to the everyday consumer. During a class trip to Brazil, I was graced with the opportunity to visit both large and small companies and discuss with their executives about their operations. One thing I noticed from all the places we visited was, they all had a program to give back to the community, regardless of what industry they belonged to. This had become a culture and these companies did not need some sort of recognition for it. They were able to successfully integrate it into their organizational culture.

I was made to understand that regardless of how small or large your business was, there is always an opportunity to give back or be socially responsible. When I returned back to the U.S, I graduated a week after and with no immediate job, I decided to take the time to start a t-shirt project. I got a couple friends involved and we decided to buy a screen printing machine. 

Our 4 Color Screen Printing Machine

After setting up and giving it a test run, we created out first concept. We joined the "Keep Calm" craze and produced a bunch of keep calm shirts. 

Our First set of designs

We printed everyday the whole summer until we got a visit from the city shutting us down due to neighbor complaints.

One of my friends happened to work at a t-shirt printing place so he decide to help us out and pick up where we left off. We launched out website www.ts4africa.com and began to sell these shirts off the site. We also wore the shirts everywhere we went and got some buzz going. We sold the shirts at different events until the end of t-shirt season.

We decided that we needed a logo to represent the brand so we got working on a few designs. After what seemed like a million revisions, we were able to come up with something crest looking.

Our Logo

 Sometime in September 2012, We had sold a number of shirts and felt it was a good time to give a little token to our first orphanage. Since what we had raised wasn't enough to cover a ticket fare back to Africa, we sent the money back to family members who made purchases and presented them on behalf of TS4A. 

Our first orphanage visit

We returned to the same orphanage in December 2012 to check on the kids and also make another donation.

We are excited about our upcoming Summer line. Based on suggestions we received last year, a good amount of people wanted a personalized version of our product line. Rather than customizing, which would have been expensive, we launched our flag t-shirts. This way, you get to represent your Country. Currently, we have the United States, United Kingdom, Nigeria, Senegal and Ghana. We also have a few other designs.

Why do we need your money?

We need to get these shirts as far as possible. To everybody regardless of where you are. We want these shirts in your favorite stores and boutiques. We want to fulfill thousands upon thousands of orders. We want to be on your favorite shopping site. For us to establish this calibre of supply chain as a fairly new brand by ourselves is almost impossible. This is where we need your help. We need to hire a fashion PR and marketing firm who has already established their own supply chain and can plug us in and get us to your favorite stores.

Currently we have been reaching out to local retail outlets to carry our brand. The response we've received has been encouraging. However, we want to broaden our horizon and get these shirts to your local store. So we are also looking for anyone interested in partnering with us, or helping us market these shirts, or store owners interested in this brand, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Buy a regular t-shirt knowing that you helped make an impact on somebody's life, no matter how little.

story:
Is this the world’s simplest building?

  • No trusses

  • No beams

  • No purlins

  • No brackets

  • No fasteners

  • No perforations

  • No added bracing

  • No glue/welding/sealant

Just one new corrugated-profile sheet, flexed

 

This technolgy is perfect for disaster and low cost shelter:

Winter and tents don't mix so well:

Snapshot:

So this project is about creating a much better emergency shelter, which can also be used, (and reused) as a 3rd world, or refugee, housing alternative.

There is a need for really low cost shelter:

What starts a "temporary" often becomes near permanent:

What is needed is a really cheap form of shelter 

Insulated! so it is warmer in winter and cooler in summer ....

Immediately below is a CAD image of a shelter made from just one element.

If you look closely you will note the red sheets appear wider on the outside ..... Actually the red and grey sheets are locked together! Where they lock together forms a laminate "compression tension" arched beam.

This is Flex Mechanism at it simplest.

What I do

I develop ideas. It is my passion. It been a long journey, but I have learnt a bit along the way about how to turn ideas into working prototypes.

For example in 2011 I sold a technology called "Flexloft" to Nike USA:

 

But ideas mean a lot more if they do good.

I call this "Design with Heart"

Recently I have been working on a new approach to building which is very simple. It is ideal for shelter and housing for those who need it most.

  • It can also (later) be developed for simple bridges, dams, and water tanks.

This project can save and improve lives

Ideas mean nothing .... To turn ideas into SOLUTIONS needs time and money.

Yep ..... Ideas mean nothing-zippo-nada .... unless they deliver. I want to really attack this project and I need your help.

 

Ok .... Lets get technical for a moment:

Have you ever tried to crush an egg in your hand? It can be done, but the humble egg does quite well in the "Man vs Egg" test.

Actually an egg can survive 50 to 90lb of force:

Yes curves are very strong, but we usually build with straight lines. But once upon a time we built more with curves:

Indeed we still use arches in elegant and strong ways today:

 

So how about using arches for cheap shelter and housing?

If you want to have a quick simple building one can use the strength and simplicity of an arch with common ole corrugated iron ....

OK so lets use the power of the arch and corrugated iron to make simple affordable structures....

But there is one more thing needed here. It is a simple thing. It is the "mechanical glue" that makes this work. To illustrate the principle grab two plastic rulers:

  1. Seperate them at each end by a finger so they are roughly parallel.

  2. Bend them!

What happens?

The centers move close together .... and if something is the middle the rulers will trap it via a distributed friction force!

Now what if the rulers were a lot stornger, and connected at the edges ..... You could have a U shape ruler, or an S or H crossection .... bend the shape now and the closure will still happen.

Pretty simple eh! But great design often lives in simplicity. 

 

Ok, technogogy over ....

I need your help to refine this technology and create a shelter solution ready to use:

One thing I have learnt in the last decade or so is that you have to design with purpose.

The end user really matters whether it is a sneaky improvement to a golf club, or a quick and safe shelter for earthquake survivors in a remote mountainous area in Central Asia.

So for emergency shelter we have to pay attention to ALL of the following:

  1. Cheap, and
  2. Using local technologies if possible, and 
  3. Portable, and
  4. Safe, and
  5. Super easy to assemble, with minimal tools, and no English language requirement!

Yep, I need financial assistance to make this happen, but i am aware some people reading this will also have a great mix of skills and passion, for this project, so you can also help with your time:

Teamwork:

Great design is part inspiration and part perspiration, and a lot of persistence!

Teamwork here folks! If you have a passion and skill for CAD design, prototyping, detailed research, and dangerous thinking then send me an email simon@kiwipatents.com and I will advise you of a discussion blog which will be set up to start dialog.

Thanks Simon

______________________________________________

PS IF you want to understand a bit more detail regarding the technology here is a longer video 

______________________________________________

If you really want to understand more about the project scope, and have a lot of time! .....read below .... 

Appendix: Project Overview

For those of you who want a sense of the things that need to be done here following is an overview. This is not a tight sequential list, but merely scoping a list of things to work through:

1. Current Status

  1. Technical samples to hand & 
  2. Some understanding of the wish list for emergency shelter &
  3. Moving now to larger forms &
  4. Testing ways of making S and H connectors for corrugated sheet.

2. What do aid agencies need?

  1. Contact key aid agencies to better understand what is ideal.
  2. Review current solutions, and problems ....
  3. Research transport issues and limits.
  4. Research production technologies available in the key geographical areas of Asia, Middle East, Africa, the Pacific, and 
  5. Conduct historical research on issues found in past emergencies, and third world crises.

3. What is the best technology to use?

  1. Extruded plastic/fiber-reinforced plastic/aluminum/other?
  2. Can fiber reinforced concrete be used? (concrete is more elastic than you think!)
  3. Is pultruded form an option? (but how common is pultrusion as a production technology) 
  4. Is roll-forming using standard roll formers an option?
  5. Is folding and pressing an option?
  6. Is thermo forming, (possibly with folding) an option?
  7. What other production technologies are there?
  8. How practical is it to make the sheet with the connector integral?
  9. In the case of insulating twin layer structure what is the best buffer layer to use to separate the beam elements by say 2"
  10. What processes are options for creating the arch .... what may be the sequence of assembly "on site"?
  11. What alloys of steel are more elastic, and what are their costs and availability worldwide?
  12. Is the traditional corrugation the best form anyway? .... is a flat form with plywood an alternative?
  13. What end wall connectors are needed? .... Can things available now be used?????
  14. What is the effect of the use of occasional polycarbonate sheets for lighting?
  15. Is a chimney needed? ....and what are flashing and engineering considerations here?
  16. How modular can parts be ....for extension as needed
  17. How practically robust are parts for disassembly, transport, and reuse elsewhere?

..... others questions will arise!

4. Create working samples

Depending on feedback and factors above .....

  1. A roof
  2. A building 
  3. An emergency shelter
  4. A water tank
  5. A small bridge
  6. A small dam
  7. A small house

Consult with engineers along the way (It is my hope we can save costs by crowd engineering here!)

Note: Whilst there are many options, and applications it is best to focus. What is the greatest pain and the greatest gain .... then focus on that. So whilst the above seven applications are very valid it will be best to work on them in time .... not all at once!

5. Other

  1. Consider how you spread knowledge that this solution is available?
  2. Is there are famous person who can be a champion for this in the media?
  3. How simple and intuitive can the assembly be - can the parts be designed to be only able to be assembled in one (correct) way.
  4. How few tools can be needed? none!? one?
  5. Is a "Factory in a Can" an option for the third world? ... If so .... who to partner with to investigate with, and make this happen?

6. Test Production

Make, or more likely organize the making of, all parts needed ....

__________________________________________________

Ok the above is just a quick overview. As you can see there is a lot to do and a team will be needed!

Cheers

Simon

What processes are options for creating the arch .... what may be the sequence of assembly "on site"?
What alloys of steel are more elastic, and what are their costs and availability worldwide?
Is the traditional corrugation the best form anyway? .... is a flat form with plywood an alternative?
What end wall connectors are needed? .... Can things available now be used?????
What is the effect of the use of occasional polycarbonate sheets for lighting?
Is a chimney needed? ....and what are flashing and engineering considerations here?
How modular can parts be ....for extension as needed
How practically robust are parts for disassembly, transport, and reuse elsewhere?
..... others questions will arise!
4. Create working samples
Depending on feedback and factors above .....

A roof
A building 
An emergency shelter
A water tank
A small bridge
A small dam
A small house
Consult with engineers along the way (It is my hope we can save costs by crowd engineering here!)
Note: Whilst there are many options, and applications it is best to focus. What is the greatest pain and the greatest gain .... then focus on that. So whilst the above seven applications are very valid it will be best to work on them in time .... not all at once!
5. Other

Consider how you spread knowledge that this solution is available?
Is there are famous person who can be a champion for this in the media?
How simple and intuitive can the assembly be - can the parts be designed to be only able to be assembled in one (correct) way.
How few tools can be needed? none!? one?
Is a "Factory in a Can" an option for the third world? ... If so .... who to partner with to investigate with, and make this happen?
6. Test Production
Make, or more likely organize the making of, all parts needed ....
__________________________________________________
Ok the above is just a quick overview. As you can see there is a lot to do and a team will be needed!
Cheers
Simon

story:
Short Summary

"Dreams become a reality if you just Believe"…..

Starr Andrews was introduced to skating at the age of three years old.  Fascinated by the shiny blades, she found the job of watching her mom skate from the bleachers tortuous.  A precocious child and determined to skate, she took off at lighting speed once granted the privileged. At the age of 9, Starr hit center ice with her artistic "Whip My Hair" routine, earning her over 14 million hits on YouTube.  Recognized as raw talent and talked about on every social network from Ryan Seacrest, Lipstick Alley, Vibe, World Star Hip Hop, Black Celebrity Kids, and many many more. She has attracted fans from Cape Code to Japan with over 7,000 followers.

Her mother is single and divorced with three children.  Starr's training came to a halt when her mom had eleven heart attacks in a four year period, making consistent training for Starr a financial hardship due to her mother's disability.  Off the competition scene for a while, she practiced when she could making the most of the time she had on the ice.  Starr passed her Juvenile test late in the season in June 2013.  She competed in four competitions, placing first in the qualifying round and third in final round at the 2014 Southwest Pacific Regional Championships.  She earned first place at her first Sectionals where she qualified for Nationals this January 2014 in Boston. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • The funding is for expenses incurred by qualifying and participating in the 2014 Prudential U.S. Figure Skating Championships in Boston, MA this coming January.
  • You will help make history for this young talent.
  • The funds are specifically to cover travel, lodging, coaching fees, and miscellaneous.  

The Impact

Any amount given will impact Starr's success.  There is no gift too big or too small.  Each donation gets her one step closer to achieving her goals.  Figure skating is a very expensive and elusive sport. Many do not have the chance because of cost, especially in the African-American community.  The reach is so far and for the few. As the old African proverb says, "It takes a village to raise a child".

  • Your contributions breathe life into Olympic size dreams.
  • Your contributions will help continue the pathway of her destiny.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute, please help spread the word by sharing on your social media pages.

  • Ask others to get the word out and make some noise about Starr.
  • Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you so much for your support!!!
