story:
Untitled Document

Visit www.egardwatches.com for the latest or to reserve one the remaining Passages Timepieces.

info@egardwatches.com


Formed as a vision of a timepiece that is more than simply a watch, but a true MECHANICAL WORK OF ART (no battery, works entirely based off the movement of your wrist.)


 

BY POPULAR DEMAND: Woman’s Passages Beauté

As many women were asking about a woman’s version of the timepiece, including Bill’s wife and daughter, by popular demand we are proud to introduce the Woman’s Passages Beauté:


The “Passages” Limited Edition watch was created by William Shatner in collaboration with myself, Ilan Srulovicz, the founder of Egard Watch Company.

A combination of both of our visions as to what a timepiece should be.

GET A SNEAK PEAK AT BILL'S FIRST REACTION TO SEEING THE PROTOTYPE!

Before we get too far, we would like thank you and the community of fans for allowing us to do something unprecedented in the watch industry.

By bringing this project to IndieGoGo and directly to you, we can cut out distributors and retailers, as well as additional marketing expenses. 

This allows us to deliver our timepieces at less than $400 which is a fraction of their $1199 normal retail price, worth far more than you will pledge and that will appreciate in value over time.

The timepiece is limited edition and has some features you will not find on any other watch on the market. Take advantage of the offer while it is here for this short period of time.

__________________________________________________________

Though time is fleeting, each carefully crafted Égard timepiece becomes a constant reminder to be thankful for these wondrous moments and to look forward to the future. 


In our process to come up with the infinite scale of time, we came up with the idea to put authentic asteroid dust on the dial. Each limited edition passages watch comes with dusted asteroid (some of the most primitive material in the universe) on the dial so you can walk around with a piece of the universe on your wrist. 

The entire vision of this watch came about by a chance encounter with William Shatner. Casper Van Dien, an ambassador of the Egard Brand, was followed by William Shatner on Twitter. 

When Mr. Shatner saw the Egard timepiece on Casper, he immediately wanted to own some of our timepieces.

Mr. Shatner enjoyed wearing our timepieces and requested to meet with Casper and I. We spent well over an hour discussing horology, time, the universe and family. There was a strong connection because of my intensity to what some might call an obsession with time: Mr. Shatner related to it.

We discussed the meaning of time passing as we age, and the few true moments that reflect a good life, moments not to be wasted.

It was that same philosophy that inspired me to make my first watch for my father. My father (seen below wearing a timepiece I made for him) is the inspiration and motivativation behind my company.

Sometime later Mr. Shatner reached out to me to discuss how to bring our mutual vision to reality. 

From our initial meeting, it quickly grew into many sessions of us sitting around discussing what the watch could be, sketching out ideas and discussing what was important to him in a watch from both a functional standpoint and a personal standpoint. 

(screenshot from my initial realization of the watch in 3D)

What resonated most was "The passages of time", Mr. Shatner’s idea that represents the valued moments in time, for himself his family and generations to come. 

We wanted to create a timepiece for others to share in the philosophy and experience with us...

Bill and I embarked on a YEAR LONG JOURNEY to build his signature timepiece to be dedicated to his grandchildren and signifying the passages of time. Through the year, we created more than just a watch. We created a piece of mechanical artwork that you can wear on your wrist signifying the passage of time…

However, we both realized that we envisioned a watch that was unique, but would also have to be extremely functional.


Watch specifications:

  1. Limited Edition (official William Shatner watch)
  2. 316L 45mm "oblong" case
  3. Dial dusted with 100 percent authentic asteroid dust
  4. 3D multi layered, multi textured dial with carbon fiber and open heart to showcase the movement
  5. Domed sapphire crystal with AR coating
  6. Automatic movement (modified Miyota 8S27) with Sun and Moon indicator
  7. Exhibition sapphire crystal caseback showcasing the movement
  8. Caseback engraved with Mr. Shatners signature and number of the watch
  9. 5atm / 50 meters water resistant
  10. Specially treated rubber strap with butterfly buckle
  11. 3 year warranty

The box set edition is an indiegogo EXCLUSIVE. It comes with everything listed above as well as a specially made watch winder (perfect for this automatic timepiece) which will retail for $150 USD. As well as a limited edition print. The Steel Bracelet and the Textured Leather Band showcased in the images below (as well as tools to change it). Additional USB footage and more. 

*JUST TO NOTE, WE WILL ASK YOUR COLOR PREFERENCE AT THE END OF THE CAMPAIGN

100% of the funds will be used for the first round of the Egard Passages production. After more than a year of conceptualizing, designing and manufacturing fully working prototypes we are ready to move forward!

All the work is done, we have our prototypes and are ready to produce the watches! The timepieces should be ready to be shipped by February/March.

DON’T WORRY! WE WILL HAVE A SPECIAL GIFT FOR YOU FOR CHRISTMAS TO MAKE SURE YOU HAVE SOMETHING UNDER THE TREE.

The collection has taken over a year to design and prototype.

Our company Egard has produced many luxury timepieces and already has manufacturing relationships fully realized. We have weeded out the problems on past designs and have a very strong sense of everything we need to do to complete this project at the highest quality within the deadlines we set.

When it comes to quality control we are borderline obsessive and offer a 3 year warranty to insure that you feel comfortable buying a timepiece from us. In our belief the most important aspect to any company is how it takes care of it's customers.

story:
Raya Hanon is a designer swimwear brand from the mind of a traveler, inspired by travel. Each collection is based off of a different exotic location and features fabrics, beading, and sewing techniques from that place. It is a way for the designer, Heather Pierce, to transform her travels into artistic, wearable memories.
Due to sudden and recent press in Sports Illustrated Swimsuit 2013 and a few other national and international magazines, Raya Hanon is making waves in the fashion industry. Many wonderful opportunities, such as publications in the biggest global distributor and magazine for swimwear and invitations to the world's largest swim shows are coming up this summer. It's an exciting time for Raya Hanon! But, because the company is growing so rapidly, we need some help to get us through this busy, but amazing summer. That's where we need your help! SI Swimsuit opened up some doors for Raya Hanon. However, because things are moving so quickly, we simply do not have the capital to take advantage of these fantastic opportunities that could launch the brand to rapid success. Only with your help can Raya Hanon continue!
For more information on the brand, please visit the website and online store at www.rayahanon.com. Raya Hanon is also on Facebook, Instagram, Tumblr., LinkedIn, and Twitter.
Please support Raya Hanon by helping to fund our journey. We cannot do it without you!
Thank you for helping our dreams come true!
The Raya Hanon Team

 

Raya Hanon bikinis take you to paradise with their beautiful, bright colors and exotic fabrics. Hand beaded elements are also added and bring every Raya Hanon suit to a level of luxury.

 

 

Raya Hanon also caught the attention of Sports Illustrated Swimsuit last year. With a $100 donation, this Bali Night Bikini Top will be yours!

 

 

Above, Ariel Meredith wears the Bali Spirt swimsuit by Raya Hanon in black. With a donation of $200, this exclusive swimsuit is yours!!

 

 

The Sea Green bikini bottom is made with traditional Balinese batik and hand beaded at the waist line in gold. Beautiful, intricate, and exclusive, this bikini is yours with a $300 donation.

 

 

Raya Hanon's 2014 Bali collection features life sized, hand beaded flowers like these seen on the Bali Lily Bikini top. The full Bali Lily bikini is all yours with your $500 donation!

 

 

The exclusive Sunflower swimsuit by Raya Hanon is a vibrant sunshine yellow and made with a hand beaded neck piece. Raya Hanon hopes to move the swimwear industry with its intricate beadwork and novice designs. Please be a part of our journey and help us reach our goal! We can't do it without you.

 

 

Hand Beaded Flower bikinis by Raya Hanon. www.rayahanon.com

 

 

Raya Hanon also provides a line of exclusive, one of a kind swimsuits that are intricately hand beaded. These suits have stirred up a lot of buzz in the industry. With your help, we will be able to show them at the upcoming swim shows!

 

 

The Bali Night Monokini by Raya Hanon. www.rayahanon.com

 

Thank you so much for stopping by and helping Raya Hanon acheive their dreams!

-The Raya Hanon Team

story:
About The Quilted Valkyrie

I started The Quilted Valkyrie for simple reasons. First was the need for pouches, sleeves and padded covers for various gadgets that we have that were usable, washable and fun.  I then decided to blend it in with my passion in life, quilting and collecting fabric. I have always loved needlework. I’ve called myself a quilter for the last 18 years and have been working on various forms of needlework since the age of 7. I love to collect beautiful fabrics and sit and stare at them with hopes of grandeur of making quilts, GadgetGear, and amazing dog collars for various projects for people!

Why I need your help

When I started this adventure, it was a hobby/extra money thing. The extra money helped to fill in a few holes but it wasn't a full time job. As the business began to get larger, I discovered I wasn't going to be able to just run down to the sewing store and pick up a yard of batting or use whatever thread was on sale. I have businesses interested in carrying my items, but they need a larger amount that I am capable of making without start up funds. I am also the wife of a disabled Army Veteran.  Although he has graduated college, he is having a very hard time finding a job that does not discriminate him having his service dog, Charlie. So for the moment, my little business is filling in the gaps that his small disability doesn't cover.

The money raised here will help cover the costs of purchases of things such as 

  • Rolls of batting and yards of interfacing.
  • 1" polypro webbing and 3/8" black heavy nylon webbing.
  • Fabrics: fat quarters, layered cakes, charm packs and yardage.
  • High quality threads.
  • Needles for my machine.
  • Buckles, triglides, and keepers.
  • Service for my Bernina.
  • Entrance into the February 2014 QuiltCon to attend various lectures and classes on the business side of quilting.
  • I have a detailed list of all of the supplies I need, quantities and costs for every last item.

This means having a faster turnaround time as I'm not having to wait for basic supplies to come in on an as needed basis, they will be right here ready to go!

What are some of the super cool perks? For the cost of one of my single fabric camera straps, I will make you a custom patchwork camera strap, totally original, never made again. 

What happens next

As soon as I receive the funds I will purchase the "ingredients," get my machine serviced, sign up for the QuiltCon Classes and get started making amazing, original pieces! All of the money raised here will go directly to these supplies, not my time, just the basic supplies.

    Other ways you can help me

    It's been supper tough on all of us recently; I understand that more often than not! Even if you can't contribute financially, I would *love* for you to help me spread the word and share this effort on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, email, phone call, smoke signal...anyway! Anything that can help me get the word out helps me and I truly appreciate it!

    Thank you so much! Many blessings!
    Keri

For the cost of one of my single fabric camera straps, I will make you a custom patchwork camera strap, totally original, never made again.    What happens next As soon as I receive the funds I will purchase the "ingredients," get my machine serviced, sign up for the QuiltCon Classes and get started making amazing, original pieces! All of the money raised here will go directly to these supplies, not my time, just the basic supplies.  
Other ways you can help me
 It's been supper tough on all of us recently; I understand that more often than not! Even if you can't contribute financially, I would *love* for you to help me spread the word and share this effort on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, email, phone call, smoke signal...anyway! Anything that can help me get the word out helps me and I truly appreciate it!Thank you so much! Many blessings!Keri

story:
Short Summary

Hi, My name is Skip and I've taken on a goal to help people protect their homes, barns or any other structure from wildfire. I wanted to create something to help relieve some of the misery and danger. Like the person you see trying to save his house with a garden hose or the family who has to evacuate and can only hope their house will be OK and then come back to find it's burned to the ground. 

  • I came up with a simple inexpensive tool I've tested several times in a wind tunnel lab and refined it with the results from those indoor tests. It is now patent pending and requires one more final step of outdoor testing that I have set up with a Nationally Recognized Testing Facility in Washington state. 
  • I am trying to raise funding for that testing. The product is a thin flat tool pictured above with a very specific design that  when laid out will slow and repeatedly suppress very large flames down to almost zero. This final outdoor testing will validate that claim and provide a launching point for marketing.
  •    It was specifically created from material  capable of taking on repeatedly the excessive heat of wildfire @ 2000° F. The pattern forces a fire to work harder and harder as it progresses forward through the design pushed by the wind.  No water, chemicals, electricity or mechanical equipment or human interaction is required for the design to work properly. You simply place it over shrubs, lawns or anywhere a fire will make its approach to a structure on the ground.
  • Here in So. California wildfire is a yearly fact of life as it is around the world; no one wants to be caught in it, and yet many are with few options. All too often the aftermath is devastating. I believe like an earthquake kit; if you are prepared with this product it can help save homes because it is so easy to setup before evacuating. It requires 1 minute to set 1 in place. Imagine a physical barrier a large 15' high fire cannot get past without being significantly degraded to less than 1 foot high. It may sound unrealistic,  but this testing will prove it. 

What We Need & What You Get

What I am seeking from the Indiegogo community is funding of $7,000 to prove this product is capable of stopping a wind driven wildfire. I have included the quote on my website in the Indiegogo tab for you to review @ www.firebrakesolutions.com

  • The funding received will cover all the costs for the rental, labor and expenses incurred for the lab for 1 day of testing consisting of 7 or 8 tests,  The certification report will provide a professional pedigree, and a professional video of all the testing for marketing purposes. That cost will be approximately $6500.00
  • Any additional funding received will be used to begin initial marketing and begin promoting the idea and product to the specific target markets in Southern California most susceptible to wildfires. 
  • My commitment is to be fully transparent with all funds received.  The funding will be rewarded with small gifts of appreciation listed in the perks section which will be costed out at approximately 25% of the value of each pledge received toward the total funding goal of $7000.00.
  • if I meet my funding goal, I will move quickly to first provide the gifts and then complete the testing being sought within 60 days. If I do not reach my goal I will provide the gifts first and then use whatever is left to offset the  costs I will need to come up with on my own.
  • I will provide updates on my Indiegogo web page to keep everyone updated on the progress of testing and possible investment opportunities down the line through monthly updates. If you would like to be mentioned as a contributor I will  include names and contributions if you like on the website. If you would rather be updated by email  send me your email address. Mine is Skip1202@verizon.net
  • The balance of any additional contributions will be used 2 ways. The first half of any excess funding will begin a small marketing/advertizing campaign to create customers with the other half donated to any charities of your choice.
  • Thank you for giving me the opportunity to help others.  

The Impact

The impact of this testing and starting up of a small business will be immediately felt by anyone who has to evacuate from wildfire and wishes they could do more. By taking 3-5 minutes a defensible fire line can be rolled out allowing a homeowner the ability to choose where to fight a fire as it approaches a property. That ability to slow a fire and degrade it is something everyone who has experienced any loss due to fire wishes they had available to them. The only thing stopping a person from buying a product like this is the proof it does work and the the knowledge of where to buy it.

On my web site I have included 2 videos I put on Youtube for your review. Although the video does not show the final design that came out of the testing it does show the idea does work. From the video showing the pattern being burned a second time you can see smoke starting up at the end of the test where the fire was starving from lack of oxygen being pulled down through the holes of the pattern fast enough to maintain the height of the flames. The final testing will also be using a secondary patent design implemented after the testing which will be even more effective driving the remaining flames  under a piece of material where extinguishing a flame is made much easier.  Taking a flame of 15' high down to almost zero within 10 feet.

I think that is an incredible claim and I hope you do also?

With this tool a fire can be directed, slowed and reduced in size adding safety and providing a barrier which a fire cannot pass through without being significantly suppressed. It is also reusable which will be one of the tests being run to show it is capable of being burned 3 times and still not degrade or destroy the material.

What can you do if a fire is coming toward your home except call the fire department and evacuate? Imagine taking 5 minutes to save everything you own, and not have to be there for it to work. 

Risks & Challenges

The risks involved are few with this product. I've proven twice the same material can handle temperatures over 1423° F. The material is rated for 2000° F. The risk I see with this idea are far outweighed by the potential for saving a home, barn, corral etc and all its possessions. The main risk as a homeowner is putting the tool down where a fire will not contact it causing a fire to go around it. The solution for that is to have enough on hand.  A good risk is to have paid the money for the product and never have use it. I have spoken with patent attorneys, many fire departments and testing facilities who all say its a good idea. The main challenge at this point is proving it and making the product known. The second challenge will be large scale marketing and setting up production with more capital investment required. Hopefully with the results of this testing I can come back to Indiegogo to ask for capital after providing proof from this testing of how well it did perform.  

Other Ways You Can Help

I've begun making several to be given out to places as a display item to start a conversation in areas that have been involved with a wildfire. If you know of any place or person or business that may be interested please let me know or pass my name on if you prefer.

If you know anyone who may be interested in helping with potential leads, website re-design, or marketing this idea on a minimal budget pass my name on to them and direct them to my website. Please consider using the Indiegogo share tools to help me grow awareness of this simple cost effective solution to wildfire danger. The greatest reward for me would be hearing from someone who used the product and it saved them from having to start all over after the devastation of a wildfire.

story:
PLEASE NOTE:  ALL IMAGES AND THE VIDEO IN THIS POSTING ARE OF THE ACTUAL PRODUCT.  THEY ARE NOT RENDERED IMAGES!

Please copy the campaign link above and repost in your FaceBook, Myspace and Twitter!  Be the first to tell all your friends and help us get the word out! 

-------------------------------------

Quick Update:  Alright...the plan was to get everything ready and then really launch this thing with 30day left in the campaign.  The Commercial is now online as well as the How it works video.  Still light on traffic though, so please help us get the word out!

-------------------------------------

Please specify color and size in the comments field as you check out!

=====================

 

Blings are the world's first illuminated shoes that will interact with your iPhone or Android device.  The idea was to bring together the elements of style, functionality and technology into a coherent product that you can wear anywhere and stand out. 

Blings are perfect for noisy environments where you can't hear your phone ring and when you can't feel it vibrate in your pocket or purse.  Never miss a call or text message again!

Blings are also perfect for jogging or cycling at night where lighted shoes will provide higher visibility for increased safety.

HOW THEY WORK:

How they work video located here:  http://youtu.be/6i7QSloZoHY?hd=1

To communicate with your Blings, simply pair them with your device via Bluetooth, then download and install the free app and you're ready to go.

Once you've launched the App, it will give you several options on how to control your Blings.  For example, by pressing the "ON" button, all the lights in your Blings will be activated.  Your Blings are equipped with blue LEDs in the heel and orange EL (Electroluminescent) lighting along the sides.

The next option in the App is to have your Blings flash by itself.  There are several presets provided and you can cycle through them using the preset button.

You can select the Audio button and your Blings will react to incoming audio such as music or even when you are walking.

However, one of the coolest features of your Blings is its ability to alert you when you get a call or text.  The alert feature can be used in conjunction with any of the other options or by itself.  When you receive a call, the blue lights will flash continuously until you pick up or the phone stops ringing.  However, if you get a text message, the blue light will flash the word "TEXT" in Morse code three times.

Your Blings are constructed of the highest quality materials including an all leather upper section.  The EL lighting is extremely flexible and waterproof.  The LED lights are embedded into the sole of the shoe, making your Blings very durable and capable of being worn daily.

Your Blings are equipped with an electronic brain located inside the tongue of the shoe and is easily accessible by pulling apart the Velcro lip.  The battery is located on the brain and can be replaced within a minute or two and should last for months or years depending on use.  The brain can be removed entirely if you desire to wash your Blings. 

For those of you without an iPhone or Android device, don't fret.  We have added a push button switch on the brain to allow you to select various functions and presets for your Blings so that you may enjoy them also.

As part of our commitment to growing the functionality of this product, we will be providing a SDK so you can program your own sequences into your Blings or add its capabilities to your own software applications. 

WHERE WE ARE: 

We have been working for many months with our manufacturer on this project.  We have gone through several prototypes and have arrived at a functional model as shown in the video.

We have already completed all necessary tooling for the shoes and are ready to go into production.

We have personnel overseas who have been our eyes, ears and hands in this project through the R&D phase who are ready to manage the production process.

With your assistance we can bring this shoe to market within 90 days after the completion of the funding. 

OPTIONAL COLOR AND SIZES:

Blings will be offered in all standard sizes for both Men and Women as well as in white as shown above and black shown below:

T-SHIRT:

As detailed in our rewards section, the following is the glow in the dark T-Shirt we will be providing to our supporters:

 

PRIVATE LABEL:

For our supporters who have selected the Private Label option, we will embroider your name or logo onto the shoe as shown below (your choice of thread color):

As detailed in our rewards section, the following is the glow in the dark T-Shirt we will be providing to our supporters:

For our supporters who have selected the Private Label option, we will embroider your name or logo onto the shoe as shown below (your choice of thread color):

story:
Who we are..

Esoteric London is an edgy urban accessories and clothing lifestyle brand created by London College of Fashion graduate Chloe Hope King. With around a decade of experience in the fashion and retailing industries she wanted to create something fresh.

“I take great inspiration from my peers and the amazing eccentricities, energy and life they possess; from nature and what it can provide; and from looking back to a time when craftspeople were revered and took great pride in working with their own two hands.”

At the heart of the brand is a great deal of passion, personality and desire to create something desirable and new.

What we do..

We believe in embracing the creativity of the individual. We recognise that 'one size' does not fit all.

All pieces are hand-made/ hand finished in London by an experienced and innovative designer using luxury materials. We use mainly sustainable and natural materials fusing tried and tested traditional methods with more modern innovative techniques, giving our brand an edge. Here your senses will be delighted with an array of our luxurious wood and leather hand-crafted body and clothing decorations adorned with gold and silver. All of our pieces are made in limited edition numbers to ensure the exclusivity of each collection.

Custom orders are also undertaken, this more personal service involves really getting to know the client, understanding their vision and bringing it to life; catering to those inspired by our past and present collections. We understand that our pieces are a statement, and we're here to help you make yours.

Company Ethos..

Integrity - Esoteric London products are hand-made/ hand finished in the UK using sustainable materials (the majority of which are sourced locally) with a fair working environment ensured for everyone involved, including the factories we work with. This ethos is not used as a gimmick but engrained in the daily running of the company.

Creativity - We don’t follow the passing trends, we craft exciting original products, which reflect the creativity and uniqueness of our customers.

Inspiration - Not merely another clothing brand, Esoteric is a fusion of the creative industries built to inspire. We also nurture and support fresh creative talent (singers/dancers etc) by offering them a free performance platform at our by offering them a free performance platform at our monthly streetwear pop-up shop events (www.thefreeyard.com).

Reward Details..

WOOD BACKED MIRROR CUSTOM NAME/ WORD NECKLACES

Lost for words? Don't be! Up to 9 letters personalisation. Blinging acrylic mirror in classic Esoteric font backed with hand sanded walnut wood. Silver or gold plated 16" necklace chain. Esoteric London logo engraved on the back. Awesomely presented in custom packaging. Made in the UK by Esoteric London.

Available colours -

  • Yellow mirror
  • Red mirror
  • Purple mirror
  • Pink mirror
  • Dark grey mirror
  • Green mirror
  • Gold mirror
  • Bronzed grey mirror
  • Blue mirror
  • Orange mirror
  • Silver mirror

WOOD BACKED MIRROR CUSTOM EARRINGS

 

 

 

The London skyline cut in blinging acrylic mirror. Hoop earrings in 11 colour choices backed with hand sanded walnut wood. Up to 9 letters can be engraved on each earring or as standard with Esoteric London branding. Ear wires are gold plated surgical steel or sterling silver. Authenticity guaranteed with the Esoteric London logo engraving on the reverse side. Ready to gift in beautifully presented custom packaging. Measures 5cm wide. Made in the UK by Esoteric London.

Colour choices as above.

WOOD WITH REAL GOLD OR SILVER LEAF CUSTOM NAME/ WORD NECKLACES

Any word or name cut and engraved in solid walnut wood with real gold or silver leaf and 28" long beaded neck chain in black or white. Authenticity guaranteed with the Esoteric London logo back engraving and etched tag. Awesomely presented in custom packaging. Made in the UK by Esoteric London.

WOOD WITH REAL SILVER OR GOLD CUSTOM WORD EARRINGS

Spell it out with up to 9 letters of your own choosing. Engraved walnut wood earrings with real gold or real silver leaf. Ear wires are gold plated surgical steel or sterling silver. Authenticity guaranteed with the Esoteric London logo engraving on the reverse side. Ready to gift in beautifully presented custom packaging. Measures 2.5cm wide, length varies. Made in the UK by Esoteric London.

INITIAL LETTER NECKLACE

Any letter cut and engraved in solid walnut wood with real gold or silver leaf, available in three sizes with four neck chain options.

Small - 4.5cm tall

Medium - 6cm tall

Large - 7.5cm tall

28" long beaded neck chain in black 

28" long beaded neck chain in white

16" silver plated snake chain

16" gold plated snake chain

Authenticity guaranteed with the Esoteric London logo back engraving and etched tag. Awesomely presented in custom packaging. Made in the UK by Esoteric London.

HAND PAINTED ESOTERIC LONDON LOGO NECK CHAIN

Show us some love with an oversized hand painted logo with real gold leaf detailing and 28" long beaded neck chain in black. Authenticity guaranteed with the Esoteric London logo back engraving and etched tag. Awesomely presented in custom packaging. Made in the UK by Esoteric London.

Where the money is going..

You will be supporting a new British brand with a conscience.

The proceeds from this will go towards..

  • Material costs for products
  • Manufacturing costs
  • Printing and packaging
  • Shipping your pieces to you
  • Sampling the next collection

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge will be parting with these awesome pieces once we have crafted them for you!

After that, the usual suspects are..

1. Production delays - We have forged a great relationship with our suppliers due to their reliability in the past but we do have fall back options just in case the need arises.

2. Quality control - As each piece is assembled by hand and tested by a member of Esoteric here in the UK we can guarantee the quality of our products.

3. Money problems - We have already researched and negotiated material and manufacture costs and can confirm that these funds will be enough to produce the collection.

4. Delivery time - We work efficiently and have allowed plenty of time to create the pieces for the estimated delivery date. If we surpass our funding goal we have amazing potential staff members lined up ready to join the Esoteric production team to ensure the larger number of pieces are manufactured to the high Esoteric standards in a timely manner.

FAQ:

1) When can I expect to receive my stash?

Once the funding campaign ends all orders will be started immediately. As each item is custom and materials need to be ordered we expect this to be completed within 2-3 weeks. If you live within the UK, shipping will take a further 2-5 days (slightly longer for international deliveries).

2) How do I choose my designs?

When the campaign ends we will contact everyone for details and personalisation info.

3) Do you ship internationally?

Yes! We are based in London, UK but will ship anywhere in the world (just pay a small extra amount to cover the extra shipping costs).

4) What happens if the goal isnt reached?

Should our goal not be met, all orders will of course be honoured

and finally..

A MASSIVE THANK YOU!

..for taking the time to check out our project!

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP..

If you can't fund this project but you want to help, please spread the word far and wide so that we can get enough interest and funding to proceed.

Send your friends a link to this page and encourage them to follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram:

http://www.facebook.com/WeAreEsotericLondon

http://www.twitter.com/esotericLDN

http://www.instagram.com/esotericLDN

We understand that our pieces are a statement, and we're here to help you make yours.
Company Ethos..
Integrity - Esoteric London products are hand-made/ hand finished in the UK using sustainable materials (the majority of which are sourced locally) with a fair working environment ensured for everyone involved, including the factories we work with. This ethos is not used as a gimmick but engrained in the daily running of the company.
Creativity - We don’t follow the passing trends, we craft exciting original products, which reflect the creativity and uniqueness of our customers.
Inspiration - Not merely another clothing brand, Esoteric is a fusion of the creative industries built to inspire. We also nurture and support fresh creative talent (singers/dancers etc) by offering them a free performance platform at our by offering them a free performance platform at our monthly streetwear pop-up shop events (www.thefreeyard.com).
Reward Details..
WOOD BACKED MIRROR CUSTOM NAME/ WORD NECKLACES

Lost for words? Don't be! Up to 9 letters personalisation. Blinging acrylic mirror in classic Esoteric font backed with hand sanded walnut wood. Silver or gold plated 16" necklace chain. Esoteric London logo engraved on the back. Awesomely presented in custom packaging. Made in the UK by Esoteric London.

Available colours -

Yellow mirror
Red mirror
Purple mirror
Pink mirror
Dark grey mirror
Green mirror
Gold mirror
Bronzed grey mirror
Blue mirror
Orange mirror
Silver mirror

WOOD BACKED MIRROR CUSTOM EARRINGS
 

 
 

The London skyline cut in blinging acrylic mirror. Hoop earrings in 11 colour choices backed with hand sanded walnut wood. Up to 9 letters can be engraved on each earring or as standard with Esoteric London branding. Ear wires are gold plated surgical steel or sterling silver. Authenticity guaranteed with the Esoteric London logo engraving on the reverse side. Ready to gift in beautifully presented custom packaging. Measures 5cm wide. Made in the UK by Esoteric London.
Colour choices as above.
WOOD WITH REAL GOLD OR SILVER LEAF CUSTOM NAME/ WORD NECKLACES

Any word or name cut and engraved in solid walnut wood with real gold or silver leaf and 28" long beaded neck chain in black or white. Authenticity guaranteed with the Esoteric London logo back engraving and etched tag. Awesomely presented in custom packaging. Made in the UK by Esoteric London.
WOOD WITH REAL SILVER OR GOLD CUSTOM WORD EARRINGS

Spell it out with up to 9 letters of your own choosing. Engraved walnut wood earrings with real gold or real silver leaf. Ear wires are gold plated surgical steel or sterling silver. Authenticity guaranteed with the Esoteric London logo engraving on the reverse side. Ready to gift in beautifully presented custom packaging. Measures 2.5cm wide, length varies. Made in the UK by Esoteric London.
INITIAL LETTER NECKLACE

Any letter cut and engraved in solid walnut wood with real gold or silver leaf, available in three sizes with four neck chain options.
Small - 4.5cm tall
Medium - 6cm tall
Large - 7.5cm tall
28" long beaded neck chain in black 
28" long beaded neck chain in white
16" silver plated snake chain
16" gold plated snake chain
Authenticity guaranteed with the Esoteric London logo back engraving and etched tag. Awesomely presented in custom packaging. Made in the UK by Esoteric London.
HAND PAINTED ESOTERIC LONDON LOGO NECK CHAIN

Show us some love with an oversized hand painted logo with real gold leaf detailing and 28" long beaded neck chain in black. Authenticity guaranteed with the Esoteric London logo back engraving and etched tag. Awesomely presented in custom packaging. Made in the UK by Esoteric London.
Where the money is going..
You will be supporting a new British brand with a conscience.
The proceeds from this will go towards..

Material costs for products
Manufacturing costs
Printing and packaging
Shipping your pieces to you
Sampling the next collection
Risks & Challenges
The biggest challenge will be parting with these awesome pieces once we have crafted them for you!
After that, the usual suspects are..
1. Production delays - We have forged a great relationship with our suppliers due to their reliability in the past but we do have fall back options just in case the need arises.
2. Quality control - As each piece is assembled by hand and tested by a member of Esoteric here in the UK we can guarantee the quality of our products.
3. Money problems - We have already researched and negotiated material and manufacture costs and can confirm that these funds will be enough to produce the collection.
4. Delivery time - We work efficiently and have allowed plenty of time to create the pieces for the estimated delivery date. If we surpass our funding goal we have amazing potential staff members lined up ready to join the Esoteric production team to ensure the larger number of pieces are manufactured to the high Esoteric standards in a timely manner.
FAQ:
1) When can I expect to receive my stash?
Once the funding campaign ends all orders will be started immediately. As each item is custom and materials need to be ordered we expect this to be completed within 2-3 weeks. If you live within the UK, shipping will take a further 2-5 days (slightly longer for international deliveries).
2) How do I choose my designs?
When the campaign ends we will contact everyone for details and personalisation info.
3) Do you ship internationally?
Yes! We are based in London, UK but will ship anywhere in the world (just pay a small extra amount to cover the extra shipping costs).
4) What happens if the goal isnt reached?
Should our goal not be met, all orders will of course be honoured
and finally..
A MASSIVE THANK YOU!
..for taking the time to check out our project!
OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP..
If you can't fund this project but you want to help, please spread the word far and wide so that we can get enough interest and funding to proceed.
Send your friends a link to this page and encourage them to follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram:
http://www.facebook.com/WeAreEsotericLondon
http://www.twitter.com/esotericLDN
http://www.instagram.com/esotericLDN

story:
With effective protection technology and functionality embodied into an unusual design, we unleashed the potential of one of the essential features of our everyday bags - security.

Nowadays urban people face a lot of different and sometimes unfortunate occasions which may affect a safety of their belongings and their own physical health. A lot of us can relate to the situations when our things got crashed or stolen. Moreover, the news on TV puts more pressure on our everyday lives. However, the problem is not that we are facing some physical or material damage, but the feelings of stress, powerlessness, and disorder, which start to pursue us from the moment it happens. This is what led us to develop WonderShell protection technology for our future backpacks.

What is it?

The WonderShell was designed for a daily use. This backpack fulfills everyday urban needs, as well as keeps your gadgets and belongings safe from thefts or external impacts, hits, falls and even the most slippery thieves. Moreover, WonderShell Backpack is so durable, that it can serve you longer than any daily bag known before. 

We believe that things surrounding us are not only serving our daily needs, but determine the way we feel and how we go through every day. We believe every person deserves to feel safe, confident and be in control of their own lives. By combining effective protection technology, functionality, and design we created a backpack that can make people look, feel and live like a Superhero.

 

First reviews of WonderShell backpack:

"Travelers or commuters who might have concerns over their personal safety when out in the world might be interested in the 'WonderShell' shell backpacks. Boasting a bulletproof design, the 'WonderShell' backpack is designed to look like the shield of a superhero that sits comfortably and stylishly on your back."

"Coming with a superhero shield shape, the WonderShell Backpack has all the space you need for your laptop, tablet, devices, and gear. In addition, the unique zipper design runs along the circumference in a hemispherical shape for an anti-theft design."

 

Do you want to spread this news?

​

For further inquiry, please contact Ivan Syrovatko  (press@thewonderdesigns.com)

 

Choose the backpack which is exactly yours!

 

 

 

 

Other ways you can support

If you really like our project there are several additional ways you can support us:

Superheroes perform better, when they work in teams - share this campaign with your friends!


 

Features

Materials

We wanted to make WonderShell Safety Backpacks accessible to the audiences who have different lifestyles, therefore we decided to provide a wide choice of materials for the exterior design.

WonderShell Backpack consists of front and back parts covered with different materials. The front part can be made of full leather, leather + fabric, fabric and sports fabric.

We use calf skin leather in black and brown colors for Leather Designs of WonderShell.

For the Fabric Designs, you can choose various options from newest collections: Dark Knight, Atlantis Celeste, and Canary Blue.

The Limited Edition comes in finest Northern Reindeer Leather. Designed especially for this campaign, Reindeer Leather is like a good wine, since you only get a limited amount each year from a certain region of the world.  

Back part always comes with a durable material, same as we use for the sport edition backpack.

Durability

The materials covering the backpack are strongly attached to the sturdy base. This way WonderShell backpack serves you longer than any daily bag known before.  

 

Antitheft Protection

You can access to WonderShell inside pockets only from a back part. Such location of zipper ensures that you have secured anti-theft protection for your belongings. Besides, due to the strong base of the backpack, the most slippery thieves would not be able even to cut their way inside your bag.

Sturdy base

The base of the backpack is made of strong fiberglass, that can withstand a huge pressure: more than 90 kg/sq.m (18.4p/sq.ft)

It keeps your gadgets protected from impacts and a wide range of accidents. And, WonderShell is so sturdy that you can use it as a small table or chair whenever necessary.

In addition, this bag can even survive while protecting you from most of the traumatic guns. We tested WonderShell with a 6 mm Flobert and different 9 mm rubber bullets. When you wear this backpack, you will always have your personal bulletproof shield around for extraordinary situations.

All gadgets inside are protected with a soft and durable foam material. So, in addition to the fiberglass shell, your belongings are protected from hitting each other or bumping into the shell.

Gabarits

The WonderShell comes in two sizes regular and small.

 

Inner Pockets

Inside you have special pockets for the gadgets, notebooks, smaller belongings and additional space for other things to fulfill your daily urban needs. Regular size version contains specially protected pockets for 13 inches laptop, iPad or another tablet, pockets for two phones and three stretchy pockets for various things, such as sunglasses, keys or your favorite pen. And of course, you will still have a room for additional things.

The smaller size version comes with 11 inches laptop pocket and looks the same.

Shoulder Straps

The shoulder straps are removable and easily exchangeable. You can change the positioning and wear the bag any way you want. Two straps, one strap and crossed straps for maximum security in case if you taking part in a sports activity or riding a bike. You can also carry it over just one shoulder.

Time-line

The prototypes were tested and are ready to be produced.  After the campaign is finished we will order materials from our suppliers. We use a Spanish calfskin leather and fabrics, Finnish Reindeer Leather, and Italian backpack straps.  Estimated maximum time of materials delivery is 45 days. Meanwhile, we will start producing fiberglass bases in Ukraine and adjust our production capacity according to a number of backpacks ordered. The production will take place in Kyiv, where our team is situated as well, therefore, we will be in full control of the production process, product’s quality and delivery. Taking this actions we strive to provide a high-quality product being shipped on time.  WonderShell will be delivered in several phases on a first come - first serve basis.  The following is our current timeline for production and delivery:

 

About us

Originally Vlady Vyshnevetskiy started his career in 2011 as a studio assistant at Paco Rabanne in Paris - and was lucky to participate in the creation of stunning relaunch of the brand's clothing line. The works of the team he was part of were especially admired, and worn by Lady Gaga for her fabulous performance at Europe Music Awards in 2011.

Through the years he continued his career as a creative director for various brands and studios and helped develop and grow fashion businesses in Ukraine. He determined that fashion design must be practical, but that functionality must prevail or at least be equal to a product's appearance. Therefore, in July 2016 he decided to launch his own brand called Wonder Designs and started to work on the WonderShell technology as a first project. By winter, together with his new business partner Ivan Syrovatko, the mission for the brand was chosen: The team of Wonder Designs strives to AWAKEN HIDDEN POTENTIALS BY BRINGING SOLUTIONS PEOPLE HAVE NEVER THOUGHT OF BEFORE. WonderShell Backpack is a first step on the way to achieving that mission!

Get in touch

We will happy to answer your questions and get your feedbacks!

Customer support: info@thewonderdesigns.com

The Wonder Designs story just begins, subscribe to our newsletter.

Follow us as there will be new adventures to come!

story:
Founded in 2019, HappieWatch makes unique, artistic timepieces that perfectly combine craftsmanship and creativity. 

Our collection features hand-assembled 3D dials with unique designs, sapphire crystal, hand-polished case and premium-grade Japanese quartz movements. It takes years to perfect a watch this good.

HappieWatch is a watch for the unique and stylish, making you stand out from the crowd. It is the perfect ice breaker and conversation starter. It demands attention.

 

Our signature collection, the FunnyFace product line presents time in a unique way, with the left eye indicating the hour and the right eye indicating minute.

We collaborate with talented fashion and graphic designers, as well as graffiti and tattoo artists from across the world, to bring you a whole range of one-of-a-kind designs.

 

Your HappieWatch compliments any style. Brighten your formal outfit with diverse colors, or match a darker strap to create a classic look. It's the perfect addition to your everyday style!

 

 

To achieve jewelry-like cameo effect and complex textures, each dial is hand-polished and assembled, from numerous individually produced metal parts, by seasoned watchmakers.

The manufacturing processes are so painstakingly precise and time-consuming that we only produce limited pieces for each edition.

 

 

Each design is a limited edition, no two collections are ever the same. Once sold out, the design will never be restocked. Exclusivity and uniqueness are guaranteed.

 

 

Our watch cases are hand-polished to the highest grade, coupled with thickened sapphire crystal to give it a jewelry-like finish.

 

 

Each watch is installed with premium-grade dual Japanese quartz movements.  To further enhance accuracy, we lightly modified Japanese quartz movements to adapt them to our proprietary lightweight aluminum eye structures.

 

 

The manufacturing process of HappieWatch is complicated and time-consuming, especially with the dials. Each dial is composed of numerous different metal components (e.g. nose, eyebrows etc.) that are individually manufactured, hand-colored and hand-assembled.

Seasoned watchmakers finally assemble the watch and conduct multiple stringent tests (accuracy, vibration, water proof etc.) to ensure the final quality.

 

 

Straps bring the perfect twist to your watch. We offer straps in a variety of materials and colors. They’re simple to remove and swap by hand with the quick-release switches.

Each watch set comes with two curated straps, including one vegan leather strap and one NATO nylon strap.

Metal straps are available for purchase separately.

story:
What is AotC?

For anyone who's late joining the party The Art of the Con is a project J and I have been working on and building up to for a couple years now. Our official launch and grand opening was VegasCon this year, but we have so many plans for expansion throughout 2019.

Who are Thrsday and J?

We're 2 best friends who have booming social lives - complete with parties, perks, and an over abundance of karaoke, exhaustive travel itineraries and attractive bearded men - all the things one might wish for, but only 13 weekends out of the year.

During our many journeys back and forth across the country we've had so many ideas (mostly jokes we'd like to put on tshirts) and with over 50 cons between us we've learned a thing or two. AotC is us taking that experience and making it an experience for anyone to join in on. 

 

Phase II

Our grand opening at VegasCon 2019 was a great success and a huge learning experience. We have so many plans moving forward and into our next con, but there's products we'd like to expand to offer and equipment we need to get and after careful examination we just can't do that on our own. We started this off buttons and buttons alone and we're going forward with more button designs than ever, but we have so many ideas for stickers, tshirts, enamel pins, and a broader range of services to offer in addition to the cosplay rescue and other at con features that are in progress.

Perks & Funding Goals

We tried to offer a variety of perk options and will be adding more as the campaign continues as we reach milestones. New button designs will be released every other hundred hit and we'll start adding new sticker designs around $400, tshirts at $500. If we go past our goal of $1,000 we'll be launching ArtofCons.Com with a full web shop, commissions blog, and more.

This is our first time doing any major crowdfunding so we're not sure what to expect, we'll be doing this as flexibly as possible and however much or little is raised will go toward a variety of goals. Only some of which we've outlined here, in part to have some surprises in store, the other part is we're still discovering what we're capable of. Anyone who knows me though, knows I can take twenty bucks and a shoe string and turn it into something magical. I can do much more with a couple thousand dollars. 

 

The what? The why? And the where?

The more cons I do the more I notice things that would improve the overall experience, things that are missing, and more ways I could help people. We already rolled out Cosplay Rescue, and have started prop rentals on a small scale, but I would love to offer a wide variety of services at conventions. I want to expand our prop offerings, organize the operation, and print proper signage explaining all of these things. In addition to what we can do for con goers this campaign, if successful will enable us to open our inventory up to include many products (most notably tshirts) that have been difficult for us thus far. Though we've only had the table active at one convention we have plans that have been in the works for years and hundreds of designs ready to be rolled out.  We're hoping to bring a lot more to the table (both literally and figuratively) in Dallas and if things continue going well you will definitely be seeing us at a few more cons this year.

 

This is the part where Indiegogo tells us to talk about Risks & Challenges

Can I just make a 'Risks and Challenges' song ala the old 'Rules and Regulations' bit?

What qualifies us to overcome hurdles? I think our track record pretty effectively shows how well we stand up to challenges and are willing to take risks. Every step of this process has been discovering new hurdles and working our way around them. Often times we have found our way through with the support and love of our friends and the fandom at large. Each con we learn something new, another mistake to avoid, and we've been thinking this campaign through for roughly a year. That's not to say that means there won't be any hiccups, but if there are I probably already have a 15 point plan for it in my Bullet Journal.

 

Even if you can't donate...

Please help us spread the word by sharing the campaign and telling your friends

That's not to say that means there won't be any hiccups, but if there are I probably already have a 15 point plan for it in my Bullet Journal.
 

Even if you can't donate...
Please help us spread the word by sharing the campaign and telling your friends

story:
NECK PILLOW:

Built-in inflatable neck pillow, which can be easily tucked inside the hood of our jackets. Our proprietary innovative valve technology allows 2 SECOND INFLATION

Simple and easy - ONE PRESS DEFLATION

EYE MASK:

You'll always have an eye mask when you need it. Travel eye mask built inside the hood

GLOVES:

Built-in gloves that easily slide in and out of the sleeves, to keep you warm and cozy when you are on the go

TRAVEL FOOTREST:

Inflatable Travel Footrest that comes with the jacket in a dedicated pocket. Our Travel Footrests come with our proprietary innovative valve technology that allows QUICK INFLATION and easy ONE PRESS DEFLATION

TRAVEL BLANKET:

Our Travel Blanket is super lightweight but warm enough to keep you cozy during all your travels. It can be folded and stored in a pocket

TRAVEL BOTTLE:

Ever found yourself thirsty on long flights? and desperately waiting for the stewardess to start serving water? Well, not anymore! Our jacket comes with a foldable BauBax Travel Bottle that can be stored in a pocket or hung on your trouser belt loops using the carabiner

 

EARPLUGS:

A pair of Passive noise-reducing earplugs come with all our jackets in its dedicated pocket

APPLE PENCIL POCKET:

Now you can always carry your Apple pencil or a regular pen with a dedicated pocket for it

AIRPODS POCKET:

A dedicated pocket to carry Apple AirPods and other wireless earbuds will ensure you are never dumbfounded looking for your earphones

AIRPODS STRAPS:

Built-in straps to make sure you don't lose your Apple AirPods if they slip out of your ears, especially when you are listening to music while doing outdoor activities

POWER BANK POCKET:

Dedicated pocket to carry your portable battery bank/charger. This pocket is thoughtfully placed right below the phone pocket to conveniently allow charging of your phone right inside your jacket pocket

SUNGLASS POCKET:

With a dedicated sunglass pocket, easily carry your sunglasses or eyeglasses and always have them ready for you when you are on the go

MICROFIBER CLOTH:

PASSPORT POCKET:

TABLET POCKET:

RETRACTABLE KEYCHAIN:

A retractable keychain with a carabiner to ensure you not only carry your keys always but also not lose them. The two front pockets (hand warming pockets) have loops built-in to allow locking of the carabiner

BOTTLE OPENER + WHISTLE:

Beer Emergency? Not a problem! We've got you covered - Our retractable keychain also comes with a bottle opener, which is also a whistle that could come in handy in life-threatening situations or simply beer emergencies

DRINK POCKET:

PHONE POCKET:

WIRED EARPHONE HOLDER:

ZIPPER = PEN + STYLUS:

HAND WARMING POCKETS:

SECRET POCKET:

RFID proof secret pocket to carry your credit cards. The location of this pocket will be different in each style of our jacket and will be known only to the jacket owners - it's not public information ;)

DETACHABLE HOOD:

 

DOMESTIC SHIPPING - To 34 Countries:

United States, Canada, Australia, Singapore, Hong Kong, China, and 28 EU Countries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom

We've got 7 Warehouses worldwide that allow us to offer domestic shipping at highly discounted rates to the 34 countries listed above. Backers with a shipping address in any of these 34 countries will NOT have to pay any additional fees and taxes (apart from the nominal domestic shipping fees that we charge when you make your pledge here). Which means you will NOT be paying any import/customs duty, sales tax, VAT, etc. We've got everything covered.

*INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING - Rest of the World:

Backers from all other countries (Rest of the world) may have to pay additional import duties and other applicable taxes to the concerned authorities upon receipt of their goods, based on the import policies of their respective countries. The duties and tax rates vary from country to country and we are unable to help you determine that for your shipment. If you wish to learn about the duties and taxes applicable to your shipment, you may want to check with the customs and border protection authority of your country.

From our experience, we have learned that most of the countries have higher thresholds for import duties and a majority of our international customers don't get charged any additional fees apart from the regular shipping fees.

 

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS (FAQs)

How do I contact your team if I have a question?
Kindly send us a message at support@baubax.com

Do you ship worldwide?
We do ship worldwide! The countries we cannot ship to are Myanmar, Burma, Syria, and Lebanon.

How much does it cost for shipping?
Shipping costs primarily depend on two factors - the number of jackets ordered, and shipping country. Click on any available reward tier and select your "shipping destination". The shipping cost will be listed there.

How can I order a jacket NOW?
Although BauBax 2.0 will not ship until August 2018, you can purchase the first generation jacket from our website - www.baubax.com

How is BauBax 2.0 different than the original?
We have put a lot of time and effort into the improvements. We have added new features, improved the fabrics, better quality trims, better sizing, etc

How does the sizing of BAUBAX 2.0 jackets compare to the original jackets that you launched in 2015?
We have designed the new jackets to be more aligned with US sizing standards. If you are a non-US customer, simply follow our sizing chart and our jackets should fit you just fine.

Are the jackets washable or dry-clean only?
All our jackets and vest will be machine washable.

Are the jackets waterproof?
The Windbreakers will be water-repellent, and the Bombers and Vests will be water-resistant:
Water-repellent = not easily penetrated by water; provides more protection than water-resistant. 
Water-resistant = is able to provide some protection from water in smaller volumes but not 100% protection

I have your 1.0 jacket and would love to have the footrest. Will accessories be available for purchase separately?
No. The BAUBAX 2.0 accessories are not available separately for purchase.

How do I pick my style, color, pattern and size when I order my jackets or back this project?
After the campaign closes you will receive a survey. That survey will ask you to enter your exact shipping address and choose the style, color, pattern and size of jackets you would like to have (depending on the reward tier you backed). We will use that information from the survey to fulfill your request when the jackets are ready to ship.

While placing the order or backing this project, I was not asked to enter my shipping address. How will you know where to ship?
After the campaign closes, you will receive a survey. That survey will ask you to enter your exact shipping address and choose the style, color, pattern and size of jackets you would like to have (depending on the reward tier you backed). We will use that information from the survey to fulfill your request when the jackets are ready to ship.

If I choose a reward that offers more than one item - such as, 'PACK OF 2', 'PACK OF 3', etc. Will I get to choose any style?
Yes. If you pledge for a reward that offers more than one item, for example, PACK OF 2 - You will get to choose any two BAUBAX 2.0 products/styles. 
You can have the two styles to be the same or different. Example: you could order 2 Vests, or 2 Sweatshirts, 2 Windbreakers or 2 Bombers, etc. Or you could mix and match such as 1 Vest and 1 Bomber, or 1 Windbreaker and 1 Sweatshirt, and so on

Refund & Exchange Policy?

https://baubax.com/pages/returns-and-exchanges

 

If I have other questions, where should I contact?
Customer Support: support@baubax.com
Press Contact: pr@baubax.com
Sales Contact: sales@baubax.com

Thank You

story:
Our Story

Hi there! We're three students attending an entrepreneurial program at MIT out to change the way we think of fashion today. As young adults, our threads are our way of expressing ourselves at first glance, but our clothes today are just a reflection of some designer after being diluted by department stores. We're frustrated by the lack of creativity in stores and excited to tap into the potential of aspiring designers worldwide. By supporting our campaign, you can help us put the power of fashion back in the hands of the people.

Our Mission

Fashion is an great area for outpourings of creative energy and personal empowerment. So we started CollabWear. CollabWear is an online platform where designers can post their sketches, and members of the community can pre-order the garments. If a design gains enough pre-orders within a time frame, we send it off to be manufactured, and ship out the produced designs. We then take a commission off the profits, and give the rest to the designer. They’ve realized their design and the consumer takes home a product that expresses their individuality.


Our Product

CollabWear is a platform for emerging designers to make their visions materialize in the market, as well as for fashionable customers to be able to choose the newest fashion trends at ease.
What's Next?

We've already forged some great relationships with the manufacturers we plan on working with. We're in the midst of contacting design schools to alert their students of opportunity we provide. Our next steps are to curate the designs we receive and post them to our site to make them available for pre-orders. 

Our Agenda

In order to pursue our idea, we need $10,000. Of this amount, we'll use $9,000 to hire a website developer to build our website to provide the best user experience possible and add features essential to maintaining the creative integrity of our users. The remaining $1,000 we will use to produce our initial designs with our manufacturers and market our platform to build a large design community.

The Perks

For contributing to our campaign, we'll send you some awesome rewards, including a trip to New York with a VIP Tour of the Metropolitan Museum of Art and the chance to attend a ticketed talk by Alina Cho. We'll also send you some great CollabWear merchandise (t-shirt, stickers, sketchbooks) and handwritten notes stamped with our eternal gratitude. 

The Laptop Sticker:


The T-Shirt: This limited edition t-shirt is available in a crew neck and a v-neck. If you donate you can get one too!



A Peek into the Big Apple - If you donate $5,000, we'll treat you to a trip to New York City, one of the largest fashion capitals in the world. Not only will food and hotel costs be included, but we will also take you on a VIP tour of the Metropolitan Museum of Art. We'll also attend a ticketed talk by Alina Cho, a fashion journalist, and a guest designer.


Meet Us

Sakthi Vetrivel is a rising senior at the Overlake School. Since she first started building with Legos, she has developed her school's first engineering club, and now coaches students in physics and essay writing. In her downtime, she advocates for women pursuing STEM careers and plays volleyball year-round.

Sachi Belani is a rising senior at the Biotechnology High School in New Jersey. Business has always been her passion, along with dance, singing, and public speaking. She has also had great experiences of starting her own jewelry business and interning at a start-up in New York.

Sam Meyers is a rising senior from Milwaukee, WI. He is the founder of a music promotion platform. In addition he is the artist manager and social media manager at Bonerizing Records. When he isn't busy with these things, he runs his own apparel line and works as a marketing/social media consultant for large corporations. In his free time, he produces EDM music, plays tennis competitively, and plays piano.

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can donate. If you're interesting in helping, we're currently accepting design submissions at info@collabwear.com. 
If you're a designer yourself or know a few, tell them about us! The more designs we receive, the faster we can turn the fashion industry upside down. 
If you're excited to pre-order some of our initial designs, let your friends know how awesome we are. Every bit helps us realize our dream.

story:
I am Laurent, a French entrepreneur dreaming about a world where glasses truly express all sides of your creativity, each pair corresponding to your inner fashion impulse of the moment. And without breaking the bank! That’s why I created Nogs, a fully modular glasses that you can rebuild in seconds, and differently every day. 

Today, I need your support to bring Nogs to the next level and help it become your fashion accessory, too!

 

You don't feel like one of those guys? Don't worry, Nogs is for you too, as long as you like having fun with fashion accessories ;-).

 

 

2, 3 or 4 frames and lenses of your choice, NOGS case and microfiber towel.

During the campaign, you only choose the number of frames you want in your NOGS box. After the campaign, we will send you an email with access to a dedicated web page where you will be able to compose you own box!

This web page will look like that :

 
 
 
 

Nogs are fully modular glasses where the frame dismantles into 4 pieces you can mix and match to create your own style.

 

Taking apart and putting together Nogs is only a matter of seconds. No need to be an expert. and it’s as fun as Legos! And your get to play with a small tool to help you undo them.

 

Why choose between pretty and long-lasting sunglasses ? Throw them in a bag without a case, drop them on the floor: the glasses are designed to get along with whatever you will put them through.

 

Why live life in black and white only? Find your true color with Nogs range, from blush pink to bright red or mat black

 

It's no use putting on sunglasses if they don't actually protect your eyes. Nogs glasses are pretty AND efficient, certified 100% protection against UVA and UVB.

 

Nogs frames are so light, you won't even feel like you are wearing glasses: less than 12g (0.4 oz) for the frame (not including the lenses) so you can wear it all day without any discomfort.

 

We are so convinced with the reliability of our frames that we guarantee them for two years. We replace all broken parts.

 

Nogs are designed to fit every face the right way. Frames exist in "small" or "large" format.

 

 

After hundreds of prototypes, the product is fully developed and we launched a first production. We have limited stock in warehouse right now so we will be able to ship the very early birds straight after the campaign (early July). So don't wait to order if you want it for summer!

 

 

Having launched the Nogs concept in a handful of optical boutiques in Europe, we witnessed how happy our glasses made our early adopters. We used that opportunity to carefully craft every detail of Nogs design, making it as enjoyable and fun an experience as possible. Now we need your support to bring this project to the next level. By spreading the word first, and then by giving us the means to develop further new ranges, styles, accessories...

 

Thank you so much for backing our project!

 

 

(version française ci-dessous)

What is Nogs’ material? Is it durable?

The frames are made of Nylon TR90, a material specifically designed for quality glasses to be light and flexible.

How can I be sure Nogs’ lenses are good enough to protect my eyes?

Nogs lenses provide optimal protection for your eyes. They are all scratch resistant and certified for 100% protection against UVA and UVB. They also include blue blocker technology.

Are your sunglasses available with prescription lenses?

Nogs wouldn't be truly modular if you couldn't put in your own lenses! However, we don't make prescription lenses ourselves. If you bring your Nogs to an optician, though, they can make you lenses that you'll be able to swap out like any other Nogs part.

How do I choose my colors?

During the campaign, you only choose the number of frames you want in your NOGS box. After the campaign, we will send you an email with access to a dedicated web page where you will be able to compose you own box! 

Do you ship worldwide?

Yes. 

What’s next for Nogs?

Glasses for kids, or ones designed for sports, new frames, new color lenses, etc. Our heads are full of projects ready to be unleashed! But we'll always keep in mind our quality and our cheerful way of seeing the world, of course.

What is your returns policy?

Our frames are guarantee for two years. We replace all broken parts.

For anything we haven't covered in the FAQ section feel free to ask by emailing:

contact@nogs.fr — (and yes, it is a real person behind, you WILL get an answer).

_____________________________________________________________________

(french version)

En quel matériau les montures sont-elles faites ? Est-il résistant?

Les montures sont en Nylon TR90, un matériau haut de gamme utilisé pour ses propriétés en matière de résistance, de légèreté et de flexibilité.

Comment puis-je être sûr que les verres Nogs vont correctement protéger mes yeux?

Les verres Nogs fournissent une protection optimale à vos yeux. Ils sont certifiés filtrant 100% des UVA et UVB. De plus ils bloquent une grande partie de la lumière bleu.

Vos lunettes de soleil sont elles disponibles avec des verres correcteurs?

Nogs ne propose pas de verres correcteurs à la vente. Cependant toutes nos montures sont compatibles avec votre correction. Pour cela il suffit de vous rendre chez votre opticien qui adaptera vos verres comme sur une monture classique.

Quand et comment dois-je choisir les couleurs?

Pendant la campagne, vous ne choisissez que le nombre de montures que vous voulez dans votre Box (2, 3 ou 4 montures). A la fin de la campagne, vous recevrez un mail avec un accès à une page web qui vous permettra de composer votre Box!

Expédiez-vous partout dans le monde?

Oui. 

Quelle est la suite pour Nogs?

Des lunettes pour enfants, une gamme pour le sport, de nouvelles formes, de nouvelles couleurs de verres, de nouveaux accessoires, etc. Nous avons beaucoup de nouvelles idées prêtes à être développées!

Quelle est votre politique en terme de garantie?

Nous garantissons nos montures pour une durée de 2 ans. Pendant toute cette durée, nous remplaçons tout élément cassé.

Pour tout autre question à laquelle nous n'aurions pas répondu dans cette FAQ, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter par mail:

contact@nogs.fr — (et oui! il y a une vrai personne derrière qui se fera un plaisir de vous répondre).
