Nogs glasses are pretty AND efficient, certified 100% protection against UVA and UVB. Nogs frames are so light, you won't even feel like you are wearing glasses: less than 12g (0.4 oz) for the frame (not including the lenses) so you can wear it all day without any discomfort. We are so convinced with the reliability of our frames that we guarantee them for two years. We replace all broken parts. Nogs are designed to fit every face the right way. Frames exist in "small" or "large" format.  After hundreds of prototypes, the product is fully developed and we launched a first production. We have limited stock in warehouse right now so we will be able to ship the very early birds straight after the campaign (early July). So don't wait to order if you want it for summer!  Having launched the Nogs concept in a handful of optical boutiques in Europe, we witnessed how happy our glasses made our early adopters. We used that opportunity to carefully craft every detail of Nogs design, making it as enjoyable and fun an experience as possible. Now we need your support to bring this project to the next level. By spreading the word first, and then by giving us the means to develop further new ranges, styles, accessories... Thank you so much for backing our project!  (version française ci-dessous)What is Nogs’ material? Is it durable?The frames are made of Nylon TR90, a material specifically designed for quality glasses to be light and flexible.How can I be sure Nogs’ lenses are good enough to protect my eyes?Nogs lenses provide optimal protection for your eyes. They are all scratch resistant and certified for 100% protection against UVA and UVB. They also include blue blocker technology.Are your sunglasses available with prescription lenses?Nogs wouldn't be truly modular if you couldn't put in your own lenses! However, we don't make prescription lenses ourselves. If you bring your Nogs to an optician, though, they can make you lenses that you'll be able to swap out like any other Nogs part.How do I choose my colors?During the campaign, you only choose the number of frames you want in your NOGS box. After the campaign, we will send you an email with access to a dedicated web page where you will be able to compose you own box! Do you ship worldwide?Yes. What’s next for Nogs?Glasses for kids, or ones designed for sports, new frames, new color lenses, etc. Our heads are full of projects ready to be unleashed! But we'll always keep in mind our quality and our cheerful way of seeing the world, of course.What is your returns policy?Our frames are guarantee for two years. We replace all broken parts.For anything we haven't covered in the FAQ section feel free to ask by emailing:contact@nogs.fr — (and yes, it is a real person behind, you WILL get an answer)._____________________________________________________________________(french version)En quel matériau les montures sont-elles faites ? Est-il résistant?Les montures sont en Nylon TR90, un matériau haut de gamme utilisé pour ses propriétés en matière de résistance, de légèreté et de flexibilité.Comment puis-je être sûr que les verres Nogs vont correctement protéger mes yeux?Les verres Nogs fournissent une protection optimale à vos yeux. Ils sont certifiés filtrant 100% des UVA et UVB. De plus ils bloquent une grande partie de la lumière bleu.Vos lunettes de soleil sont elles disponibles avec des verres correcteurs?Nogs ne propose pas de verres correcteurs à la vente. Cependant toutes nos montures sont compatibles avec votre correction. Pour cela il suffit de vous rendre chez votre opticien qui adaptera vos verres comme sur une monture classique.Quand et comment dois-je choisir les couleurs?Pendant la campagne, vous ne choisissez que le nombre de montures que vous voulez dans votre Box (2, 3 ou 4 montures). A la fin de la campagne, vous recevrez un mail avec un accès à une page web qui vous permettra de composer votre Box!Expédiez-vous partout dans le monde?Oui. Quelle est la suite pour Nogs?Des lunettes pour enfants, une gamme pour le sport, de nouvelles formes, de nouvelles couleurs de verres, de nouveaux accessoires, etc. Nous avons beaucoup de nouvelles idées prêtes à être développées!Quelle est votre politique en terme de garantie?Nous garantissons nos montures pour une durée de 2 ans. Pendant toute cette durée, nous remplaçons tout élément cassé.Pour tout autre question à laquelle nous n'aurions pas répondu dans cette FAQ, n'hésitez pas à nous contacter par mail:contact@nogs.fr — (et oui! il y a une vrai personne derrière qui se fera un plaisir de vous répondre).

story:
The as it is Collection of eco-friendly handcrafted bags is now available on Opensky and also on our shopping portal www.asitisusa.com.  

Simple is Beautiful is the concept behind the design, with elements that we find in nature part of the theme.

The as it is brand has quickly risen to be amongst the top brands of Hong Kong.  It was chosen by the Hong Kong Trade Development Council to represent the best of Hong Kong.

The limited quantity collections are usually only found in top boutiques and gift shops in Hong Kong.  Each bag is handcrafted using natural fibers and patterns applied in a proprietary process.  No two are exactly the same.

We have chosen to go on Indiegogo to get your help to introduce the as it is Collection to the world.  In fact, we can’t wait to get our eco-friendly bags into your hands for your feedback and suggestions.  

Valentine's Day alert - we do ship by Air Mail but strongly suggest that you contribute and choose your perk before January 15th to allow time for delivery.

This campaign is unique in that there’s:

  • No waiting.  After you contribute towards a perk, you will get an unique code which you can then use on our online shop.  Your selection will be shipped out directly to you from our studio in Hong Kong within 7 days.
  • Freedom of choice.  You can choose from the latest styles in our online shop.
  • Free shipping.  The price of the perk includes shipping and handling to anywhere in the world. 

During this campaign, we will donate $2 to Autism Speaks, for every contribution (bag perk) made by you guys - until February 22, 2015.

Please take a minute to preview our collection online at www.asitisusa.com and of course we welcome all comments and suggestions.

Perks - 30% off retail  

The price of each perk includes shipping and handling to anywhere in the world.   The styles shown below are just some examples of the many choices available at our online shop.

About This Campaign

This campaign is about more than raising funds:

  • We need to get feedback to learn about the tastes and preferences of different markets.
  • Each design is handcrafted and is limited in the quantity available.
  • Even if we do not meet our goal, we will still be sending your perk within 7 business days of your selection.

Who We Are

as it is USA is the online worldwide portal for this handcrafted collection.  The as it is brand is headed by designer Mr. Ray Lam in our studio in Hong Kong, under the umbrella group of Skys Creative London Limited.  Ray's collections have been exhibited and are well received in Asia and Europe.

as it is and Skys Creative have participated in various fairs in Hong Kong and London and were well received: 

  • Pulse London
  • HK Gift and Premium Fair
  • Mega Show
  • Spring Fair International in London

Risks & Challenges

We understand and appreciate that you don't know us.  Therefore, we will eliminate your risk and any doubts with:

  • Guaranteed Fulfillment - After you contribute towards a perk, you will get an unique code which you can then use on our online shop.  Your selection will be shipped out directly to you from our studio in Hong Kong within 7 days.
  • All comments will be public and welcome - even if they are negative.
  • Email us directly at info@asitisusa.com for anything at all.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you do not want one of our handcrafted bags for yourself, perhaps it would make a great gift for someone on your special list.

We would also appreciate any comments and feedback that you have to improve our product lines, services, etc.

And please share this campaign, with the buttons below the video or the links below.

FACEBOOK Share

TWITTER Share

Thank you very much for your interest!

During this campaign, we will donate $2 to Autism Speaks, for every contribution (bag perk) made by you guys - until February 22, 2015.

story:
Rhode Island Rebellion Rugby League Membership Campaign gives you the opportunity to become part of Your team, the Rhode Island Rebellion.
Our members help us secure the financial future of YOUR team.  Support the team that has invested its time effort and funds in future of the Sport.  Since 2011 The Rebellion have partnered with the American Youth Rugby League Association (AYRLA) to develop and create the first ever youth rugby league competitions and programs in the USA.  Today the Rebellion run AYRLA programs and competitons for youth ages 11 thru 23. 

Your contribution will allow us to purchase training equipment not only for RIR but for our high school rugby league programs as well. RIR will also use the funds to purchase uniforms for the upcoming 2015 USARL season.
RIR needs you on board.  One of the exclusive benefits of becoming a member is being able to vote on things like Uniform's for the 2016 season.  

GOLD MEMBERSHIPS  $30
- RIR EXCLUSIVE MEMBER CAP

- DISCOUNT ON ALL MERCHANDISE FOR SALE IN 2015

- SEASON TICKETS

- ABILITY TO VOTE ON 2016 TEAM KIT

(2015 - MEMBERS HAT)

PLATINUM MEMBERSHIP $150

- EVERYTHING IN THE GOLD PACKAGE PLUS

- RIR ON FIELD JERSEY OF THE SIZE AND NUMBER OF YOUR DESIRE

- POLO OF THE SIZE YOU WANT 

- TRAINING TOP IN THE SIZE YOU WANT 


(JERSEY, POLO AND TRAINING TOP)

story:
Who we are

Maison d'Argent is a startup company in the jewelry and fashion accessories trade, specializing in high quality and handcrafted designs – all without intermediaries between manufacturers and consumers. The benefits of excluding intermediaries: shorter time from design to market, as well as competitive prices passed on directly to our customers. 

We are based in beautiful Stuttgart in the southwest part of Germany. This region has more to offer than Mercedes and Porsche cars, Black Forest cuckoo clocks and ham – now it also offers beautiful jewelry!

With this campaign, we want to expand our line of high quality, handcrafted jewelry in time for Christmas. To make this economically feasible, we’re working very hard to lower costs so the final product (including worldwide shipping, if needed) is available to a much wider audience. 

For the upcoming Autumn/Winter Collection, we need about US$10,000 to purchase new inventory, including (but not limited to) raw materials. We prefer to buy meaningful products made by socially responsible and ethical businesses, as opposed to bulk-sale commodities from wholesalers. 

In the event that we’re unable to reach the fundraising goal, we’ll need to adjust accordingly by reducing our purchases. Consequently, we will be unable to put together the 2014 Christmas season lineup that we’re envisioning. We’ll do our best to produce something on a smaller scale – but we’re better than that, and more importantly, our customers deserve more than that.


What you give us & what you get 

To avoid middlemen, it is absolutely necessary for us to meet directly with the producers and buy from them. Although our goal is to offer low prices to our customers, no one is giving us low prices (not even economy fares on flights), and our purchasing volumes must be high enough for reasonable rates. We’re happy to put in the time, but we need support along the way. We’re hoping you’ll help us, and we want to make sure our supporters get (through campaign perks) what our customers would get if they were see us at jewelry fairs.

Our campaign perks are some of our favorite pieces from the current Summer 2014 Collection. We believe there is something for everyone (see pictures below): materials range from wood to leather to precious stones and metals, artisanal works include handpainting, handknotting, and smithing, and pieces are individual or matched sets. Each piece is unique and lovingly created by hand. 

By supporting us, you’re helping a dedicated team of artisans who are helping other artisans. If we are not sitting at the workbench, we are at international jewelry fairs (most recently in Hong Kong and India) interacting with customers or maintaining contacts with vendors. We’re regularly inspired by taking walks in our Black Forest home.

 

The consequences 

Most consumers today are buying jewelry that is bought and sold many times by many middlemen before reaching the final owner. Even if individuality and artistry remain intact, the prices do not reflect the value of the product (nor does all the money go to its producer).

We want to put an end to that industrial commodity cycle and deliver unique jewelry directly to the consumer without the use of intermediaries. We’re committed to our concept, design, and manufacturing process for the simple (and undervalued) reason that people deserve high-quality jewelry without inflated pricing.


Risks & Challenges 

We are a young company (technically a startup), but we are not new to the market. We’ve done our research. We have our designs. We’ve been building relationships for many years, and we know exactly who to go to for what.

The countdown until Christmas is fast approaching, and we need to act now in order to be able to launch a new, extensive product line to our customers in time. We’ve thought things through till the final moment when a customer can open their Christmas gift, so our timetables include shipping times and fees. The faster we can meet our campaign goal, the surer the reality that someone somewhere will receiving the perfect Christmas present!


Other ways you can help 

If you would like to support our campaign (just not financially), please help us spread the word about our campaign. It is just as valuable as donations or purchases! Use any of the social media sharing buttons below (or at the top of the page), and feel free to leave us an encouraging comment!


Handcrafted Dolphin Earrings


Handcrafted Dolphin Pendant with Necklace

Handcrafted Coral Mosaic Pendant with Necklace

Handcrafted Mother of Pearl Pendant with Necklace

Handcrafted .925 Sterling Silver Ear Studs with Raw Emerald

Handcrafted .925 Sterling Silver Ear Studs with Sapphire

Handcrafted Ring .925 Sterling Silver and 18K Gold

Handcrafted Ring .925 Sterling Silver with Champagne Diamond

story:
Hello PPL :)

                                                            *               *     *          

                                                                 *     *              *       *       

Youdhood? is a warm colorful hood which you can also wear around the neck with the hood down.


These hoods are seriously snug and look great with just a jumper and also may be additional accessory to your everyday clothing.
The outside is covered in a colorful waterproof vinyl and the inside is lined with a fluffy minky fabric.

One size, fits all.

The idea was born in my head two years ago.

I reused a beautiful but not usable hoodie and cut off its hood.

That day the "Youdhood?" was born :)

After I wore it the whole autmn-winter-spring season, I realized just how practical this hood really is.

It can be excellently combined with sweater or regular T-shirt.

Transformed into a scarf, Youdhood? is a very nice and warm accessorize too.

Inside is furred with fluffy minky fabric to keep your head warm and external fabric is waterproof vinyl.

To create one Youdhood? I need a fabric that I order from California.

I would like to make my first Youdhood? collection of five different material designs.

Warm minky fabric is expensive (shipping), so I need yr help - to create four (4) Youdhood?, I need 80 $.

My goal is to make one colection of 5 different types of fabric and designs.

Youdhood? packing

Your contributions will enable me to launch the production, to finance necessary developments, constitute a first stock.

Youdhood? Logo Coffee mug Design

All Youdhood? items are made with love and care from Croatia. <3


Thank you for stopping by ♥
Deli.

* * *

ABOUT me

Hy PPL!

I'm Deli and I'm dreaming about Youdhood? every night :)

I love colours and DIY projects, playing piano, dance Tribal Fusion, photography, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator and Longboard.

I love to change things / objects or change their purpose, to see them in a different light, color, form, meaning ... which is also reflected on myself.

That way I'm learning a lot about myself and I try to hold a "condition" of change. :)

<3 feel free to LIKE my FB Page - https://www.facebook.com/youdhood

<3 Feel free to contact me https://www.facebook.com/DelysidEllise
                http://www.inspirationforcreation.net/2015/03/2...

story:
WHO ARE WE?

We are two passionate Industrial Designers, who have an interest in unique watches.  Outside of our normal jobs in the design industry in Sydney, Australia we spend time coming up with new ideas and designs. Our dedication and passion to the subject is why we are here. 

As Industrial designers, we love product design. Unfortunately many of our ideas do not go any further from a simple sketch on a napkin. With Indiegogo we now have this opportunity to present our ideas, albeit refined and ready for the next stage in the design process.

You the contributors will get our ideas of the ground. You alone will allow us to achieve our goals of making our ideas functional and accessible to the wider audience. In-turn providing you with the opportunity to own some of our great product ideas.

WHAT ARE WE DESIGNING?

Our first project is a minimalist wrist watch named ‘Uno’. After months of sketching, deliberating, CAD modelling and some frustrations, we have arrived at what we believe is something unique and worthy of manufacturing.

We have a particular interest in the oversized watch industry. These watches speak form. We have followed through with a large form factor, which blends minimalism, with a shape that is unique yet subtle-that can be enjoyed by a wider audience

In addition we have envisioned the watch in high quality materials, with a great quality finish and interesting colour combinations.

Ultimately our goal is to bring this piece to market at a costs that can make it affordable to anyone. 

We hope to have the production watch offered in the colours below:

Colour variations



Final conceptual packaging (white face with black hands and red seconds hand)


WHY DO WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT?

By backing the first stage of our project we will be able to fully analyse and test a working prototype that will lead to a product that we will be able to produce in a limited production run; at a reasonable and attractive cost to you via a second crowd funding campaign.

The more money we can raise for a prototype the more we can spend on refining manufacturing and testing different materials for the overall finish, as well as offering all colour configurations in production. We can also drive the cost of the final unit down by getting an idea of final quantities through the funding of this campaign.

Funding Allocation

USD 2500 2 x Rapid Prototypes (CNC Milled )- Bezel/Case, Crown,Case Back, Hinge Assembly, Band Lug, Clasp

USD 150 Movement Sourcing and Testing

USD 300 Rapid Prototyping of 2x Bands 

USD 200 Rapid Prototyping of 2x Crystals

USD 150 Rapid Prototyping of 2x Hands Sets

USD 500 Testing Costs

USD 200 Shipping Costs

10% of the funding amount is taken by fees, (Paypal, Indiegogo, and Bank Transfer Fees)

Total Costs

USD 4000 Prototype and Testing Costs for two prototypes

USD 1000 Estimated Funding Net Fees


Exploded view showing variation of parts. We need your support to build 2 of these units for testing!


HOW CAN YOU HELP?

Please make a donation, and spread the word!

Everything helps, even if you cannot donate-spreading the word and sending out links to this page will help us out and help us reach our ultimate goal.

*Images are for illustration purposes only, final textures, colours and finishes may differ slightly.

*Band design may not be final.


FAQ

Q: How Can I Get a ‘Uno’ watch?

A: By contributing to the production crowd funding campaign. This will be launched after this campaign has ended and we have developed the prototype to the point where we can go into production.

Q: Do i need to contribute to this campaign to receive the watch during the production campaign?

A: No, you do not. Contributing $10 now will place you on a shortlist for first shipments. It is not required to participate in the production campaign.

Q: Does being on priority for shipping guarantee i will receive a watch?

A: No, it does not. Being on a priority shipping list only guarantees shipment if the production campaign is funded successfully.

Q: When will the shipment of the watch occur?

A: The time-frame for the first shipment of the 'Uno' watch is approximately January 2014. 

Q: When will the production campaign launch?

A: We want the watch to go into production within 6-8 weeks of completion of the first campaign. Participants of the first campaign will be notified constantly on production updates and expected delivery dates.

Q: How much will the 'Uno' watch be in the production campaign?

A: We want this watch to be affordable for all. We expect the price to come in at below $150, however it may even be lower subject to the number ordered in the production campaign. 

Q: Is shipping available to Europe and America for the production watch?

A: Yes.
story_txt:
WHO
ARE WE?


We are two passionate Industrial
Designers, who have an interest in unique watches.  Outside of our normal jobs in the design
industry in Sydney, Australia we spend time coming up with new ideas and designs. Our dedication and passion to the subject is why we are here. 
As Industrial designers, we love
product design. Unfortunately many of our ideas do not go any further from a simple
sketch on a napkin. With Indiegogo we now have this opportunity to present our
ideas, albeit refined and ready for the next stage in the design process.
You the contributors will get our
ideas of the ground. You alone will allow us to achieve our goals of making our
ideas functional and accessible to the wider audience. In-turn providing you
with the opportunity to own some of our great product ideas.
WHAT
ARE WE DESIGNING?
Our first
project is a minimalist wrist watch named ‘Uno’. After
months of sketching, deliberating, CAD modelling and some frustrations, we have
arrived at what we believe is something unique and worthy of manufacturing.
We have a particular interest in the
oversized watch industry. These watches speak form. We have followed through
with a large form factor, which blends minimalism, with a shape that is unique
yet subtle-that can be enjoyed by a wider audience
In addition we have envisioned the watch
in high quality materials, with a great quality finish and interesting colour
combinations.
Ultimately our goal is to bring this
piece to market at a costs that can make it affordable to anyone. 
We hope to have the production watch offered in the colours below:


Colour variations
















Final conceptual packaging (white face with black hands and red seconds hand)

WHY
DO WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT?
By backing the first stage of our
project we will be able to fully analyse and test a working prototype that will
lead to a product that we will be able to produce in a limited production run;
at a reasonable and attractive cost to you via a second crowd funding campaign.
The more money we can raise for a
prototype the more we can spend on refining manufacturing and testing different
materials for the overall finish, as well as offering all colour configurations
in production. We can also drive the cost of the final unit down by getting an idea of final quantities through the funding of this campaign.
Funding Allocation
USD 2500 2 x Rapid Prototypes (CNC
Milled )- Bezel/Case, Crown,Case Back, Hinge Assembly, Band Lug, Clasp
USD 150 Movement Sourcing and Testing
USD 300 Rapid Prototyping of 2x
Bands

USD 150 Rapid Prototyping of 2x Hands
Sets

story:
Short fakE. Summary

So fakE. is a luxury lifestyle apparel brand for women. Based out of LA, we make silk tee-shirts with simple designs that drape and highlight the female body. fakE. brands the lifestyles of countless women and flirts with the facades they put up just to make it through the day. 

  • a lifestyle brand
  • simple, luxurious, sexy, feminine, authentic
  • everything is fakE.

We bootstrapped the production of our demos, put together a lookbook and catalogue. And now we are ready to move into the pre-production stage of manufacturing our first collection.

What We Need

Pre-production includes:

    • Transforming our actual shirts into digital patterns
    • Creating samples against those digital patterns
    • Fitting/modifying the shirts
    • Sourcing bulk materials
    • Sourcing the manufacturer and screen printer
    • Creating line sheets for potential wholesale buyers

The Impact

When we are ready for production, we'll be able to produce orders as they come in. This campaign is essentially a boost up to level ground. Your investment helps make that possible, and we appreciate you.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, no biggie. But that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • like us on facebook
  • follow us on twitter
  • re-post our photos on instagram
  • check us out on vimeo
  • pin something from our pinterest

fakE. love, always. xxoo

story:
Short Summary

Hello there!

I first want to thank you for checking out my project. It means a lot to even check out the page. Second, i would like to tell you a little about this project aside from the video above.

This project is my passion; it’s what I want as my career. Before college and high school, I had a thing for the arts. Design runs through me, I love to design! Anything and everything. When it started to come down to it, I had to eventually narrow it down to something. I narrowed it down to fashion design. Right now I am very much focused on fashion. I love to design clothing, women wear to be exact. I have my sketchbook full of fashion doodles and little notes and my dream and goal was to have those designs brought to life. My dreams become my goals, and my goals are my dreams. When that happens, I try every which way to achieve it or at least try to achieve it. I want to share my passion for fashion  to the world. Owning my own fashion line would mean the world to me, and if you could make that happen. well, let's just say karma will reward you as well as i am too. I know each of you have at least one thing that means the world to you. Whether it be family, a soul-mate, a goal, or a dream. I’m just asking you, to reach out a hand and help make my dream come true.

What We Need & What You Get

What your money, every penny, will do is to help me complete the first steps of creating a line. Your money, weather i make my goal, go over, or fall short,  will go toward creating my designs. Having them come to life. The amount of money i raise here on this project profile will define how many designs i can actual get made and brought to life. i will also have a professional portfolio created in time, so i can show all the designs to manufactures, buyers, & stores. so i wont have just one location that you can buy my designs at...
 
Every gift of money desereves a reward. so i have presented a few gifts to all the donaters & backers. as these are just the beginning steps of creating the line, i am limited to what i can give as a reward. depending on your donation amount, you are able to get a thank you from me in a form of online, in a video, in a handmade card written and designed by me, a photo print of one of the designs from the line, or a beautiful bracelet thats designed by me and handmade by a local artist.
 
...and believe me, the bracelet is SO worth the donating! i actually kind of want one for myself, haha.

The Impact

My designs are meant to compliment the woman's body as well as give her a great sense of style and class. My designs are primarily for the sophisticated and classy type of women (i am at the moment, working on designs for a line for young females). EVERY FEMALE SHOULD FEEL SEXY! Sexy in my book means knowing what fits & compliments your body and showing off the right curves and not the wrong ones. More skin shown isn't the sexy you should aim for, if you want to be taken seriously as well as attract the right type of guys, you should show the right curves and cover the right amount. Less is not always more.

Other Ways You Can Help

I hope you take the time to consider donating to my project, it will really mean a lot to me! if you can't donate, do not worry! just share about this and spread the word! the more people that know about this, the better. if you have any comments, concerns, or questions, please DO NOT hesitate to ask! i will be glad to answer your questions and hear your comments!

Thank you once again for taking the time to read this, i do appreciate it from the bottom of my heart. Truly, i do.

Cheers to you all.

Cheers to you all.

story:
imprint Hat Co. is the collaborative effort of a large number of young entrepreneurs and activists from all over the United States and Canada. 

We came together through a simple but aggressive combined mission:  take on world epidemics one by one using the power of social media and e-commerce. Our first goal: wipe out world hunger within our lifetimes. 

We started with this mission and built our entire team and brand around it. We chose fashion as our medium, but it is our message that is important.

We make sleek, high quality hats to compliment any outfit. The best part is, thanks to your contribution, the lives of hungry children all over the world will be drastically changed forever. 

Through this campaign alone, we have the power to change tens of thousands of children's lives, along with their families and communities, giving them their right to a basic necessity of life. 


Our high-quality snapback hats are made from a premium 20% wool / 80% acrylic blend that offers the consumer durability, breathability, and a perfect combination of style and comfort.

These aren't gift shop hats - they're made to last.



imprint Hat Co. began as a passion project by just a few friends with a united vision.

Our idea was to create a new, sustainable business model that could spark change and create a real, lasting impact on the world. 

The problem: 

1) There are a lot of non-profit organizations around the globe doing a lot of good; however, most of them rely on external donations and funding/grants in order to remain sustainable. 

2) There are also a lot of good for-profit companies that make quality products that people want. Some give back a portion of what they earn, but for the most part, they are still driven to make profits for their owners/shareholders.

Our solution: 

Combine the two models. Find individuals who: 1) Share the same passion, and 2) Don't need profit as an incentive. 


With that, sprung imprint. A self-sustainable, not-for-profit company aimed at taking on world epidemics one by one. 

Our model caught fire and has now become a collaboration of a large number of young entrepreneurs, artists, activists, college students and athletes from all over the United States and Canada. 

We hope that you will join us on our mission. 




We wanted the message to be as simple as possible. 100% of the profits from each product sold will go toward fighting world hunger head on, in developing nations as well as right here at home. 

We have partnered with organizations like One Day's Wages as well as numerous shelters and food banks in local regions all around the United States and Canada to fulfill our mission. 

Local:  50% of all profits will go toward feeding a hungry child through our closest local partner to where the hat was sold.

World:  the other 50% of profits from each hat will go to our partner, One Day's Wages, to help feed a hungry child in a developing nation, benefiting their families and communities.



FAQ

1) I picked out my perk, how do I select which hat design I want?

With all of our perks, we will contact you via email prior to us shipping your order to confirm all of the details and allow you to choose the exact design/style you want us to ship! 

2) Is International Shipping available?

Absolutely! Pick out and order the perk you would like and we will contact you prior to shipping out your order to confirm your details and update you on the shipping charge. The more orders we get to each country, the less expensive it will be for us to ship to you :) 

3) My question isn't answered here, how do I ask?

Please feel free to email us any questions to: info@makeyourimprint.com


Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? -  that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Share our campaign video / indiegogo page with your friend on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and SnapChat
  • Tag us, follow us @MakeYourImprint on all of your favourite social channels as well using the hashtag #MakeYourImprint to help us follow you as well!
Help us spread the word and make lasting change in this World! Who knows, maybe we'll surprise you with some gifts just for helping us spread the word ;)

story:
NEW PHOTOS!


Lick My Sack©? WTF!?

Tasty looking backpacks you'd love to eat. What'd you think it meant? We here at Lick My Sack© love street culture, from art, to skateboarding, to fashion. What started out as a fun idea to create some funky ass backpacks for ourselves, has turned into an amazing opportunity to provide a fully customizable product for you to convey your individual personality.

What makes these backpacks special?

You're in control. Just like your favourite buffet or ice cream bar, you can make it the way you like it. We provide the ingredients and you choose what goes in.


We have worked our butts off to get our website up and running, designs completed and we now offer:



What We Need

We have big plans for Lick My Sack©. We can expand our menu to include BURGERS, NACHOS, PIZZA...the opportunities are endless. By simply adding 1 ingredient to an existing food item, we create a whole new range of possibilities for customers.
Our plan is to expand beyond selling online and to introduce Lick My Sack© Kiosks. These kiosks will allow visitors to the hottest street wear stores to build their backpack, order and pay right there in-store.

This is our marketing initiative to appeal to those we may not have reached online and to give ourselves a physical and interactive presence as well.


Why $4,000?

After expenses including: Indiegogo fees, PayPal fees & manufacturing, the profits will be put towards the creation of our first kiosk. This first kiosk will allow us to provide demonstrations for interested street wear stores, as well as being used for marketing and promotional purposes. See our budget breakdown of the profits to see how this will all come together.


What if we exceed $4,000?

That would be bloody fantastic. Below is a breakdown of what we can achieve at different levels if the campaign was to be more successful than anticipated. It's important to remember that the figures below are before expenses.


What if you don't hit the target?
If we can't reach our $4,000 target, we will still be able to use whatever money raised for marketing at a smaller scale. At the very least, we would have (with your help) spread the word of Lick My Sack© and have made a start towards getting our first kiosk.

What You Get

$1  Perk - So Much Thanks

A simple and great way to show your support if you're not in a position to contribute more. You have our thanks and plenty of hi-fives when we see you.

$5  Perk - Super Thank You

A simple and great way to show your support if you're not in a position to contribute more. We'll send you a sticker for your efforts in addition to hi-fives.
*includes delivery

$15 Perk - Lick My Sticker Pack
Get a pack of Lick My Sack© stickers to slap onto whatever you deem worthy.

* includes delivery

$20 Perk - Delicious Discount

In addition to the 'Lick My Sticker Pack' you also get a 20% discount voucher to use on any Lick My Sack© purchase once our store is open. A digital store code will be emailed to you.
* includes delivery

$50 Perk - Lick My Shirt

In addition to the 'Lick My Sticker Pack' and 'Delicious Discount', we'll be sending you an exclusive Lick My Sack© t-shirt.
* includes delivery

$100 Perk - Lick My Backpack

CONGRATULATIONS! You will be one of the first people to sport one of these dope and unique Lick My Sack© backpacks. You'll get early access to our website to design your bag and then we'll take care of the rest.
* delivery NOT included

$190 Perk - Lick Both Sacks

CONGRATULATIONS! You're twice as tasty. You will be one of the first people to have not one, but two of these dope and unique Lick My Sack© backpacks. You'll get early access to our website to design your bag and then we'll take care of the rest.
* delivery NOT included

$450 Perk - Big Dog Big Sack

In addition to the 'Delicious Discount', you get 5 x Lick My Sack© Backpacks made exactly the way you want them at a massive discount. You'll get early access to our website to design your bags and then we'll take care of the rest.

* delivery NOT included
IMPORTANT: DELIVERY NOTE & DELIVERY DATES
Please be sure to note the expected delivery dates of all perks before donating. Delivery charges for backpacks can differ greatly depending on the address they're being sent to. We've decided to exclude delivery from the Perk price so you can see the actual value of the Perk itself. Delivery cost will be calculated based on your location and an invoice sent to you for payment.



Backpacks Made Fresh

Just like any good food establishment, your treat is made fresh when you order. This is a great business model for us because it means that we don't need to forecast and order bags in bulk which ultimately lowers our risk. All our expenses go towards marketing, providing a better product and better service. Sounds good doesn't it?

Bags can be ordered in 3 sizes:

            


Other Ways You Can Help

We completely understand that some people just can't contribute. If that is you then maybe you can help us by getting the word out there for us? Indiegogo provide some kick ass sharing tools so you can let everyone know about Lick My Sack and the radness we have going on here. I mean...you've read this far, we must be doing something right yeah?

Here's a sneak peek at our website:

Step 1: Choose your flavour ice cream

Step 2: Choose your sauce

Step 3: Choose your topping 

Step 4: Voila! Your tasty sack worthy of a lick

Thanks in advance for all the support!

$5  Perk - Super Thank You
A simple and great way to show your support if you're not in a position to contribute more. We'll send you a sticker for your efforts in addition to hi-fives.*includes delivery
$15 Perk - Lick My Sticker Pack

Get a pack of Lick My Sack© stickers to slap onto whatever you deem worthy.* includes delivery
$20 Perk - Delicious Discount
In addition to the 'Lick My Sticker Pack' you also get a 20% discount voucher to use on any Lick My Sack© purchase once our store is open. A digital store code will be emailed to you.* includes delivery
$50 Perk - Lick My Shirt
In addition to the 'Lick My Sticker Pack' and 'Delicious Discount', we'll be sending you an exclusive Lick My Sack© t-shirt.* includes delivery
$100 Perk - Lick My Backpack
CONGRATULATIONS! You will be one of the first people to sport one of these dope and unique Lick My Sack© backpacks. You'll get early access to our website to design your bag and then we'll take care of the rest.* delivery NOT included

$190 Perk - Lick Both Sacks
CONGRATULATIONS! You're twice as tasty. You will be one of the first people to have not one, but two of these dope and unique Lick My Sack© backpacks. You'll get early access to our website to design your bag and then we'll take care of the rest.* delivery NOT included
$450 Perk - Big Dog Big Sack

In addition to the 'Delicious Discount', you get 5 x Lick My Sack© Backpacks made exactly the way you want them at a massive discount. You'll get early access to our website to design your bags and then we'll take care of the rest.* delivery NOT included

IMPORTANT: DELIVERY NOTE & DELIVERY DATES
Please be sure to note the expected delivery dates of all perks before donating. Delivery charges for backpacks can differ greatly depending on the address they're being sent to. We've decided to exclude delivery from the Perk price so you can see the actual value of the Perk itself. Delivery cost will be calculated based on your location and an invoice sent to you for payment.

Backpacks Made Fresh
 Just like any good food establishment, your treat is made fresh when you order. This is a great business model for us because it means that we don't need to forecast and order bags in bulk which ultimately lowers our risk. All our expenses go towards marketing, providing a better product and better service. Sounds good doesn't it?Bags can be ordered in 3 sizes:
            


Other Ways You Can Help We completely understand that some people just can't contribute. If that is you then maybe you can help us by getting the word out there for us? Indiegogo provide some kick ass sharing tools so you can let everyone know about Lick My Sack and the radness we have going on here. I mean...you've read this far, we must be doing something right yeah?Here's a sneak peek at our website:
Step 1: Choose your flavour ice creamStep 2: Choose your sauceStep 3: Choose your topping Step 4: Voila! Your tasty sack worthy of a lickThanks in advance for all the support!

story:
« My first »  SlashCode scarf is an introduction to our world, same unique and beautiful designs, same packaging, same emotions, just more affordable. 

« My first » scarves will have an almost similar soft and light touch as the cashmere, silk and wool blend of the Limited Editions, but will be in a fine coton blend (the prototype pictures are in coton blend).

To resume, «  My First » scarves  : 

  • are available for the Long , Square and Rebel models
  • have the same designs
  • are in soft and light coton blend (instead of cashmere,silk and wool blend for the Long and Square one, and twill silk for the Rebel one)
  • come in the same beautiful packaging
  • are serialized
  • are non personalized
  • are non limited edition

« My first » Long One - 180 X 90 cm, in coton blend,  comes at the price of 180$ instead of 385$  for the Limited Edition. 

« My first » Square One - 100 X 100 cm, in coton blend,  comes at the price of 150$ instead of 345$  for the Limited Edition. 

« My first » Rebel One - 60 x 60 cm , in coton blend,  comes at the price of 90$  instead of 145$  for the Limited Edition.

"My First" SlashCode scarf. Same emotions. More affordable. 




SlashCode is a team of Geek Culture passionates who wants to share their love for comics, manga, Art, video games, books, movies and fashion. 

SlashCode team's personal and cultural background is fed by extraordinary stories, iconic characters, amazing worlds, insatiable curiosity and imagination. 

Geek Culture has shaped generations, moving some, inspiring others. 

SlashCode extracts the emotions, beauty and quintessence of these Geek Culture icons, rethinks them and delivers its own vision in elegant, aesthetic and Geek Chic fashion accessories. 


 

All models are imagined and designed by our in house designers, who explore different technics and Art mouvement on each model individually, making them unique and original pieces of art. 

Larger detail pictures are available in the Gallery. 

.





.






.


.



SlashCode's creative team always tries to see beyond the obvious.               Whenever we pay tribute to a particular subject we dissect and analyze it, extract it's very essence, twist it, rethink it and deliver our own vision.                                     Our designers create beautiful designs that you can wrap around your shoulders, neck or wrist, but also can display on your wall like a piece of art. 

Some will blame us for distorting some codes.                                                                     We believe in the diversity of approaches. 

It's not only about design, it's about emotions. 



We love Fashion. We love Geek Culture.         

Geek Culture, Fashion and Quality are words that are not usually brought together and common perception is that these words are antinomic and/or ill fitted. We believe in the opposite. SlashCode is a project that we have been carrying for almost a year now.                                                                                                                           It's about passion, heart and guts.                                                                                           

And we believe in bringing to you, beautiful and premium products, that will truly be Geek chic treasure chests to our beloved icons. Every single aspect of the product is carefully thought out and selected. The scarves are made of beautiful fabrics, all 100% natural fibers and custom woven just for you. 

The printing methods enhance the intricate details and colors of each designs, faithfully reproducing even the most minute details, passionately imagined and designed by the creative team. 



Remember that great and beloved T-shirt that screams your passion of Geek Culture ? Depending on what field you work in or the circumstances, it is sometimes difficult to wear it.                                                                                                             Remember also how difficult it is sometimes to find elegant and fashionable accessories that show your love of Geek Culture without compromising your sense of style ? 

At SlashCode we believe in being ourselves under any circumstances : at work, a corporate event, a concert, a romantic dinner, at a party and yes, even with your relatives ... 

You should be able to wear your passion. Anytime. Anywhere


At SlashCode, we believe in bringing you more than a product. We would like to offer you an experience. Experience of quality of course but also a trip into our universe and Geek Art. SlashCode's team loves to mix and match styles, Art mouvements and designs. We also love to hide details, play with hints and twist codes. 

See beyond the obvious and search for hidden significations, a quirky reference and our Mini Logo that is never in the same place, integrated in the design. 


Looking for the perfect Geek Chic gift for your special ones ?     

Choose the "Limited Editions" : 

  • Unique design
  • Serialized
  • Personalized to the name of the future proud owner
  • Limited editions
  • High quality fabrics
  • a beautiful packaging              

Or offer the "My first" editions : 

  • available for the Long , Square and Rebel models
  • same designs
  • in soft and light coton blend (instead of cashmere,silk and wool blend for the Long and Square one, and twill silk for the Rebel one)
  • come in the same beautiful packaging
  • are non serialized
  • are non personalized
  • are non limited edition

Same designs. Same emotions. More affordable. 

Offering one of SlashCode's models to your special ones shows that you know them and acknowledge their passion. A perfect gift with a special thought. 

.


The scarves come in beautiful and elegant boxes that you will want to keep. There will be other surprises inside the boxes, but let's not spoil all the good things right now ...

A smaller and anthracite one for the Tiny and Rebel Ones, and a charcoal one for the Square and Long Ones. 

 


.

As we are introducing the "My First" scarves category, the MOQ requested for the coton blend fabric is triggered at a lower amount. As soon as we reach 5000$ in "My First" scarves, we can request the factory to produce the fabrics and book the production slots for the printing, sewing and producing the packaging. The earlier we reach the goal, the earlier we can start to produce the "My first" coton blend fabric and start all the manufacturing process.

 

Reaching the 40 000$ goal allows us to reach the MOQ (Minimum Order Quantities) requested by the factory to produce the custom cashmere, silk and wool, and twill silk fabrics and book the production slots for the printing, sewing and producing the packaging. The earlier we reach the goal, the earlier we can start to produce the custom woven fabrics and start all the manufacturing process. 

We are committed in bringing you a great product and thus will monitor closely all the stages of production, make sure that factories deliver the best quality in timely manner. The scheduled delivery is for March 2015 as the fabrics have to be custom woven just for you, then printed and sewn, and finally send to you. 

You will be regularly updated on the progress of your scarf manufacturing and birth via small videos. 


RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The main risks are delays in the production. As we will not settle for anything else than the highest quality, delays may happen in the manufacturing process. The fabrics are delicate and require attention and care during the weaving and the printing stage. The designs are very detailed, thus the printing is a crucial part of the process in order to faithfully reproduce the colors and the most minute details. 

You will be regularly updated on the progress of your scarf manufacturing and birth via small videos and we will keep you informed if there is any delays. 

HOW CAN WE HELP YOU ? 

Like us, Share us, Spread the word. 

If you want to show your support to SlashCode, you can help us by sharing the information with your friends through FB, Twitter, Instagram ...                                  Just click on the links ! 

We will also run referral contests to give you a chance to win a free SlashCode scarf.

.



Where does your inspiration come from ?                                                                SlashCode team's personal and cultural background is fed by extraordinary stories, iconic characters, amazing worlds, insatiable curiosity and imagination. We literally grew up with Geek culture before it was acknowledged as being a real and important culture. Some of us are die hard computer geeks, others are graphic design passionates, some are Fantasy or Sci-Fi book worms, RPG and cosplay fans ... 

What categories, size scarves and fabrics do you have ?                                                                        

We have 2 categories of scarves. 

The « My First » and the « Limited Editions » scarves : 

The « My First » editions : 

  • available for the Long, Square and Rebel ones models. 
  • share the same designs
  • are in soft and light coton blend
  • come in the same beautiful packaging
  • are non serialized
  • are non personalized
  • are non limited editions

- The "My First "Long One. 180 X 90 cm (70,9 X 35,4 in) in a light and soft coton blend. 

- The " My First" Square One. 100 X 100 cm (39,37 X 39,37 in) in a light and soft coton blend.

- The " My First" Rebel One. 60 X 60 cm (23,6 X 23,6 in) in a light and soft coton blend.

For the « Limited Editions »  :

  • Serialized
  • Personalized to the name of the future proud owner
  • Limited editions
  • High quality fabrics
  • a beautiful packaging    

- The " Limited Edition" Long One. 180 X 90 cm (70,9 X 35,4 in) in a light and soft cashmere,wool and silk blend. Ideal to wrap yourself in your favorite Universe. 

- The  " Limited Edition" Square One. 120 X 120 cm (47,25 X47,25 in) in a light and soft cashmere,wool and silk blend. Timeless size of scarf, ideal and easy to match with your outfit.

- The " Limited Edition" Rebel One. 60 X 60 cm (23,6 X 23,6 in) in soft and beautiful silk Twill. This bandana-kind of size is perfect for bikers to protect from pollution and ride in style. 

- The " Limited Edition" Tiny One. 91 X 5 cm (35,8 X 1,96 in) in soft and beautiful silk Twill. Polyvalent and playful. Wrap it around your wrist, neck or your favorite bag.

What about international deliveries ?                                                                         All deliveries will be processed by DHL, registered and with a tracking number, to insure your SlashCode scarf reaches port safely.                                                               The shipping fees are offered to our Indiegogo backers.                                International backers are fully responsible for any additional customs fees in their own country. 

The scarf is a gift, can you personalize it ?                                                                            All "Limited Edition" SlashCode scarves are personalized with the handwritten name of the customer. Before packing, we will check with you the name that needs to be written on the tag : yours or your special one's. 

I do not see my favorite character/movie/comics ...?                                                 Geek Culture has so many incredible subjects that we cannot present all of them in just one collection. Although, future collections will approach different and new universes. We will also take a poll amongst the backers, to know which subject you'd like us to take the inspiration from. 

Thank you again for your support ! 

Feel free to contact us for any inquiries : indiegogo@slash-code.com

story:
Hello, my name is Robert Cekay. It has been a long time dream of mine to be an entrepreneur and to help people. Stinger Athletic Company is a clothing brand that makes it possible to wear nice cloths that are sports and athletics oriented, without making you spend outrageous amounts of money. My clothes say I'm the athletic, sport loving type and have great designs, just like the big brands. Only you don't have to trade in your car to get a new hoodie.

5,000 Dollars


  • 5,000$ I can make my first product line
  • 10,000$ My team and I can go to 3 fitness expos to promote our clothes
  • 20,000$ We can go to 6 fitness expos

Web site coming soon

  • www.StingerAthleticCompany.com is coming soon
  • FULL of 100% free fitness and nutrition advice and all the stinger Ath Co clothes you could ever want!!


Once I hit my Goal I can make these Hats available as rewards for 30$

story:
The 48-hour Flash Sale is OVER!

Start: 12:01AM GMT on June 5, 2017

End: 12:01AM GMT on June 7, 2017

dokiWatch is the world's most advanced smartwatch for kids 6 to 12 years old that's also a wearable phone and locator. It’s the first-ever 3G-enabled smartwatch for kids with video calling, voice calling, and messaging capabilities in one simple device! dokiWatch anticipates what families need in order to keep connected.

dokiWatch comes with important safety features including GPS tracking, which enables parents to know the whereabouts of their children right on their smartphone. The electronic pet, or “dokiPet”, doubles as a fitness tracker to encourage kids to stay active and healthy.  

Not all kid are ready for smartphones yet. With dokiWatch, kids can have an active childhood while parents can enjoy the security of knowing that they’re safe.

 

'Like' and 'Share' our Facebook page or 'Follow' our Instagram page now for a chance to win a FREE dokiWatch! Only 2 Lucky Winners will be selected.
story_txt:
The 48-hour Flash Sale is OVER! Start: 12:01AM GMT on June 5, 2017End: 12:01AM GMT on June 7, 2017

 
To Order Now, Please Visit www.doki.com
 

 

dokiWatch is the world's most advanced smartwatch for kids 6 to 12 years old that's also a wearable phone and locator. It’s the first-ever 3G-enabled smartwatch for kids with video calling, voice calling, and messaging capabilities in one simple device! dokiWatch anticipates what families need in order to keep connected.
dokiWatch comes with important safety features including GPS tracking, which enables parents to know the whereabouts of their children right on their smartphone. The electronic pet, or “dokiPet”, doubles as a fitness tracker to encourage kids to stay active and healthy.  
Not all kid are ready for smartphones yet. With dokiWatch, kids can have an active childhood while parents can enjoy the security of knowing that they’re safe.
 
'Like' and 'Share' our Facebook page or 'Follow' our Instagram page now for a chance to win a FREE dokiWatch! Only 2 Lucky Winners will be selected.


 


 


 




Doki Technologies & dokiWatch Press Clippings
CNBC: Smartwatch for children integrates safety, communications and fitness
Mashable: The dokiWatch is a cheery smartwatch for kids that makes video calls
Android Authority: Kickstarter project of the week: dokiWatch is “the most advanced smartwatch for kids”
Wareable: DokiWatch claims to be most advanced kid’s smartwatch

story:
Hi! We reached our funding goal within 24 hours, and are now offering the Series K452 here on Indiegogo for up to 38% less than the retail price! 

We're more than happy to address your questions, comments, and concerns; just reach out to us through the messages. 

Thanks so much! 

__

Fast Co.  •  Hypebeast  •  Design Milk  •  High Snobiety  •  Watchuseek

For complete list of press, scroll to the bottom of the page.

Watch the video in High Definition

__



Launch

On July 23, 2015 NASA publicly announced the revolutionary discovery of Kepler-452b, an exoplanet known as Earth's bigger, older cousin or "Earth 2," which orbits a star much like the sun. 

We began our second watch series with a simple idea: to combine design, typeface, and mechanism within a watch. Inspired by this recent space discovery, the Series K452 was born.



A Wearable Solar System

In the early 1600s, Johannes Kepler proposed three laws regarding the mechanics behind orbital movements, and his discoveries lead to our contemporary understanding of planetary movement.

The K452 Series pays homage to these discoveries, displaying the relationship between time and space through concentric discs.


The Series K452's disc system contains a 3-layer surface from inner to outer discs, graduated for seconds, minutes, and hours respectively. 

As shown below, a reference point is engraved from the top of the watchface to its center so you can read time perpendicularly. The seconds are marked out in the center disc. The minute and hour discs are read through an aperture with a single engraved line at the top of the watch.


Table of Contents

The sections below break down the Series K452's features in detail. Here is a quick overview. 

  • No battery necessary 
  • Powered by Miyota Calibre 9015 
  • Transparent case back 
  • 316L stainless steel body 
  • Milanese mesh bracelet 
  • Genuine leather straps
  • 3 color planet buttons 
  • Smart docking system
  • One size fits all 
  • Convex hard plexiglass + Anti-Reflective coating + Sapphire coating
  • Original typeface
  • Exclusive telescopic auto winder 
  • Laser-engraved astronaut badge

Motion Powered by You

The Series K452 requires no battery. 

It does not need to be wound, but winds itself as you move. Alternatively, you can wind it by turning the crown clockwise. When you wear the watch, your natural movements keep the watch running; you are its power source!


Planetary Accuracy

The Series K452 is driven by a Miyota Calibre 9015, a high grade and high frequency model that allows for smooth spinning with great accuracy. Offering slim dimensions and long preserved running time, the Miyota Calibre 9015 is known as one of the highest quality automatic movement motors.

  • Vibration frequency: 28800 vibrations per hour 
  • 24 Jewels automatic movement 
  • Accuracy: -10~30 seconds per day 
  • Posture difference: Under 40 seconds per day 
  • Running Time: More than 42 hours 
  • Water resistance: 164' (50 m)

*Accuracy of a mechanical watch is different from the daily rate accuracy of a quartz watch. The accuracy will change at a maximum of ten seconds when you manually rewind the spring. Therefore, accuracy of the half wound condition (as the watch naturally unwinds throughout the week) will be different from that of fully wound condition.

A Planet, Discovered

The Series K452 also contains a transparent case back–a unique feature among timepieces. The case back represents the discovery of the Kepler-452b, showing how this world that was hidden within our galaxy has now been found.



The Spacecraft

The Series K452 is equipped with a bold 316L stainless steel body, reminiscent of the spacecraft itself, available in 3 stunning models, which you can choose from during the survey process.

  • Convex hard Plexiglass with Anti-reflective coating + Sapphire coating
  • 316L Stainless steel
  • Ø 1.65" (42.0 mm)
  • Height 0.57" (14.4 mm) back & screws
  • Solar - Polished / Dawn - PVD Matte black plating / Luna - Brushed

Secure Take Off

Embroidered by steel, the watch's Milanese mesh bracelet is a tribute to the airless tires of roving space vehicles and offers ultimate protection. The carefully fabricated Milanese mesh is stitched together in a delicate process involving up to 85 steps. 

This sophisticated mesh forms a metallic wave on the wrist, giving flexibility to the fit, allowing the skin to breathe freely. Unquestionably tough (it has been called “shark proof”) it is still versatile and light enough for everyday wear.

Offering precision, stability, and toughness all at once, the Milanese mesh bracelet is an ideal space suit for the Series K452.

There are 3 finishes available, which you will choose during the survey process.

  • Brushed Milanese Mesh
  • Polished Milanese Mesh
  • DLC Matte Black Milanese Mesh



Leather strap and planet buttons

Each Series K452 comes with your choice of a Milanese mesh bracelet, plus extra genuine leather straps with planet buttons. The leather straps also have a stainless steel buckle with PvD black plating.

Featuring the members of the discovered planets in Kepler’s neighborhood, the planet buttons come in 3 colors: red (Kepler-20e), yellow (Kepler-186f), and blue (Earth / Kepler 452b). 

Milanese mesh? Leather strap with 3-colored planets? Pick your spatial experience. 

Smart Docking

To swap the straps, the Series K452 has an interchangeable strap system that secures straps with a simple pull and click. Within seconds straps can be changed and perfectly docked, ready for takeoff. The docking system is available for both Milanese mesh and leather straps, so you can choose what style fits you best. 

For Everyone

The Series K452 is designed for both men and women.

Simply slide the clasp to the desired slot to adjust the length of the bracelet so that it fits perfectly on your wrist.

Field of Vision

The Series K452, unlike traditional timepieces, gives viewers a new way to look at time, and the watch's domed glass is made of convex hard Plexiglass + AR coating + Sapphire coating.

We have performed several plexiglass hardness tests to measure the breaking energy of the Plexiglass under a simulated dropping impact. The material ensures incredible strength along with a magnificent view of the watch's mechanical universe.

Celestial Typeface

Typeface plays a major role in our timepieces. The customized font was engineered to honor the mechanical beauty of space vehicles, giving the watch a celestial familiarity.

The Series K452 speaks in space terminology––with readings arranged in aviation format, celebrating the altimeter numbers from Apollo 17. All numbers are laser engraved, creating more from less.


Rewards

 Please note: VAT and duties are excluded.


An Exclusive Launch Pad!

The K452 Telescopic Auto Winder will be exclusive for G-star package backers. 

The winder will fuel up your watch while on standby, serving as a home base to continually power the Series K452. The auto winder energizes your watch by keeping its motor spinning, mimicking your body's natural movements that keep your watch ticking.

Astronaut Badge

Welcome on board! Every Series K452 will come packaged with a K452 astronaut badge, a laser-engraved metallic card that serves as a document for warranty. The plate is uniquely numbered and issued.

Packaging

Whether a watch, strap, or bracelet, every item pledged for on Indiegogo is subject to a final quality check at our Hong Kong studio before being hand packaged with care in our premium packaging.



Production

Just like our first campaign, all of our products are produced and shipped out of our Hong Kong factory. Each piece is carefully manufactured and assembled at the highest quality, and goes through our studio for a final inspection before being shipped in our stellar packaging, to ensure that the watches and all their components arrive safely to your doorstep.

We delivered the rewards for our first campaign on time, and will work hard to do the same for this campaign. We are pleased to offer free shipping around the world!


Timeline

 

Team

 

Past Press

story:
The World's First UVC Mobile Sanitizer Sticker

  

 

 

   

 

 

Our patent pending technology utilizes powerful UV-C germicidal led lamps that kills 99.9% of viruses and bacteria when the light beam is swept slowly across a surface.

 

UVLyzer is super easy to use. Just peel off the backing, stick it to the back of your phone, phone case, or any clean flat surface and you are good to go. It charges via USB-C – like most smart phones.

SAFETY: UVLyzer's smart sensor technology will automatically turn off whenever it is faces upward to protect your eyes and skin

 

UVLyzer can be used on everyday surfaces, such as restaurant utensils, airplane tray tables, keyboards, laptops, shipping/ grocery boxes, movie armrests, desks and tables

UVC light (germicidal UV light) falls between 200 to 280 nm

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

​

Far-UVC light (222 nm) efficiently and safely inactivates airborne human coronaviruses https://www.nature.com/articles/s41598-020-67211-2 

Ultraviolet Light Disinfection Data Sheet https://www.clordisys.com/pdfs/misc/UV%20Data%20Sheet.pdf 

Light based anti-infectives: ultraviolet C irradiation, photodynamic therapy, blue light, and beyond https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3831650/ 

Ultraviolet LEDs prove effective in eliminating coronavirus from surfaces and, potentially, air and water https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2020/04/200414173251.htm 

UV Light Degrades 96% of Coronavirus in a Matter of 3 Seconds, Says Signify https://www.cnbc.com/2020/06/17/signify-uv-light-coronavirus.html 

UV Light's Germicidal Properties Aid in Fight Against HAIs https://www.infectioncontroltoday.com/environmental-hygiene/uv-lights-germicidal-properties-aid-fight-against-hais

story:
RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Our team has experience in product development, environmental business, e-commerce, and marketing. We've spent the last 14 months developing strong relationships with our manufacturers.  Design on our first frame style is finished. Our Ombraz Classic cord is finalized, and we have even run an initial production run of 300 units to test everything out. Two additional frame styles are in their final development stages and will be ready to launch this summer. We acknowledge that an unpredictable roadblock could happen, but we've traveled through a lot and are ready for it :)

After hand-sewning hundreds of pairs of Ombraz we've become intimately familiar with our product. We are in the process of testing out a scaled assembly process, using ultrasound to fuse our cord. We are determined to deliver a high-quality pair of sunnies that will enhance your eyewear experience and be the last kind of sunglasses you’ll ever buy.

Looking ahead, we have already started to develop our next 2 frame styles and they should launch by late summer 2018. They are looking beautiful! 

Our initial focus will be on adapting Ombraz technology to other classic styles, adding a touch of Ombraz to each.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

During our campaign, every time you share us on your social pages, we will plant 1 tree on your behalf! Thank you all so much for the love! We can't wait to get a pair of Ombraz in your hands!

 

PRESS KIT

 

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1N4EIiOIec0GWSl9jdawfktNR-UqwJ6w6aat6qiPqydU/edit
