story:
New conscious capsule wardrobe brand P.I.C launches on Indiegogo


Consciously designed and lovingly made around the corner in a North London factory.

P.i.C only uses fabrics that are locally sourced, sustainable, organic or select stock material.


“Our vision is to create a clothing line that is timeless, space-saving and with limited impact on the environment. This is thoughtful fashion. Slow fashion. Never mass-produced. Always chic. And this makes us happy.”


Rebelling against industry norms The Indigogo campaign will allow P.I.C to create the eight-piece capsule wardrobe as ethically as possible, P.i.C is doing it the right way for people and the planet and needs your help to spread the message.


The 8 Piece Capsule Collection



What We Need


We need £20k to fund this collection, by pre-ordering you will help us:
  • meet factory minimums
  • minimise impact on the environment
  • build a sustainable business

How You Back Us


Here's how you can support P.i.C and our first launch:

1) Select a pledge on the right hand side to start your order
2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details
3) Complete payment via paypal or using debit/credit card
4) Your P.i.C order will be delivered in September - we keep you posted on our progress

What You Get


With the total 8 pieces - you can combine these to create more than 50 outfits which makes this ideal as a space-saving and easy-to-wear collection.  Not only do you have an array of outfits, the range is also contemporary and minimalistic.  Of course, any of these pieces can be P.i.C and mixed with your existing wardrobe. 
Check this out...


*Please note, the above show two colourways but you can still make up the 50+outfits with 8 pieces in just one colourway*

Your Perks


Really excited to share with you our very own P.i.C perks.   A collaboration with Laser Lab Projects who has created some fab locally sourced surplus wooden keyrings with our branding.  P.i.C Eco-Tote bags with a positive quote printed in UK by BIDBI - handy and great for re-use.  We offer free domestic shipping on all our pledges too.  The final perk is obviously owning your very own P.i.C style.



P.i.C & Mix










What If....?


Hopefully, we can reach our goal, but if not, we would still like to fulfil your order.  We will keep you updated on the timeline here and also contact you personally.  


The Impact


P.i.C are passionate about providing contemporary style but done in the right way. 

We support other local business and in turn help those around the globe by paying fairly for these fabrics.   This enables our suppliers to give consistent business, fair wages and fair hours to those who weave them.  

Producing in London also means reducing carbon footprint.

We want to eliminate the headache of a "what-to-wear" or "what-to-pack" situation. Everything goes together and everything works well within the simple colour palette.  Easily packed into a hand luggage which makes a long weekend away or business trip that much more care-free.


The Features


-  P.i.C’s signature V-point underarm shape

-  Multifunctional and Interchangable as seen in the Hackney jumpsuit, Bethnal pinny dress and Camden dress

  • Remove the bibfront from the Hackney jumpsuit and you have a wide leg cropped trouser
  • Remove the bibfront from the Bethnal pinny dress and you have a sleek pencil skirt
  • Remove the belt off the Camden dress and you have a longline sleeveless jacket

-  Rotatable properties as seen in the De Beau cami and Camden dress

P.i.C believe in choosing well so one garment worn in multiple ways as a capsule collection makes sense.  See the outfit combos to get more inspiration as to how you might like to dress yourself up or down, day to night.  P.i.C.ture Perfect!


The Fabrics

By choosing organic and locally sourced fabrics, not only do we support other local business but we are also helping those around the globe by paying fairly for these fabrics which in turn provides consistent business, fair wages and fair hours to those who weave them.  

The capsule wardrobe is made from GOTS certified (Global Organic Textiles Standard), eco-friendly and stock fabrics which support small businesses around the world.  Some of these fabrics are even handwoven creating amazing textures.


The Fit


We have been in the fashion industry for more than 20 years combined.  Aware of how important a “good fit” is, the P.i.C capsule collection has been designed to flatter any girl effortlessly. 

High-waisted features are seen in the Hackney jumpsuit, Bethnal pinny dress, Dalston peg and London miniskirt.  Designed to be comfortable whilst accentuating the waist at the same time – clever right?

The cami should be a staple in every girl’s wardrobe – and if not, you know where you can get one!  The cut is on the bias which basically means skimming and not figure hugging creating a sexy silhouette.

Body Size Chart


How to measure:-

  • -  Bust   -  circumference of the fullest area of your chest
  • -  Waist  -  circumference of smallest part of waist
  • -  Hip   -  circumference of largest area of hips


**If the garment does not fit, P.i.C are more than happy to exchange the garment.  However, please do leave your feedback, good or bad, as P.i.C endeavours to satisfy every customer and provide a wardrobe you love.


Made by Hand, Wash by Hand


Due to the delicate nature of organic natural fibres and not to mention the limited impact on the environment - P.i.C recommend you wash the collection by hand. Less water, less detergent and less waste!   Showing your clothes some TLC will also prolong the life-span too.


The Risks & Challenges


With at least two decades in the fashion industry under our belt, we are more than familiar with challenges which would and could be present.  The costs involved with not mass producing and maintaining production in London was always going to be a risk compared to lower cost overseas manufacture. Adamant to support sustainability and local businesses, this was a challenge which P.i.C had to come face-to-face with.  Making the right choices and doing it the right way has pushed the prices up but, we still want an accessible range for our customer.

Another challenge faced has been in marketing and PR!  How do we spread the word and let all of you out there know about what, why and how we do it? A great photoshoot with a great model was crucial to explaining our concept.  Calling on favours from family and friends, asking for support from other sustainable companies and social media has helped us no end.

With all costs involved, the pricing is affected but we hope you can help us to produce this stunning range by pre-ordering your responsibly-made, versatile and timeless wardrobe.  You can also contact us with any wholesale enquiries where we can offer you better prices for ratio packs.  This goes towards meeting factory minimums and making what we will sell and therefore causing less waste.  This is slow fashion – but P.i.C aim to produce your pieces and deliver by September this year in time for your wardrobe update.


This is….#FashionForTheFuture.


Get in Touch


Backers: info@pic-style.com
Business Enquiries: rhoda@pic-style.com
Press Enquiries: sarah@pic-style.com

Thanks Partners for taking your time to check out P.i.C on Indiegogo - we would hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.


#PartnersinCrime | #FashionForTheFuture | #DoItRight
www.pic-style.com

x Rhoda & Sarah x
story_txt:
New conscious capsule wardrobe brand P.I.C launches on Indiegogo
Consciously designed and lovingly made around the corner in a North London factory.
P.i.C only uses fabrics that are locally sourced, sustainable, organic or select stock material.
“Our vision is to create a clothing line that is timeless, space-saving and with limited impact on the environment. This is thoughtful fashion. Slow fashion. Never mass-produced. Always chic. And this makes us happy.”
Rebelling against industry norms The Indigogo campaign will allow P.I.C to create the eight-piece capsule wardrobe as ethically as possible, P.i.C is doing it the right way for people and the planet and needs your help to spread the message.


The 8 Piece Capsule Collection





What We Need

We need £20k to fund this collection, by pre-ordering you will help us:



meet factory minimums


minimise impact on the environment

build a sustainable business




How You Back Us
Here's how you can support P.i.C and our first launch:

1) Select a pledge on the right hand side to start your order
2) Continue onto the next page to enter shipping information followed by payment details
3) Complete payment via paypal or using debit/credit card
4) Your P.i.C order will be delivered in September - we keep you posted on our progress

What You Get

With the total 8 pieces - you can combine these to create more than 50 outfits which makes this ideal as a space-saving and easy-to-wear collection.  Not only do you have an array of outfits, the range is also contemporary and minimalistic.  Of course, any of these pieces can be P.i.C and mixed with your existing wardrobe. 
Check this out...










*Please note, the above show two colourways but you can still make up the 50+outfits with 8 pieces in just one colourway*

Your Perks

Really excited to share with you our very own P.i.C perks.   A collaboration with Laser Lab Projects who has created some fab locally sourced surplus wooden keyrings with our branding.  P.i.C Eco-Tote bags with a positive quote printed in UK by BIDBI - handy and great for re-use.  We offer free domestic shipping on all our pledges too.  The final perk is obviously owning your very own P.i.C style.










P.i.C & Mix


























































What If....?

Hopefully, we can reach our goal, but if not, we would still like to fulfil your order.  We will keep you updated on the timeline here and also contact you personally.  


    


The Impact

P.i.C are passionate about providing contemporary style but done in the right way. 
We support other local business and in turn help those around the globe by paying fairly for these fabrics.   This enables our suppliers to give consistent business, fair wages and fair hours to those who weave them.  
Producing in London also means reducing carbon footprint.
We want to eliminate the headache of a "what-to-wear" or "what-to-pack" situation. Everything goes together and everything works well within the simple colour palette.  Easily packed into a hand luggage which makes a long weekend away or business trip that much more care-free.
 




The Features

- 
P.i.C’s signature V-point
underarm shape
- 
Multifunctional and
Interchangable as seen in the Hackney jumpsuit, Bethnal pinny dress and Camden
dress



Remove the bibfront from
the Hackney jumpsuit and you have a wide leg cropped trouser


Remove the bibfront from
the Bethnal pinny dress and you have a sleek pencil skirt


Remove the belt off the
Camden dress and you have a longline sleeveless jacket


- 
Rotatable properties as seen in the De Beau cami and Camden dress
P.i.C believe in
choosing well so one garment worn in multiple ways as a capsule collection
makes sense.  See the outfit combos
to get more inspiration as to how you might like to dress yourself up or down,
day to night.  P.i.C.ture Perfect!


The Fabrics

By choosing organic and locally sourced fabrics, not only do we support other local business but we are also helping those around the globe by paying fairly for these fabrics which in turn provides consistent business, fair wages and fair hours to those who weave them.  
The capsule wardrobe is made from GOTS certified (Global Organic Textiles Standard), eco-friendly and stock fabrics which support small businesses around the world.  Some of these fabrics are even handwoven creating amazing textures.




The Fit



We have
been in the fashion industry for more than 20 years combined.  Aware of how important a “good fit” is, the
P.i.C capsule collection has been designed to flatter any girl effortlessly. 


High-waisted features are seen in the
Hackney jumpsuit, Bethnal pinny dress, Dalston peg and London miniskirt.  Designed to be comfortable whilst
accentuating the waist at the same time – clever right?

The cami should be a staple in every girl’s
wardrobe – and if not, you know where you can get one!  The
cut is on the bias which basically means skimming and not figure hugging
creating a sexy silhouette.


Body Size Chart




How to measure:-



- 
Bust   -  circumference of the
fullest area of your chest


- 
Waist  -  circumference of
smallest part of waist


- 
Hip   -  circumference of
largest area of hips



**If the garment does not fit, P.i.C are more
than happy to exchange the garment. 
However, please do leave your feedback, good or bad, as P.i.C endeavours
to satisfy every customer and provide a wardrobe you love.




Made by Hand, Wash by Hand


Due to the delicate nature of organic natural fibres and not to mention the limited impact on the environment - P.i.C recommend you wash the collection by hand. Less water, less detergent and less waste!   Showing your clothes some TLC will also prolong the life-span too.


The Risks & Challenges

   

With at least two decades in the fashion
industry under our belt, we are more than familiar with
challenges which would and could be present.  The costs involved with not mass producing and maintaining
production in London was always going to be a risk compared to lower cost
overseas manufacture. Adamant to support sustainability and local businesses, this was a challenge
which P.i.C had to come face-to-face with.  Making the right choices and doing it the right way has
pushed the prices up but, we still want an accessible range for our customer. 
Another challenge faced has been in
marketing and PR!  How do we spread the word and let all of you out there know about what, why and how we do it? A great photoshoot
with a great model was crucial to explaining our concept.  Calling on favours from family and
friends, asking for support from other sustainable companies and social media
has helped us no end.
With all costs involved, the pricing is affected but we hope you can help us to produce this stunning range by pre-ordering your responsibly-made, versatile and
timeless wardrobe.  You can also contact us with any wholesale enquiries where we can offer you better prices for ratio packs.  This goes
towards meeting factory minimums and making what we will sell and therefore
causing less waste.  This is slow
fashion – but P.i.C aim to produce your pieces and deliver by September this
year in time for your wardrobe update.

This is….#FashionForTheFuture.
  
Get in Touch

Backers: info@pic-style.comBusiness Enquiries: rhoda@pic-style.comPress Enquiries: sarah@pic-style.comThanks Partners for taking your time to check out P.i.C on Indiegogo - we would hugely appreciate you sharing it with your friends.#PartnersinCrime | #FashionForTheFuture | #DoItRightwww.pic-style.comx Rhoda & Sarah x

story:
Can't find the perfect running and activewear jacket?

When Kevin Zhu moved to Vancouver from China last summer, he was excited to live in a city where running and being active was as popular as Starbucks. When he discovered the running trails along the beaches of West Vancouver, he set out to buy the ultimate running jacket, but couldn’t find anything that came close. He wanted something versatile with modern, built-in features, that didn't compromise performance or comfort.

With 20 years of experience as a producer and designer for women’s fashion brands across Europe, Kevin set out to create what he believes is the perfect running/activewear jacket for women AND men...enter the Merino Contour Jacket.

The Magic of Merino

The Merino Contour Jacket is made up of 85% pure Merino wool; a natural, renewable and biodegradable material that’s great for the environment, The natural fibres are lightweight, soft and breathable allowing you to perform in comfort. Merino adapts to your body temperature keeping you warm or cool all year round. 

A true no-fuss material, Merino wool is odour resistant, machine washable, and can be simply hung for a day to restore its freshness. With a much lower percentage of synthetic fibres than its competitors, our jacket focuses on the natural without sacrificing quality, performance and style. 

Comfort AND Function

Worried about carrying too much stuff? Or not being able to carry what you need? Beat the bulk with secure inside pockets for your smartphone, keys and must-haves. Torn between wanting to be comfortable and wanting to look great? This jacket is perfectly detailed for comfort without compromising style.

The jacket is loaded with fine details including:

  • self-sealing inside pockets for keys, cards or other valuables
  • glove-fitted sleeves
  • waterproof zippers
  • a microfibre cloth for your glasses

Bring on the Beats

Turn up the tunes without getting wrapped up in wires! Secure eyelets allow your earbuds to stay in place while you move.

Move easily from the running trails to a coffee catch-up in style. This jacket has you covered from indoors to outdoors and back.

Water resistant

We have applied the best finishing to our jacket to make it naturally water-resistant (no coating at backside).

What About Sizes?

There's nothing more annoying than getting a jacket that doesn't fit! Here's a handy chart to help you with sizing...

Please Support Our Project

We handpick only the best Merino yarn with critical technical properties. And to ensure the best possible quality, we pick the yarn, dye it, and weave it into final fabric ourselves. The entire fabric creation process takes about 2 months, with jacket production taking another 3-4 weeks. The whole production process takes up to 3 months. It's a painstaking process, but the only way we can ensure a perfect final product! We plan to start shipping jackets to our supporters in June.

Our Merino Contour Jacket is just the beginning. With your support we can rapidly produce and manufacture a line of functional and comfortable active wear clothing.

Stay in Touch

We want to hear from you! Follow our updates here and connect with us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram. You can also send us questions and comments on ourWebsite!

story:
Short Summary

Hi, my name is Alex Bentley and I am a student at Wofford College studying to be a Herpetologist. This has been my dream career since I encountered my first wild snake (a small Ring-necked snake) as a young boy. As a young adult I am pursuing my passion in the form of field based research, and now I am pursuing my biggest project yet!


 I will be venturing into somewhat unchartered territory, applying an emerging technology to tracking in hopes of expanding the field of snake ecology. Radiotelemetry has been critical to spatial ecology and natural history studies for years now, yet this technology is limited. However, with advancements in GPS and GNSS technology, new horizons are appearing. There’s no literature on GPS tracking of snakes, and only within the last couple years have people begun to experiment with this. No one has tried it with rattlesnakes yet!

more details at: http://gpsmyrattlesnake.org/about/

What We Need & What You Get

Although GPS technology is now small enough for snake tracking, it's still not cheap! Each unit I will purchase is $1,000, and I need to buy 10 units! Out financial goal is $10,000, all of which will go to the purchase of these GPS transmitters. 

In partnership with Telemetry Solutions we have developed a custom design for GPS devices that will be used specifically for tracking rattlesnakes. These units will be attached to the rattle using epoxy, tape, and light weight zip ties.

find out more at: http://gpsmyrattlesnake.org/the-project/

The Impact

GPS tracking has several advantages over radiotelemetry. One such advantage is continuous data transmission through a number of mediums (cellular, bluetooth, and wi-fi). Moreover, the ability to obtain position time series data representing movement paths affords biologists more data and greater insights into the spatial ecology of organisms. Position time data can now be obtained from a distance without disturbing the animals being tracked. Some GPS units, such as those that I will be using, have a “smart GPS” function, which logs position time data only when the animal moves a specified distance! The possibilities for field based applications are endless with this type of technology.

 GPS has the potential to once again revolutionize the field of wildlife biology. Now that the technology exists, the next step in snake tracking is to incorporate GPS. The future of snake tracking has been waiting for this, whether or not it can be done is still unknown. So lets find out…

More information at: http://gpsmyrattlesnake.org/gps-tracking/

Risks & Challenges

There are many unknowns at play here. Will canopy coverage and dense ground vegetation interfere too much with signal transmission? Will snakes spend too much time under rocks to get regular fixes? Will the attachment technique stand the test of time, weather, and snake travel?

There are no guarantees here, this is an experiment, trying something new. But there is only one way to find out if it will work...

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute to the project financially, don't worry! Even just spreading the word is extremely helpful. Tell friends, family and anyone who might be interested about the project!

story:
Being a young professional, I needed to wear leather dress shoes to work and my search for a dependable pair of dress shoes was met with difficulty and frustration.

The shoes I found were either poorly made, didn’t fit, hurt, or were too expensive to wear on a daily basis with the fear of them being scuffed. I am sure this is a common problem for all the men out there. I decided there had to be a better way.

The devotissimo project aims to solve all the common problems for mens leather dress shoes and this is how we do it. 

Upgrade your formal work footwear with this sleek leather Oxford shoe. With lace up fastening, rounded toe and stitch detailing. Pair these with anything from tailored trousers to a suit for a professional and dapper look.

 

Dressed up style gets a sleek update with this smart leather Oxford shoe. It features punch cap toe, lace up closure and rounded toe. Style it with a morning suit or tailored tweeds for effortless style.

Enhance your smart casual look with this stylish minimalist double monk shoe. Features double buckled strap detail with toe cap. Finished in smooth and buffed premium leather with handcrafted sole.

 

 

We have decided to go with Indiegogo because all your contributions will be returned to You if the funding goal is not reached and You lose nothing. 

If You believe in this project and campaign, please send this to those You think will be interested.

 

1. Do you ship outside of Hong Kong?

Delivery and shipping within Hong Kong is included in the contribution. Delivery and shipping to outside Hong Kong will add US$100 to the contribution. 

2. What is your Exchange and Return Policy?

There will be no exchanges or returns unless there is a structural, material or manufacturing defect. We stand by our products and we will fix it or send you a replacement if we confirm there is a structural, material or manufacturing defect. 

 

 

 

Resources:

Easel.ly

Freepik.com

story:
As Seen On

**All stretch goals from the Kickstarter campaign apply here including the metallic gun barrel grey color option, cotton bags, and wood cases (The Kickstarter only color is not included).

Carvers are premium sunglasses that allow you to optimize your vision based on the environment you're in.

  • Equipped with interchangeable lenses that allow you to filter the world the way you want to see it
  • Individually carved from the most technologically superior material to make eyewear with: cellulose acetate, a bioplastic.
  • Fully customizable frames fastened and reinforced with stainless steel that will fit you the way you want them to

  • Not injection molded from brittle liquid petroleum like most sunglasses
  • Not made with planned obsolescence: Carvers are made to be timeless
  • Not constructed with limiting cheap lenses: many major sunglasses brands often do not use polarizing technology, leaving their customers without maximum protection from harmful glaring light

**We love these so much that we thought we'd let you know that if you don't like your Carvers for any reason, you can return them for a full refund in the first month- no questions asked.

1) Select which perk to the right that best suits you:

2) This will take you to a page where you'll provide shipping and payment details

3) Have a look below and ponder all of the possibilities for creating your custom pair(s). We'll send you a survey after the Kickstarter has been funded for you to select your color combinations

Cellulose acetate sunglasses are made from forming layers of wood and cotton based plastic into blocks. Each pair of sunglasses is carefully carved out, hand polished, and then finally assembled into a frame.

The alternating folding layers, much like a samurai sword, combine hardness with ductility to greatly enhance the toughness of cellulose acetate compared to petroleum based plastics.

The stainless steel that is then infused into the frames further reinforces the legs while allowing them to be adjusted by you or your optician to perfectly fit your face.

Because cellulose acetate is a plant based environmentally friendly plastic, it retains many of its initial properties:

  • Incredibly strong, flexible, and lightweight
  • Hypoallergenic and retains the soft feeling of cotton on the skin
  • Environmentally friendly and made from renewable resources

Every lens is 100% UV filtering (UV 400):

  • Constructed from polycarbonate
  • Impact resistant and tested
  • Polarized with scratch resistant coatings on both sides
  • Fully customizable and easily interchangeable

Blue / Grey Lens Tints (Red, Yellow, & Orange Lenses)

  • Reduces glare, eye stress, and fatigue, especially in yellow / sunny environments
  • Enhances contrast & helps to see contours Improves color perception Great for driving, spectator, golf, and snow sports
  • The darker the tint, the better suited for bright light conditions. Tints (darkest to lightest) go Red, Yellow, Orange

Good in misty, foggy and snowy conditions the lighter the tint is

Brown Lens Tints (Blue & Brown Lenses)

  • Reduce glare and blocks blue light, the most harmful light to the eyes, giving them the ability to brighten vision on cloudy/hazy/foggy days/enhances the light quality of your surroundings
  • By blocking blue light, these tints increase contrast and visual acuity, allowing you to make out shapes more clearly, especially against green and blue backgrounds such as grass and sky
  • Good for: fishing, baseball, golf, hunting, cycling, water sports, high-altitude sports, boating/sailing, hiking, winter sports, water sports, motorcycling, baseball, cycling & running, or any sport where distance needs to be judged
  • Great for bright light conditions, lighter color browns are especially suited for overcast, hazy or foggy conditions The darker the lens, the more suited it is for bright light conditions while the lighter it is the more depth perception is increased in lower light

Purple Lens Tint (Green Lenses)

  • Reduce glare and blocks green light, giving them the ability to enhance contrast in environments where there is a lot of green like forests, fields, and golf courses
  • Optimum for enhancing contrast in bright to medium light conditions making them great for snow sports and clouded sunsets
  • Think of as an in-between for blue and brown lens attributes that leans more towards the brown lenses

Green (Olive) Lens Tint (Purple Lenses)

  • Best at blocking red and infrared (I.R.) light
  • Maintain a more true color balance and recommended for varying color conditions
  • Think of as an in-between for blue and brown lens attributes that leans more toward the blue/grey lenses

Note: mirror gradients reflect light while lens tints absorb (dampen) it. This is why, for example, our brown lens tint has a blue mirror or why our purple lens tint has a green mirror. By doing this, even more blue light is kept out of the eyes in the case of the brown tint/blue mirror combo, improving the quality of the lens even further. It's not all about looking sweet. There's logic to the color pairing.


Risks and challenges

This isn't our first rodeo, but there are always unknowns that can come up.

If you have any hesitations, we'd encourage you to search 'Epicstoke' on Kickstarter and Indiegogo to have a look at our past campaigns. Please check the comments- we pride ourselves on quality, transparency, and communication. Otherwise, you're always welcome to reach out!

MANUFACTURING: We have dialed in the prototypes and love where they are at. We've become good friends with our manufacturer over the past few years and they have always delivered on quality and been able to be flexible with our needs for other sunglasses we produce. Nonetheless, challenges can arise, e.g. certain acetate colors could take a little extra time to procure. These guys only make high quality stuff and we accept nothing less.

FULFILLMENT: There are always things that could come up here. As you know, many Kickstarters deliver late. We've always delivered close to our deadlines and kept a hot line of communication between our backers and reality. Because we have a close relationship that has been built with our manufacturer over the past few years, we have the advantage of extra transparency. If the manufacturer misses a deadline, a shipment goes astray, or anything goes wrong, you'll hear about it right away.

Again, we'd encourage you to check out our past campaigns or contact us with any questions or apprehensions. :)

the eyes, giving them the ability to brighten vision on 
cloudy/hazy/foggy days/enhances the light quality of your surroundings 
By blocking blue light, these tints increase contrast and visual 
acuity, allowing you to make out shapes more clearly, especially against
 green and blue backgrounds such as grass and sky 
Good for: fishing, baseball, golf, hunting, cycling, water sports, 
high-altitude sports, boating/sailing, hiking, winter sports, water 
sports, motorcycling, baseball, cycling & running, or any sport 
where distance needs to be judged 
Great for bright light conditions, lighter color browns are 
especially suited for overcast, hazy or foggy conditions
    The darker the lens, the more suited it is for bright light 
conditions while the lighter it is the more depth perception is 
increased in lower light
Purple Lens Tint (Green Lenses)
    Reduce glare and blocks green light, giving them the ability to 
enhance contrast in environments where there is a lot of green like 
forests, fields, and golf courses 
Optimum for enhancing contrast in bright to medium light conditions making them great for snow sports and clouded sunsets 
Think of as an in-between for blue and brown lens attributes that leans more towards the brown lenses
  Green (Olive) Lens Tint (Purple Lenses)
    Best at blocking red and infrared (I.R.) light 

    Maintain a more true color balance and recommended for varying color conditions 
Think of as an in-between for blue and brown lens attributes that leans more toward the blue/grey lenses
Note: mirror gradients reflect light while lens tints absorb 
(dampen) it. This is why, for example, our brown lens tint has a blue 
mirror or why our purple lens tint has a green mirror. By doing this, 
even more blue light is kept out of the eyes in the case of the brown 
tint/blue mirror combo, improving the quality of the lens even further. 
It's not all about looking sweet. There's logic to the color pairing.Risks and challenges
This isn't our first rodeo, but there are always unknowns that can come up.
If you have any hesitations, we'd encourage you to search 'Epicstoke'
 on Kickstarter and Indiegogo to have a look at our past campaigns. 
Please check the comments- we pride ourselves on quality, transparency, 
and communication. Otherwise, you're always welcome to reach out!
MANUFACTURING: We have dialed in the prototypes and love where they 
are at. We've become good friends with our manufacturer over the past 
few years and they have always delivered on quality and been able to be 
flexible with our needs for other sunglasses we produce. Nonetheless, 
challenges can arise, e.g. certain acetate colors could take a little 
extra time to procure. These guys only make high quality stuff and we 
accept nothing less.
FULFILLMENT: There are always things that could come up here. As you 
know, many Kickstarters deliver late. We've always delivered close to 
our deadlines and kept a hot line of communication between our backers 
and reality. Because we have a close relationship that has been built 
with our manufacturer over the past few years, we have the advantage of 
extra transparency. If the manufacturer misses a deadline, a shipment 
goes astray, or anything goes wrong, you'll hear about it right away.
Again, we'd encourage you to check out our past campaigns or contact us with any questions or apprehensions. :)

story:
AMMO - Keep your coins safe & close! 

Do you want your coins to be easily accessible, as well?

What is Ammo?

Ammo is a futuristic, plastic bracelet from a new generation. It was created for your convenience, so you could easily access your coins.

With Ammo you can forget about scattered coins all over your pockets!

 

The Project!

I started working on the project because I wanted to make a bracelet for my girlfriend. She wears tight clothes and as you can imagine, she finds it inconvenient to keep coins in her pockets. Another problem was that the coins always fall out of her wallet and get scattered all over her purse. I wanted to save her these troubles and give her a reason to smile more often!

We use coins every day for tickets, vending machines, shopping trolleys. I thought that Ammo would save us some time and nerves by keeping our coins easy too access whenever and wherever we need them.

And that's how the Ammo idea was born!


Where will my money go?

The product design and development are expensive, hard and time consuming. We are ready to take this challenge up but we need your help.

We need money for:

- Improving the material

- Improving the design 

- Minimum Order Quantities. Manufacturers require minimum quantities that must be paid before they run the products.


What is it made of ?

Ammo is made of flexible, nontoxic plastic.

 

Varieties

There are three different types of bracelets.

Ammo US

Ammo USA contains up to 28 US coins (all coins with diameter from 17.91mm to 30.61mm)

Ammo UK

Аmmo UK contains up to 28 British coins except for Twenty-five and Five pence (all coins  with diameter from 18mm to 28.4mm)

Ammo EU

Ammo US contains up to 28 EU coins (all coins with diameter from16.25mm to 25.75mm)

 

Dimensions:

There are three different sizes of bracelets.

S

Diameter: 80mm
Height: 28mm

M

Diameter: 96mm
Height: 28mm

L

Diameter: 100mm
Height: 28mm

 

What colors does it come in?

 

Manufacturing schedule:

  • October – last modifications
  • November – manufacturing
  • December – Quality check and product dispacth


Risks and challenges

International shipping is a great challenge as it is always hard to estimate the correct delivery date.

Ammo manufacturing will take place in an EU country, in a factory with proven quality. We will inform our customers if any unexpected delays occur during any of the manufacturing stages.


We Need Your Support!

We are really excited to launch our first project and in order to meet our funding goals, we need your support. If you could do something as simple as share our link on facebook or tweet about us, our project could go a long way!

story:
A Short & Sweet Shotcaps Overview...

Shotcaps combine traditional shot glasses and bottle caps into a single, unique product that allows you to cap your favorite liquor bottles! Stop wasting precious party time searching around your cluttered kitchen for that shot-glass-gone-rogue since now you'll have a fully functional shot glass attached atop your bottle.

The product was conceived, designed and developed by 24 year old, serial-entrepreneur Nathan 'Ello' Reimnitz of Minneapolis, MN. Nathan has a proven track record for success as an entrepreneur, he has built and sold two web-based businesses including a real estate syndication service in 2012 & online music streaming platform in 2013.

Product Features...

Let's face it, once in a while we all have a little too much fun at a party and glasses get dropped. Fortunately for you, our products are made of acrylic (not glass) which allows you to drop it as many times as you wish.

Our caps are manufactured using a non-flavor-transfer material which means when you pour your favorite drink in, it tastes like your favorite drink coming out (rather than tasting like plastic, yuck).

Unlike THIS VIDEO our shot glasses are fully functional.

How The Funds Will Be Used...

We're looking for $10,000 to launch 3 products; a 1.5oz shot glass, a 3.0oz double-shot glass, and a 4.0oz mixed-shot glass. This funding will allow us to produce nearly 5,000 shot-glasses and bring our products to market.

Our sales team will be providing some of these glasses to liquor stores throughout the US as we continue receiving purchase orders for our glasses. Once we've secured $100,000 in purchase orders our bank is willing to step up and help us fully fund our shot glass dreams. 

If we raise less than our $10,000 goal that's okay, we'll apply everything we raise to manufacturing our products.

 

What's In It For Me?

We're offering many rewards to contributors to our campaign including;

$1 - Credit as a backer on our new website, indefinitely.

$5 - We'll send you a free shotcap and give you double your money back when we make our first million dollars.

$10 - Assorted stickers/decals to show your support of Shotcaps.

$20 - One 1.5oz Shotcap (free shipping included). You will also receive a numbered glass plus certificate of authenticity from our initial 3,000 glasses.

$30 - One Shotcaps T-Shirt of your choice.

$1,000 - The first Shotcaps products ever produced with a special cap color, #1 branding, plus a certificate of authenticity. (Only 1 available, obviously)


Other Ways You Can Help...

If you don't have any $ to contribute that's okay, you can still help by sharing our IndieGoGo campaign with your friends!

story:
As a thank you for being an early Ori supporter, all of our Perks are available at special discounted prices.

Each Perk is a different combination of items.  Once you choose your Perk, you can then choose your size and color for each item included in the Perk.

If you want to get a taste of the entire collection, go for the Full Collection Perk at a special 25% OFF retail price.  That contains one of each style (1 Short Sleeve Tee, 1 Three Quarter Sleeve Tee, 1 Embroidered Sweatshirt, and 1 French Terry Wrap Dress), and you can of course choose a size and color for each!

 

You don't have to choose a size or color right away --

DECIDE AFTER CAMPAIGN:  If you know you want to snag a Perk, but don't feel like choosing a size or color for each garment, you can select "Decide After Campaign."  We will email you immediately following the campaign close to get your size/color preference.

If you don't see exactly what you want, you can place a Custom Order --

CUSTOM ORDER:  If you don't see the specific Perk combination you are looking for (e.g. if you want to order four tees and two dresses, or six sweatshirts) email us!  We will create a custom order for you.  We are committed to 20% off retail for our Early Bird orders, so feel free to email us to get your combination of items just right.

 

 

 

Our Ori sizes run 0 - 5.

Our size 0 is equivalent to a 10/12, and our size 5 is equivalent to a 30/32.  Check out our size chart below for detailed equivalent sizes and corresponding hip, waist, and bust measurements.

Our sizing is super consistent across styles -- we have one of the best technical designers in the game grading our patterns.  You will be the same size across styles unless you are looking for a particularly snug or particularly cozy fit in one of the garments.

If you have any questions at all about fit, sizing, or style of any garment, shoot us an email at support@wearori.com -- we are standing by to help!

 

 

*  Remember, if you'd rather snag a perk now and figure out sizing after the campaign ends, that's totally fine!  Just select "Decide After Campaign" in the size drop-down.

 

 

 

 

Hey guys!  For those of you who have been following along on the 'gram, we are so happy you made it.  To all of our new friends, welcome!

We are a female owned & operated startup based out of Venice, CA, designing contemporary apparel specifically for sizes 10 and up.  We've been working on this project for a long time, and we are incredibly excited to share it with you.

 

Ori started from a long-winded survey.

We knew we wanted to develop a contemporary collection, combining amazing fabrics and technical design graded specifically for a larger size range.  We wanted to get this right, so we went straight to the source to ask: what do you like and dislike about what you’re wearing now?  What styles, fabrics, aesthetics are missing?  What do you wish you could wear more?

We received an incredibly enthusiastic response — 8,000+ survey submissions — and we knew we had to make something special. ⚡

 

Below: some of our first sketches ...

   

 

Flash forward through many months of product development:

·  sourcing the perfect soft, lightweight, textured fabrics with great drape and durability;
·  integrating technical design elements like forward-angle seams, slightly scooped necklines, elongated sleeve lengths, carefully measured shoulder slope and curved hemlines;
·  translating hand-drawn artwork to garment embroidery;
·  dipping and double-dipping different colorways for each fabric;
·  rounds & rounds of sample revisions back and forth between our design team and our incredible manufacturing partners in Japan

… and finally, we have our first collection!  We can't wait for you to try it on :)

 

 

We're a small team -- bootstrapped and women owned & operated -- with big plans for 2019.  By backing our campaign, you're helping us bring those plans and this brand to life.

We started with a small collection of core styles, but we have a larger assortment in the product development pipeline that we're hoping to work on this year.  This is just the beginning of our inclusive-sizing effort -- we hope to carry everything we're learning about what you want in fabrics, patterns, and aesthetic toward concepting an entire assortment of styles specifically designed for our size range.

We have a few more core styles that are in the sketch design phase.  We're particularly excited about working on a functional, comfy, flat-front waistband across a few different core bottoms styles, and on incorporating strategic paneling into tops and outerwear.

 

 

 

 

Product design and development are central to our goals in the immediate future.  Our longer-term vision is to complement an expanded assortment with an improved shopping experience, a closer integration with style inspiration + editorial content, and ongoing interaction with our community.

 

       

 

 

 

Customer feedback has been central to our product development thus far -- from our initial survey, to meeting some of you in person, to implementing your comments and opinions into every phase of the design process -- and our commitment to you is to maintain and improve upon that feedback loop throughout the coming months.

Feel free to reach out at any time to support@wearori.com.  We are so excited to bring this brand to life, and we are *so* grateful for your support along the way ... this is just the beginning!

 

wearori.com

@wearori

story:
4 reasons to make this your next jacket...

 

 

We want more from the clothes we buy. We want them to be more sustainable, more versatile, easier to live with. We decided we want our jacket to be 4 X better than your average jacket. So that's what we've done. 

A Packable, Reversible, Recycled, Carbon Neutral Jacket...but we didn't stop there...

Once we had completed our final samples we sent them out to a lucky few individuals for testing and to see what they thought. Check it out below!

story:
The aim of the creator with the ARPIEM Tribute is to propose an original design for a quality but affordable racing watch. The Tribute is unique using shapes, words, numbers and colors finding their meanings in the memories of the motor racing world of the 60's - early 70's. 

 

 

Reliability and affordable quality have been the key words when deciding of the specifications of the ARPIEM. The developpement of the watch lasted over 18 months in order to achieve its perfectly balanced design.

 

< THE CASE of the Tribute is made out of 316L steel, meaning durability and toughness. A waterproof level of 5 ATM is proposed.

 

< LIMITED EDITION: All cases will be engraved on the back of the case with its unique serial number (Stretch Goal #1 - Unlocked)

 

< THE DIAL: the shape of the secondary dials (the "pandas") is inspired by the manometers of the cars of the sixties . Indexes of the main dial represent the RPM counter.

 

< THE MOUVEMENT: the choice of the caliber Z50 Xtratech series quartz chronograph of the famous RONDA swiss maker is definitly the choice of safety and accuracy. Includes split-time function. 

 

< DOMED SAPPHIRE GLASS: the hardest and best quality of glass available on the market. Hardly scratchable (by diamond only), the domed conception gives to the watch a nice vintage effect. 

 

< DIAL TRIPLE LAYER for a high quality perception of the dial: this specification gives an elegant volume to the dial; it also recalls the "sandwich" construction of the chassis of racing cars before carbon fiber was adopted. 

 

< HANDS: the main hands for hours and minutes are coated with SUPERLUMINOVA BGW9 (photoluminescent effect).

 

< REVISITED TACHYMETER: the indexes on tachymeter are normally irregularly dispatched on the surface of the circle. The ARPIEM Tribute indexes are placed in the way of the diving watch, giving the speed at each position of 5 seconds on the tachymeter.

 

< COLORS COMBINATIONS OF THE 4 MODELS: blue and orange, navy and white, green and yellow, range and black are tributes to iconic racers, racing cars makers or team managers of the 60's and early 70's.

 

< WARRANTY: the ARPIEM Tribute will enjoy a 2 years warranty from delivery date.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

   

ARPIEM Tribute TGH

 

 

Graham Hill incarnates the romantism of the drivers of the sixties, gone away nowdays. A time, according to World Champion Jack Brabham, when "sex was safe and motor racing was dangerous"... The navy blue and white colors of the ARPIEM TGH are the colors of his helmet. This one was decorated with white "pencils" which are reproduced on the dial. The legend on the bottom of the dial recalls the famous "triple crown" he won. The index n°5 in red represents the number of his victories at Monaco GP.

 

ARPIEM Tribute TBML

 

 

The TBML model is a tribute to the new zealander driver Bruce Mc Laren. Bruce died in 1970 as he was testing one of his race cars. 45 years later, his name remains famous in the racing industry. 

The orange is the original color of all Mac Laren cars. On the dial of the TBML model, the index #32 refers to the age he died, and the written mention refers to the Can-Am racing series, famous in the late 60's and early '70s, which was highly dominated by Mc Laren cars. The shape of the kiwi, symbolizing his country, on the top of the dial was also painted on his racing cars.

 

 

ARPIEM Tribute TJC

 

 

The TJC is an homage to Jim Clark, the mythic scottish world champion. His career is attached to Lotus Cars, known for their green and yellow livery. On the dial is printed the mention " Farmer - Racer ", reference to his origins that he never gave up. The index #25 is the total of his F1 wins.

 

ARPIEM Tribute TJW

 

 

The TJW is dedicated to the emblematic racing team manager John Wyer who reigned over endurance racing in the late 60's early 70's and who introduced the famous blue and orange colors that became iconic. On the dial of the TJW, the index #24 refers of course to the 24 hours, duration of the most famous endurance races, and the written mention to the race tracks where they were taking place.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Vincent REPOUX has been waiting 57 years before becoming a creator, after 31 years in the sport business, mainly professional soccer and motor racing. He is a race fan, and his emotions are mainly driven by sounds, colors and smells, making of him a true aficionados of the romantic period of the motor racing in the 60's and the 70's. Beside his activities of consultant in sports, Vincent has created the ARPIEM Tribute which is an attempt to express these emotions.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

 

The design of the ARPIEM Tribute has been finalized by Benjamin Chamfeuil, a french watch designer from Bordeaux who has already conducted sucessfully two Kickstarter campaigns for watches (VASCO Watch). Benjamin being part of the team is also a reinsurance for backers in the capacity of the team to conduct successfully this project.

All pictures appearing in the campaign are issued from the ARPIEM Tribute prototypes. They are fully reflecting the final product, the creator keeps the possibility to bring some minor changes, not affecting the performances or feature of the watch, in the bulk production.

A lot of design, develoment and prototyping work has been accomplished during 18 months. The project is 99 % ready. For this reason, we are confident in the respect of our delivery schedule in april 2019, although industrializing can always raise unexpected issues. 

 

pictures / photos: Arnaud Bertrande et Philippe Chéneau.

< LIMITED EDITION: All cases will be engraved on the back of the case with its unique serial number (Stretch Goal #1 - Unlocked)
 
< THE DIAL: the shape of the secondary dials (the "pandas") is inspired by the manometers of the cars of the sixties . Indexes of the main dial represent the RPM counter.
 
< THE MOUVEMENT: the choice of the caliber Z50 Xtratech series quartz chronograph of the famous RONDA swiss maker is definitly the choice of safety and accuracy. Includes split-time function. 
 
< DOMED SAPPHIRE GLASS: the hardest and best quality of glass available on the market. Hardly scratchable (by diamond only), the domed conception gives to the watch a nice vintage effect. 
 
< DIAL TRIPLE LAYER for a high quality perception of the dial: this specification gives an elegant volume to the dial; it also recalls the "sandwich" construction of the chassis of racing cars before carbon fiber was adopted. 
 
< HANDS: the main hands for hours and minutes are coated with SUPERLUMINOVA BGW9 (photoluminescent effect).
 
< REVISITED TACHYMETER: the indexes on tachymeter are normally irregularly dispatched on the surface of the circle. The ARPIEM Tribute indexes are placed in the way of the diving watch, giving the speed at each position of 5 seconds on the tachymeter.
 
< COLORS COMBINATIONS OF THE 4 MODELS: blue and orange, navy and white, green and yellow, range and black are tributes to iconic racers, racing cars makers or team managers of the 60's and early 70's.
 
< WARRANTY: the ARPIEM Tribute will enjoy a 2 years warranty from delivery date.
 
 

 
 

 

 
 

   
ARPIEM Tribute TGH
 

 
Graham Hill incarnates the romantism of the drivers of the sixties, gone away nowdays. A time, according to World Champion Jack Brabham, when "sex was safe and motor racing was dangerous"... The navy blue and white colors of the ARPIEM TGH are the colors of his helmet. This one was decorated with white "pencils" which are reproduced on the dial. The legend on the bottom of the dial recalls the famous "triple crown" he won. The index n°5 in red represents the number of his victories at Monaco GP.

 
ARPIEM Tribute TBML
 

 
The TBML model is a tribute to the new zealander driver Bruce Mc Laren. Bruce died in 1970 as he was testing one of his race cars. 45 years later, his name remains famous in the racing industry. 
The orange is the original color of all Mac Laren cars. On the dial of the TBML model, the index #32 refers to the age he died, and the written mention refers to the Can-Am racing series, famous in the late 60's and early '70s, which was highly dominated by Mc Laren cars. The shape of the kiwi, symbolizing his country, on the top of the dial was also painted on his racing cars.
 

 
ARPIEM Tribute TJC
 

 
The TJC is an homage to Jim Clark, the mythic scottish world champion. His career is attached to Lotus Cars, known for their green and yellow livery. On the dial is printed the mention " Farmer - Racer ", reference to his origins that he never gave up. The index #25 is the total of his F1 wins.

 
ARPIEM Tribute TJW
 

 
The TJW is dedicated to the emblematic racing team manager John Wyer who reigned over endurance racing in the late 60's early 70's and who introduced the famous blue and orange colors that became iconic. On the dial of the TJW, the index #24 refers of course to the 24 hours, duration of the most famous endurance races, and the written mention to the race tracks where they were taking place.
 

 
 

 
 

 
 
 

Vincent REPOUX has been waiting 57 years before becoming a creator, after 31 years in the sport business, mainly professional soccer and motor racing. He is a race fan, and his emotions are mainly driven by sounds, colors and smells, making of him a true aficionados of the romantic period of the motor racing in the 60's and the 70's. Beside his activities of consultant in sports, Vincent has created the ARPIEM Tribute which is an attempt to express these emotions.
 



 
Risks & Challenges
 
The design of the ARPIEM Tribute has been finalized by Benjamin Chamfeuil, a french watch designer from Bordeaux who has already conducted sucessfully two Kickstarter campaigns for watches (VASCO Watch). Benjamin being part of the team is also a reinsurance for backers in the capacity of the team to conduct successfully this project.
All pictures appearing in the campaign are issued from the ARPIEM Tribute prototypes. They are fully reflecting the final product, the creator keeps the possibility to bring some minor changes, not affecting the performances or feature of the watch, in the bulk production.
A lot of design, develoment and prototyping work has been accomplished during 18 months. The project is 99 % ready. For this reason, we are confident in the respect of our delivery schedule in april 2019, although industrializing can always raise unexpected issues. 
 
pictures / photos: Arnaud Bertrande et Philippe Chéneau.

Little Rock is a new means of transportation and maintenance of mobile phones, cash, credit cards and coins. This way, all your essentials are well organized in just one bag.

Little Rock 

Package Price: $79 | ~€74 | ~AU$100 

color: Burly wood - Bloody Brown - Desert Bone - Emerald Green & Black 

size: iPhone SE - iPhone 7- iPhone 7 Plus & Android Cell Phones

BUFFALO FEATURES:

- The ability to expand 

- 8 pockets for tablet, phone and currency.  

- 2 slots for cards 

- 4 loops for pens, pencils, and cables. 

- Outer & Inner: all of the pocket linings are from Italian veg-tanned leather

GRAND BUFFALO FEATURES:

- Protects your laptop

- The ability to expand Handles and removable cross-body strap for carrying versatility.

- 11 pockets for laptop, tablet, phone, cards, currency, Tile, and other hardware.

- 3 slots for cards

- 4 loops for pens, pencils, and cables

- Internal zipper pocket for valuables.

- Guard lining for laptop, tablet, and phone. 

- Includes free tile

- Outer and Inner: all of the pocket linings are from Italian leather

LITTLE ROCK FEATURES:

- 3 Slots for cards

- 2 Sleeves for Money

- 1 Pocket for Phone

- Made from italian veg-tanned leather

Risks and challenges

We are quite aware that every project has its risks. To minimize these, we have invested a serious amount of time into our planing. We have precisely calculated our production estimates (For this reasons, we set up limits for our rewards) and look into all factor regarding distribution to our supporters. Additionally, we have a very complete team working with us. 
As a result, We can assure to all of our backers in Kickstarter that they will receive their BlackBull rewards by the stipulated time.

story:
Wi-Fi Hotspot

Norrland Parka has a built in Wi-Fi Hotspot. It gives you instant internet access to 5 devices. Stay connected anywhere. 

Unlike public Wi-Fi networks, Norrland Parka’s own Wi-Fi is safe, reliable and private. You find the name of the network and the code on the inside of your jacket.

 

Power Bank

Never worry about your phone dying again. Norrland Parka’s 6000mAh power bank lets you charge your phone and tablet anywhere. The clever design lets you fully charge your phone while it is in your pocket.

 

Gloves

Super soft leather gloves with the warmest insulation. They are specifically designed for Norrland Parka, and are touch screen enabled. The gloves fit neatly inside zippered pockets in the coat’s sleeves, to keep you warm and cozy on the go.

 

Built in Scarf

Be prepared when the temperature suddenly drops. Norrland Parka’s clever design has a built in-scarf you can use whenever you need.

 

Tablet Pocket

Designed to carry an iPad or any full size pocket or notebooks. Free up space in your carry-on or purse.

 

Smartphone Pocket

Easily accessible pocket for your smartphone. Shock absorbing materials to keep your phone safe. Offers seamless connection to your earphones and powerbank.

 

Glasses Pocket

Has shock absorbing materials, to keep your glasses or ski goggles safe and handy. Also has a built in microfiber cloth for cleaning your lenses.

 

Built in Pen + Stylus 

Your Zipper is now smart - it’s a telescoping pen that extends to 4 inches. The bottom of the pen is a Stylus – useful tools for everyday life.

 

Hat Pocket

Neatly stash your hat in the hidden hat pocket behind your hood instead of cramping it in your pocket or bag. 

 

AirPods Pocket

A dedicated pocket to carry your AirPods or any other wireless earplugs, so you are never left searching for them. 

 

RFID Proof Wallet Pocket

Don’t let anyone steal your credit card details or other sensitive information. A dedicated RFID proof pocket for your wallet keeps you secure.

 

Noise Reducing Earplugs

A pair of noise reducing earplugs in its own dedicated pocket.

 

Apple Pencil Pocket

A dedicated pocket so you can always carry your apple pen, or any pen of your choice.

 

Passport Pocket

Perfect to quickly access your passport and boarding pass while traveling.

 

Hand Warming Pockets

Multi layered hand warming pockets for extra warmth.

 

Retractable Keychain

Retractable keychain with a carabiner so you never ever lose your keys again. Easy to access in your front right outer pocket. 

 

Bottle Opener + Whistle and Flashlight

Beer emergency? No worries! The retractable keychain has a bottle opener. It also has a whistle, perfect for life threatening situations, or just beer emergencies. The keychain also has a built in flashlight.

 

Tracker Tag Pocket

Lets you track your coat if you’ve left it somewhere. Fits most commercial trackers.

 

Secret Pocket

The location of this pocket is different on each model and only known by the owners. What you keep there is up to you and it’s your secret.

 

 

Water Resistant

Norrland Parka keeps you warm and dry during the winter season.

 

Wind Resistant

Norrland Parka’s breathable, yet wind resistant shell makes sure you stay warm and cozy.

 

What is the world’s best coat without the world’s best materials? We have carefully handpicked the sturdiest hardware and fabrics. Optimal balance between durability, comfort and luxurious feel. 

Norrland Parka the only coat in the world designed above the arctic circle – so we know a thing or two about how you stay warm in the harshest conditions.

 

 

The fill is US standard 90/10 White Duck Down with 700 fill power. We use the highest quality and most expensive inner lining. The outer lining is Synthetic insulation. 

We also use water + wind resistant materials – so Norrland Parka keeps you warm, dry and cozy in any condition.

 

 

We use faux fur for the hood. Both the hood and the fur are easily removable. Norrland Parka uses top of the line YKK zippers - which are the best in the industry.

 

Norrland Parka is the finest example of Scandinavian quality, ingenuity, innovation and design. All styles have the same awesome features. Choose your style and color: 

 

 

 

 

Exchange and Refund Policy

 

If you do not absolutely love your coat, simply return it within two weeks of receiving it and get a full refund, minus the cost of shipping and handling. No questions asked.

If you follow our sizing chart carefully, then the coat shall fit you fine. Yet, if you want to exchange your coat, we allow that, but you will have to pay for the shipping. We accept exchanges up to 30 days of you receiving your coat(s).

 

 

What does Norrland mean?

 

Norrland is the northernmost region in Sweden, above the arctic circle, which translated from Swedish fittingly means “North Land”. It is a region with stunning beauty, known for its Northern Lights, great beer, friendly people and the world’s first ice hotel.

Our love for the outdoors and our extremely cold but beautiful winters inspired us to create the ultimate winter coat. A coat that has everything you could possibly want and more, whether you are skiing in the mountains or cruising in the city.

story:
THE PROCESS~

We use reclaimed or recycled fabric: fabric/clothing that has been chopped up and re-spun into new usable bulk fabric. 

We use reclaimed (old metals that would be thrown away, melted down and re-used) for all of our jewelry. 

We use old denim for our up-cycled denim line to make our one-offs, which means there is only one made by naturally dying them different colors or embroidering new fun designs. (NOTE- the rest of our products can be recreated)

We use only natural or plant based dyes and printing inks to create each and every product.

MAKEING US ZERO WASTE AND AWESOME!

 

 

Discounted Indiegogo Pricing!

Summary

We can't keep acting like there isn't a problem! For the present and future the necessary shift in consumer behavior. Join the 100% recycle made fashion movement!

  • Don’t add to the problem-clean it up
  • 100% recycled materials
  • Naturally dyed
  • Empowerment through employment
  • Zero waste life
  • Clean the planet

Don't compromise on fashion or the environment! Use what we already have! Artista Rose, A Repurposed Life.

 

Founder

My name is Zoe Rose Burton, and I am the proud founder of Artista Rose. Artista Rose started when I was ten years old with my original art pieces and has grown into a lifestyle that I, myself, aspire to live. After seeing and understanding the negative effects the retail industry has on the environment, it became my goal to create products that I would feel good both purchasing and wearing. Artista Rose is an environmentally conscious company that knows beautiful products can be produced ethically. We are part of a global movement that is putting more and more emphasis on sustainability. We believe that the power to make change lies within each of us and that we vote with every dollar we spend.



We decided to launched Artista Rose as a Crowdfunding Campaign because we see this idea as a catalyst for change and want to share it with all of you. This campaign is about building a community of people who want to make a shift towards a zero waste and ethical spending philosophy. This idea means everything to me, and to share this company that has been over ten years in the making is truly an honor. 


 At Artista Rose, we believe in power through employment and have partnered with CDRT, a non-profit organization with deep roots in Nepal, to ensure our employment of the woman of Nepal provides safe and well-paying jobs. 

    .

We use the best-recycled cotton, the most sustainable manufacturing facilities and the best natural dyes for every order. 


Every purchase helps not only clean up our planet but will support the employment of those in need. 

we are working towards our goal of raising awareness of the power of conscious spending.

The Impact
Clean up the world's oceans, and landfills with every purchase, while empowering the women of Nepal with life-changing jobs. 

These changes won't happen overnight, but Artista Rose can be part of our collective solution and shift towards conscious consumerism. Every dollar spent is a vote towards the company's you want present in our world.

story:
What's The Empowerment Bag?

Our goal is to give you an awesome, useful bag that empowers you to get through your day and empowers other women and children to live better lives. We have 3 styles of practical bags to satisfy the needs of your busy lifestyle: satchel, messenger, and duffel.

 

 

All our bags are fair-trade and stitched from laminated jute or organic cotton. Jute is a natural fiber that is both durable and recyclable. And the lamination comes from a biodegradable plastic backing. Our cotton is organic, meaning our cotton suppliers use sustainable farming practices that do not rely on damaging chemicals, hormones, or preservatives. We use water-based inks, avoiding harmful petro-chemicals and compounds. We strongly believe in using the best material and practices to make our products!

Support At-risk Women

Did you know that according to the International Labor Organization, 4.5 million people are trapped in forced sexual exploitation globally? The Empowerment Bag aims to free women in India who were otherwise vulnerable to sexual exploitation and trafficking.

All our bags are made by women at risk of exploitation in West Bengal, India. These women are given financial independence and an alternative to the sex trade through sewing training, literacy skills, and employment with fair wages.

Purchasing our bags allows over 200 women in West Bengal to receive salaries and work in a healthy, safe, and productive environment.

Impact Stories

Supporting The Empowerment Bag means supporting disadvantaged women and children in West Bengal.

Fuel Even More Empowerment (We give back!)

We're fully committed to freedom from human trafficking and exploitation. Therefore, we're giving 5% of sales on The Empowerment Bag to New Light, an organization also in West Bengal that provides shelter, education, and healthcare to trafficked women and their children.

Our business model is founded on a cycle of empowerment. We help vulnerable women in West Bengal learn how to sew, read and write, and make bags. By buying our bags, YOU allow us to give $$ back to that same community so that exploited women and kids can live safer, healthier, and more successful lives.

What've We Done & What's Left?

Who Created The Empowerment Bag?

I, Vaishali, started The Empowerment Bag because I'm passionate about stopping human trafficking. I was also looking for an affordable, sustainable, and ethically-made cross-body bag. I couldn't find such a product. I also didn't find a brand I trusted that provided a variety of bags to keep up with my varied activities and hectic lifestyle, so I decided to launch such a brand myself.

I've been involved with anti-trafficking projects since high school. When I attended Carleton College, I founded and led an anti-human trafficking task force. I was awarded a scholarship to work with the Cook County Adult Probation Sex Offender Unit and the Chicago Alliance Against Sexual Exploitation (CAASE). I also worked with the Australian Government Office for Women.

I hope you'll join me in the fight against human trafficking and sexual exploitation by supporting The Empowerment Bag (purchase a bag on the right)!

Other Ways You Can Help

Your support means so much! After funding our campaign, please share this page with all your family and friends. Encourage others to contribute to our campaign.

You can spread the word through social media, email, or by good ol' word of mouth!

Instagram: @theempowermentbag

Facebook: @theempowermentbag

Website: www.theempowermentbag.com

Did you know that according to the International Labor Organization, 4.5 million people are trapped in forced sexual exploitation globally? The Empowerment Bag aims to free women in India who were otherwise vulnerable to sexual exploitation and trafficking.

All our bags are made by women at risk of exploitation in West Bengal, India. These women are given financial independence and an alternative to the sex trade through sewing training, literacy skills, and employment with fair wages.

Purchasing our bags allows over 200 women in West Bengal to receive salaries and work in a healthy, safe, and productive environment.
Impact Stories
Supporting The Empowerment Bag means supporting disadvantaged women and children in West Bengal.


Fuel Even More Empowerment (We give back!)
We're fully committed to freedom from human trafficking and exploitation. Therefore, we're giving 5% of sales on The Empowerment Bag to New Light, an organization also in West Bengal that provides shelter, education, and healthcare to trafficked women and their children.

Our business model is founded on a cycle of empowerment. We help vulnerable women in West Bengal learn how to sew, read and write, and make bags. By buying our bags, YOU allow us to give $$ back to that same community so that exploited women and kids can live safer, healthier, and more successful lives.
What've We Done & What's Left?


Who Created The Empowerment Bag?

I, Vaishali, started The Empowerment Bag because I'm passionate about stopping human trafficking. I was also looking for an affordable, sustainable, and ethically-made cross-body bag. I couldn't find such a product. I also didn't find a brand I trusted that provided a variety of bags to keep up with my varied activities and hectic lifestyle, so I decided to launch such a brand myself.
I've been involved with anti-trafficking projects since high school. When I attended Carleton College, I founded and led an anti-human trafficking task force. I was awarded a scholarship to work with the Cook County Adult Probation Sex Offender Unit and the Chicago Alliance Against Sexual Exploitation (CAASE). I also worked with the Australian Government Office for Women.
I hope you'll join me in the fight against human trafficking and sexual exploitation by supporting The Empowerment Bag (purchase a bag on the right)!

Other Ways You Can Help
Your support means so much! After funding our campaign, please share this page with all your family and friends. Encourage others to contribute to our campaign.
You can spread the word through social media, email, or by good ol' word of mouth!
Instagram: @theempowermentbag
Facebook: @theempowermentbag
Website: www.theempowermentbag.com

story:
Press Coverage

Gizmodo: Watch Out Fitbit, This Badass New Activity Tracker Is Out to Eat Your Lunch

ABC News: Misfit Shine: A Fitness Gadget Backed by Former Apple CEO Aims to be Different

TechCrunch: Meet Shine: The Elegant Activity Tracker That Has A Neat Trick For Syncing

Forbes: Misfit Adds Shine to Wearable Health

NEW - BBC News: Wearables tech gains momentum at CES

NEW - The Wall Street Journal: The Latest Fitness Gadgets to Gauge and Goad

More press coverage below...

Specs

  • Size: 27.5mm (diameter), 3.3mm (edge)
  • Weight: Under 10g
  • Battery: Coin cell; lasts about 4 months
  • Compatibility: iOS and Android
  • Accessories: Comes with a clasp to clip onto clothing easily

 

Simple

Misfit Shine is an elegant, all-metal activity tracker that you can sync with your smartphone just by placing it on your phone screen. Find out how active you are every day, and set goals to become more active. Wear it how you want, wherever you want. 

French macaroon? No, it's Misfit Shine

Smart

Misfit Shine’s proprietary sensor algorithms can track cycling and swimming in addition to just steps so you’ll get more credit where credit is due. To see how active you've been throughout the day, simply tap Shine and a halo of lights shines through invisible micro-holes, laser drilled into the metal casing.

Simply tap to view your activity progress for the day. Go full circle and you're done!

Timeless

Misfit Shine was made to last a lifetime and designed to complement any fashion statement. Carved out of a solid block of aircraft-grade aluminum, it is super strong and waterproof.

Just place on your smartphone to sync

Wearable

It’s tiny, and at just several millimeters thick, is one of the world’s thinnest wireless activity trackers so it can be worn just about anywhere, even when wearing next to nothing. Clip it on your pants, bra, shirt, or shoes. Or use the wristband and wear it on your wrist where it can function as a watch too.

Key Features

  • Elegant: a tiny all-metal disc with a beautiful halo of lights
  • Precious: precision crafted like jewelry to be worn on any occasion
  • Smart: more than just steps - tracks swimming and biking too
  • Goal-driven: tap to see progress towards your daily activity goal
  • Bold design: no buttons, no cables, no recharging
  • Amazing sync: just place it on your smartphone and it syncs, even in airplane mode
  • Wearable: on your wrist, shoe, ankle, bra, hip, as a brooch, wherever you want
  • Super-strong: carved out of a solid block of aircraft grade aluminum and is waterproof
  • Timeless: built to last a lifetime, designed to complement any fashion statement
  • Personal: set your own goals, visualize data, and get insights tailored for you

Size Comparison

Misfit Shine is just slightly larger than a quarter and weighs less than two of them.

Metal & Leather

Formal or business casual. Misfit Shine with the leather band. Natural or Black, take your pick.

Gorgeous Metal Card


Who We Are

Our San Francisco crew - Wallace, Rachel, Patrick and Mai missing from picture

Our Vietnam crew - Huy, Loc, Chi and Thanh missing from picture

We're focused on developing great wearable products: things that a lot of people would wear all the time for a long time. Like jeans and t-shirts. We aim to pioneer the emerging world of wearables, by making products and services in the consumer health and fitness space to inspire people be more active and develop healthy habits. We were founded in 2011, and Misfit Shine is our first product.

Why Indiegogo?

Part of the idea behind the lean startup is to prove demand, and build products in a rapid, user-centered design cycle. By reaching out on Indiegogo, we can assess our demand, build a stronger relationship with our early adopters, and use feedback to make our product as amazing as possible.

Use of Funds

We've built our prototypes. We’ve figured out our supply chain. We need your help to take the next step. We’re looking for funds to put Misfit Shine into production. We know what we’re doing; we've led the development and manufacturing of more than a dozen hardware products in previous companies, including the first ever iPhone-compatible hardware medical device - so we know exactly what's required to pull this off. You are getting in early, and getting a premium product ahead of everyone else.

We’re asking you to help us make Misfit Shine a reality.

More Press Coverage

NEW - Last Gadget Standing: The MisFit Shine is Taking LGS by Storm

NEW - All Things D: Activity-Tracking Tech Moves From Wrist to Neck, With Sculley’s New Shine Necklace

NEW - The Doctor's Channel: The Misfit “Shine” – Next Generation Activity Monitoring

NEW - Starpulse: Misfit Wearables CEO on why you should back the Misfit Shine Wireless Tracker

NEW - MedCity News: How a sleek, quarter-sized activity tracker hit its $100,000 crowdfunding goal in under a day

NEW - Wired: Rejected Kickstarter Projects Build Their Own Success Stories

NEW - Uncrate: "Why should you have to wear your activity tracker on your wrist?"

NEW - The Gadgeteer: Misfit Shine – Is it the coolest pedometer, activity tracker yet?

NEW - Cool Things: Misfit Shine Is A Coin-Sized Fitness Tracker

NEW - ALIST: Misfit Shine aims for FitBit, confirms Asian Americans rule fitness tracking

Lightpublic:  The Misfit Shine Activity Tracker – A Little Gem with Big Convenience

iMedicalApps: Misfit Wearables debuts first wearable sensor Shine using IndieGoGo

Fast Company: The Shine: A Self-Tracking Device That You’d Wear Even If It Didn’t Do Anything

Mashable: Tiny Metal Fitness Tracker Is Sleek Enough for Any Occasion

SlashGear: Misfit Shine is an all metal activity tracker for those looking to get fit

MIT Technology Review: Misfit Wearables’ First Product is a Fitness Tracker

MobiHealthNews: Misfit Wearables launches Shine, an elegant but rugged activity tracker

SmartPlanet: Misfit Shine: Adding a sexy sheen to wearable health

MSN: Misfit Shine: monitor de atividade física em forma de pedrinha pesa só 10g

Medgadget: Misfit Wearables Announces Shine, a Shiny New Wireless Fitness Tracker

Health 2.0: Misfit Wearables Launches Its First Tracking Device

Fashioning Tech: Misfit's Shine Outshines the Fuelband

IEEE Spectrum: Start-up Unveils a Shiny New Activity Tracker

The Dish Daily: Cool Ingiegogo campaigns: Misfit Wearables' Wireless Activity Tracker

Geeky Gadgets: Misfit Shine is a high-tech and rugged fitness tracking device

Gotta Be Mobile: Shine Fitness Tracker Is Small, Sexy and Syncs With Grace

Technabob: Misfit Shine Activity Tracker: Beautiful Design, Weird Name

Ubergizmo: Misfit Shine Wireless Physical Activity Tracker

Yahoo! Taiwan: Misfit 推出世界首款全金屬無線健康設備 Shine

Ask on the comment thread here or email troublemakers@misfitwearables.com
