This toiletry bag is declined in 3 color versions.  Black Toiletry Bag Black and Cognac Toiletry BagFull Cognac Toiletry Bag We already have a strong partnership with our factory, which guarantees that our products will be manufactured in time and with a high quality construction. With your help, we want to develop LUNDI's products and distribute our collection in beautiful stores all over the world.

story:
The Petite, Mesh in Rose Gold. $179 on Indiegogo

The Chrono-Diver, Black Dial/Desert Leather. $225 on Indiegogo

The GMT Watch, Steel Band. $215 on Indiegogo

The Chrono-Diver, Black Dial/Black Leather. $225 on Indiegogo

 

 

Linjer is an independent design studio with roots in Oslo, Norway. Since 2014 we have been making minimalist, high-quality bags and watches.


 


1. The finest materials and craftsmanship

The most beautiful, well-made products always start with excellent raw materials. We use Swiss movements, sapphire crystals and Italian full grain, vegetable-tanned leather in all of our watches.


2. Honest prices

We sell directly to customers, cutting out the unnecessary costs and crazy markups that make traditional watches extraordinarily expensive. We pass the savings on to you, so you get the same quality at a 1/3 or 1/4 of the typical cost.

 

3. Clean, minimalist design

We believe that good design and high-quality components speak louder than a flashy logo. Our aim is for our watches to be that perfect final touch to any outfit that you’re wearing – and to put a little spring in your step every day.

 

 

 

We’re able to sell luxury watches at accessible prices by selling directly to our customers. This allows us to cut out middlemen, expensive storefronts, and excessive marketing. We pass the savings on to you. At Linjer, you can buy products that would normally cost thousands of dollars for a fraction of that price. 

 

 

 

 

Each component in Linjer watches, inside and out, is selected with careful consideration of function and aesthetic.

We use luxury quality materials in every part of our watches, from the Swiss movements inside to the 316L stainless steel, PVD plating, and sapphire crystals encasing the watch. And we don't skimp on the leather! Our leather straps are all made of Italian vegetable-tanned leather that patinas beautifully with use.
 

 

 

Our bands - both leather and steel - are made with innovative quick-release springbars so you can easily remove and replace them with a snap. You can get additional straps in different materials. It's like having multiple watches in one.
 

 


Our GMT Watch and Chrono-Diver have market-leading lume by the Japanese company Nemoto in their SG-2200 Long Afterglow Noctilucent specification.
 

 

 

Our Petite watch in mesh is the ultimate understated luxury for her. The watch head has a gently tapered, slimming profile and a subtly domed sapphire glass. The dial has two layers and debossed minute markers. With a 30mm case diameter, this is a small, classy size for women.

• Ronda 762 movement, 2 hands
• Case size 30mm
• Case thickness 6.1mm with tapered profile
• Domed sapphire crystal with anti-reflective treatment 
• Water resistant to 3 ATM 
• 316L stainless steel case with shiny finish
• Applied silver hour indexes (for both rose gold and silver colours)
• Lacquered varnish dial 
• Mesh straps with easy-to-use clasp 

How pink is the rose gold? Our rose gold tone is not super 'pink' -- in fact, many people think our rose gold looks like a regular gold. We have chosen to call it 'rose gold' because it has a slightly deeper, richer tone than normal gold tones, which sometimes appear yellow, brassy or even green-ish.

 

 

The Oslo Watch is minimalist and clean, with carefully considered details. A doubled domed sapphire crystal and brushed case combine to create a unique design that is a throwback to Oslo in the 1980s.

• Ronda 762, 2 hands
• Case size 38mm
• Case thickness 6.8mm
• Water resistant to 3ATM
• Leather band width 18mm
• Double domed sapphire crystal with anti-reflective treatment
• 316L stainless steel case with brushed finish 
• Lacquered varnish dial finish
• Full grain Italian vegetable-tanned leather straps. All straps have quick-release springbars and can be interchanged with each other

 

 

The GMT Watch is made for the jetsetter. This watch has a fourth hand (in orange) to help you track the time in another time zone along the outer rim. The watch has high-performance Nemoto LumiNova® lume on the numbers and hands. Steel and leather bands available.

• Ronda 515.24H with GMT hand
• Case size 41mm
• Case thickness 9.35mm
• Water resistant to 5ATM
• Steel and leather band width 22mm
• Flat sapphire crystal with anti-reflective treatment
• 316L stainless steel case with brushed finish
• Lacquered varnish dial finish 
• Nemoto LumiNova® lume on numbers, hour hand and minute hand
• 316L stainless steel band or full grain Italian vegetable-tanned leather band with whip stitches. All bands have quick-release springbars and can be interchanged with each other

 

 

 

The Chrono-Diver is a sports watch with a rotating diving bezel and stopwatch function. Water resistant to 10ATM, this watch features high-performance Nemoto LumiNova® lume on the indexes and hands. Steel and leather bands available.

• Ronda 5030.D: small seconds. Subdials count 30 minutes and 12 hours
• Case size 42.5mm
• Case thickness (including bezel) 11.7mm
• Water resistant to 10ATM. Screw crown construction
• Steel and leather band width 22mm
• Rotating bezel
• Flat sapphire crystal with anti-reflective treatment
• 316L stainless steel case with brushed finish 
• Sandblast dial finish
• Nemoto LumiNova® on indexes, hour hand and minute hand 
• 316L stainless steel band or full grain Italian vegetable-tanned leather band with whip stitches. All bands have quick-release springbars and can be interchanged with each other

 

 

 

Get 1 each of The Petite Mesh, The Oslo Watch, The Chrono-Diver (Leather Band) and The GMT (Leather Band).

We'll give you 2 straps FREE. You will receive 1 Steel band for The Chrono-Diver/GMT (value $85) + 1 Leather strap for the Oslo watch (value $65).

You can choose whichever colours you like.

 

Since our straps are easy to switch, you can get an extra set (or two) and it’s like having multiple watches in one.

We're offering a $20 discount to our Indiegogo backers for every extra strap.

HOW TO CLAIM: Please first select the watch you want and make your pledge. Within 24 hours we will email you a link that will allow you to get an extra strap at a discount.

STEEL STRAPS: $65 for backers (from $85)

ALL LEATHER STRAPS:  $45 for backers (from $65)

 

 

Our tentative timeline is as follows: 

  • July 10 - August 11: Indiegogo campaign
  • August 15: Place order with factory
  • September, October, November: Component production and assembly
  • Early November: Quality inspection and ship to warehouose
  • Mid November: First batch of products ships to backers (TIP: pledge early so you can reserve watches from the earlier shipment)
  • Early/Mid December: Second batch of products ships to backers

We’re Roman Khan and Jennifer Chong, and we created Linjer in 2014. 

We’re a Norwegian/Canadian pair united by a common passion for design and a deep appreciation of vegetable-tanned leather and other natural materials.

We’re proudly bootstrapped and owe it to our fantastic community of crowdfunding backers. To date, we’ve raised more than $3 million for our new creative projects through crowdfunding, and we’ve successfully delivered on all of our past campaigns.

You can reach our team at hello@linjer.co !

Please consider sharing our campaign :)

 

 

 

FAQ

How does Indiegogo work?

  • Indiegogo is a crowdfunding platform, so it's different from a normal webshop. On Indiegogo, creators like us share our projects with the community to raise funds to bring the project to life.
  • In this case, we are sharing our new watch collection with you. We have refined the prototypes for all of our watches and our suppliers are ready to go to production. However, our suppliers all have minimum order requirements, so we need to gather enough volume to place our order. That's why we're here. 
  • By contributing to our project (or "backing" our project), you can get our new watches at a significant discount off of the future expected retail price. That discount is to thank you for helping us take the watches to production and for your patience as we complete our first production run. :)

How do I get a watch?

  • Select the "perk" that you would like in the Perks section and you'll be asked to select the colour you want and your payment details! 

How do I get multiple watches?

  • Are you interested in a Collector's Set? You can get one of every watch style and get two bands for free. (This is a great deal!) Look for the perk called "Collector's Set".
  • Otherwise, if you're interested in getting two or three different watches as perks, you will need to pledge for them separately. Select the first perk in the perks section and go through to making the payment. Then come back to our campaign page and select the next perk and go through with that payment! Please use the same e-mail address for all pledges so we can easily match them.

How do I get an extra strap?

  • Great idea to get an extra strap! After you select your watch and go through with the payment, we'll send you an email with a link to get an additional strap at a $20 discount. Steel straps are $65 (from $85) and leather straps are $45 (from $65). You can expect the email within 24 hours. 

Where do you ship?

  • We ship to 40 countries: 
    • North America: United States, Canada, Mexico
    • Europe: United Kingdom, Ireland, France, Germany, Norway, Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Iceland, Belgium, The Netherlands, Luxembourg, Italy, Vatican City, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Liechtenstein, Austria, Monaco, San Marino, Greece, Croatia
    • Oceania: Australia, New Zealand
    • Asia: Hong Kong, Singapore, Japan, South Korea, Macau, Taiwan, Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, Cambodia
    • Middle East: Israel, United Arab Emirates

What's the cost of shipping? How about taxes and duties?

  • Shipping is free to the 40 countries listed above.
  • If you live in the United States, Singapore, Hong Kong, the European Union, Norway or Switzerland, you're in luck -- we'll take care of the taxes and duties as well. You only pay the cost of the perk.
  • If you live in the other countries, shipping is free, but you will be responsible for the tax and duty payments. We'll give you an option to pre-pay the tax and duties before we ship. 

Can I interchange straps between the watches in this collection?

  • The only band that is truly interchangeable between watches in the steel band for the Chrono-Diver and the GMT Watch. The leather bands for these watches have different buckles to match the style of the case.

What's the warranty on the watches?

  • All watches are covered by a two-year international warranty. We guarantee your watch (including the watch strap) to be free of any manufacturing defect for two years from the date of purchase. The warranty does not cover general wear, damage caused by accident, misuse, neglect or failed repair attempts.

More questions? Email hello@linjer.co

story:
Short Summary

Welcome to Club Midnite, the funnest brand on earth! We are a small company hailing from the epicenter of action sports...San Diego, California. We independently own and operate CM with just 2 partners and we've made quite a scene in the last 4 years that we have been in business. Until now, we have had 0 funding or investors, which has allowed us to be as crazy and as free as we want with our art! In the last 2 years we have done everything humanly  possible to stay independent, however we have reached our limit! If we are not able to raise the funds we need here with this Crowdfunding Campaign, we will be forced to close our doors.

We hope to raise enough money to continue making our art independently and be able to connect with people thru the genuine authenticity of our movement. 

What We Need & What You Get

We decided to make a dream collection of limited edition products and experiences for our loyal customers and Club Members.

We aint a big fancy company with tons of departments and unnecessary bullshit. We created a business model that works and gets our raw, quality art, directly to people in a quick and efficient manner.  Our brand and movement are a vibe that creates products. Thats why we are asking for $20k in funding. We know the homies love our brand but we need to reach a bigger audience in order to keep going forward. Therefore 40% of the funding will be used for marketing while another 40% will be used for new product development. Expanding to different materials and categories...it's Wonka factory over here. We make what we love and we wear what we make. The last 20% will be used for Legal expansion to support the growth of the other 80% (taxes, trademarks, lawsuits from giants, you name it). We ain't gonna catch a case!

   That being said we have created a limited edition collection and label package just for this campaign and opportunity. This specific logo, embroidered in gold, will never be found produced on anything else. These color ways and these products will never be sold anywhere else. We've created our dream collection with no boundaries to make what we feel would really hit the sweet spot based on what yall need and want. 

Marketing and product are our golden ticket....bottom line, thats it. The shit sells its self.  

The Impact

We set out to build a brand that gave people a memorable and unique experience from top to bottom since day one and that's exactly what we have done. We didn't have any money but we had a vision, drive and accessibility. Most importantly, we're not willing to compromise that for any price. To us, we are artists and this is our movement.  We want to be able to make our art with no restraints or input from anyone above, and it's been pretty damn effective so far! We've been rocking for 4 years and kicking ass all the way here. Now we invite you to be a part of the Club. Together we can take Club Midnite to the next level! Come have some fun, live a little, who knows where it goes from here. The Sky is the limit!

Risks & Challenges

We're going to be 100% transparent. These last 4 years have been an entire risk and challenge every damn day! No start up money, no investors, no employees, no easy breaks, and definitely no quick buyout. But also all fun, all hard work,  and all opportunities every damn day while producing results! We took the hard way but we did it for a reason. WE OWN THIS. THIS IS OURS 100%. Two dudes from San Diego who truly cared about our culture staying alive and willing to do anything to keep it RAW. That being said we would love to push on and continue to face the risks and challenges daily. Whether it be production, legal, sourcing, sales, marketing, janitorial, IT, or whatever type of bullshit may come our way. We've got it handled with fuckin smiles on our faces because we are keeping the culture alive.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute financially there are other ways you can help SAVE CM!! Share this URL Page with all your homies! Post about us on Social Media, Help Us Spread the Word!

Check out our website at www.clubmidnite.com , follow us on instagram at @club_midnite.

Post our flyer or share our campaign on your platforms with the IndieGoGo share tools or thru our instagram! We appreciate Every single one of our fans, members, and Donators. We have done as much as we can, You Decide Wether CM Lives or Dies! Thank you so much!!!

story:
For every 10 shares we will plant a tree




  • 1.6 billion people across the globe depend on forest products for their livelihoods
  • Up to 28,000 species are expected to become extinct by 2025 due to deforestation
  • Approximately 3.1 million children die from hunger each year
  • 6.4 million children under age five died in 2015, nearly 17,000 every day



Can we make a change?




ch8se is the first apparel brand to donate away its entire advertising budget. This way a single hoodie can plant as many as 93 trees, a t-shirt can provide 46 months of clean water, or feed a child for 20 days. 

The beauty of the concept is that by repurposing the advertising budget for donations, you can make a change without any additional costs, but by making a conscious consumer choice and utilising your social reach. Today, with all the social media, it’s very simple, you help spread the word about us, and we don’t need to spend on ads. 


Sustainability, craftsmanship
and social inclusion

We are crazy about craftsmanship. All of our products are handmade in Europe out of non-GMO cotton with the highest attention to detail, carefully packaged using recycled materials. Multiple stages of the production and the packaging are being done through socially inclusive programs such as employing disabled young people, who would otherwise have a hard time earning an income.



The mission of ch8se is to have a positive impact not just by donating, but through all of its activities. We are doing our best to be the change we want to see.


Every product comes with a unique impact code, which you can redeem on our website, where you can keep track of all your future impact and share the impact you made. You will also receive a limited edition, hand made, silver plated #ch8ser lapel pin.


Choose your impact


To pre-order a product, just select the appropiate perk. 

We will contact you by the end of the campaign regarding the sizing and the design of your choice. For bigger pictures, details and size chart click the buttons bellow:



 



Jewellery


Every piece of our jewelry is carefully hand crafted through a long process involving many stages: from defining the color palette, as starting point, to designing shapes, and adding textures; and finally to painting the details as a final touch. This is where the magic happens. Usually without any idea of the final product the artist let’s her imaginations and small pieces of clay guide her way to the final design. That is how every piece becomes truly unique.




Impact and transparency


At ch8se we measure success solely by the impact we make. The most intuitive way to express this is not through percentages and net sums, but by measuring real-world impact. For this we worked out our metric system, through which the impact of each product is exactly quantified. These are down to earth numbers, backed by our partner organisations.

Every product has a unique serial number that serves as an impact code. You can register that serial number on our website. When you do this, the code is redeemed, the donation will be transferred within a month to the right organization and the impact is added to the counter on your personal account. The code redeemer will be accessible right after the Indiegogo campaign.


We take the matter of transparency very seriously. Everyone has a full insight to our monthly impact reports, which contain all the codes redeemed during the respective period, an optional message or username from the redeemer and the impact of each code. The reports will be public and accessible all the time. 



Tree planting


By partnering with the Eden Reforestation Projects our products can restore native forests to the deforested regions of Madagascar, Ethiopia, Haiti and Nepal. 

As local villagers are hired to plant the trees, through these projects, they can provide a living to their families. And as the native forests get restored, the wildlife starts blooming again.



Food for the children


We feed hungry children in third world countries by donating to the World Food Program's school meal projects. A meal at school acts as a magnet to get children into the classroom. In poor countries, school meals are often the only regular and nutritious meal a child receives. They are an investment in the child’s future.


 It allows children to focus on their studies rather than their stomachs and helps to increase school enrollment and attendance, decrease drop-out rates, and improve cognitive abilities. As often as possible, food is bought locally, which benefits local farmers and the whole community while enhancing the sustainability of the programme.

Clean drinking water


We partnered up with One Day’s Wages in order to contribute to solving the global water crisis. Together, we can help people get access to improved water and sanitation through improvements such as wells, filtration systems, latrines and sanitation education.


A few words from an advertising professional, who spent more than 35 years in the industry


"My enthusiasm for the ch8se concept is born out of more than 35 years in traditional marketing and advertising with agencies from WPP to Ogilvy and with clients and employers from non-profits to Fortune 100 brands. A concept like yours probably strikes fear in the hearts of my contemporaries and others in fashion and luxury products, but I firmly believe that your generation of smart, clean, and thoughtful marketers have the right idea and that a revolution is needed. The under-belly of our industry is wrought with excess, waste, contamination, and any number of unhealthy by-products both physical and psychological. It is far beyond time to clean up our act and to redirect those billions of dollars to work that can improve our planet and the lives of our neighbours."   
                                                              Carol Dodds, Vice President - Advertising (AOPA)


How can you help kickstart this revolution?


  • Share this campaign using the share button above. Every 10 shares will plant a tree.
  • Click here to become a #ch8ser. Be among the first ones to join our group. For every new member a tree will be planted. This is the best way to become an active member of this grassroots movement, to have a say in ch8se's future, to get early insight into our future collections and get access to giveaways and special releases reserved for ch8sers.
  • Know any like-minded bloggers, influencers who might be willing to help this story spread? Please, help us out with an introduction.  hello@ch8se.com
  • You may say we are dreamers, but we're not the only ones. If you can, support us on Indiegogo. Let's make this dream a reality.



Risks & Challenges


Sourcing truly eco-friendly fabrics can be very tricky sometimes, especially for startups operating with relatively small quantities.  The availability of a given fabric can change in just a few days. The only sure way to ensure a reliable supply is  purchasing huge quantities at once. Due to the fact that the birth of this brand is being crowdfunded, this was not a possibility for us. The colour of the final products may slightly deteriorate from the colours of the prototypes seen on the pictures. This is because we refuse to send you anything but the highest quality eco-friendly products!



FAQ


How can I contact you?

Just email us - hello@ch8se.com

Do you ship globally?

Yes. We ship world wide for a fixed shipping rate at $5 per product.

How do I know what size I need?

You can find a detailed  size chart on our website.

Where are the products manufactured?

All of our products are made in Europe, the production involves multiple countries including Spain, The Netherlands, Hungary, Serbia and Poland.  


 

Choose to be an activist! Be a #ch8ser 


Follow us on:

      

 

http://ch8se.com
story_txt:
For every 10 shares we will plant a tree



1.6 billion people across the globe depend on forest products for their livelihoods
Up to 28,000 species are expected to become extinct by 2025 due to deforestation
Approximately 3.1 million children die from hunger each year
6.4 million children under age five died in 2015, nearly 17,000 every day





Can we make a change?






ch8se is the first apparel brand to donate away its entire advertising budget. This way a single hoodie can plant as many as 93 trees, a t-shirt can provide 46 months of clean water, or feed a child for 20 days. 





The
beauty of the concept is that by repurposing the advertising budget for donations, you can make a change without any additional costs, but by making a conscious consumer choice and utilising your
social reach. Today, with all the social media, it’s very simple, you help spread the word about us, and we don’t need to spend on ads.

story:
Pegasus Venezia represents a new approach to buying a luxury watch. Exclusive timepieces directly to you, at a fraction of the retail price. Sounds interesting? So keep reading

MISSION


Pegasus Watches Venezia aims to offer a unique and high-quality watch allowing every person to wear a luxury and handcrafted timepiece that recalls the most famous 20th-century watches. Luxury is no longer for few. We are highly focused on our local context. As a matter of fact, straps are made ​​of genuine Italian leather and boxes are made of walnut from the city of Sorrento following traditional production techniques. 
We meet the demand of a consumer who is looking for a reliable, fashionable, luxury and at the same time, affordable timepiece.
In order to offer you the perfect wearing experience, suitable for all wrist sizes, we only use 100% Italian leather treated with natural materials.

 
All the types of leather used are from Veneto and Tuscany, two well known Italian tannery districts. Therefore, thanks to the expertise of our local and skilled artisans we provide soft, vintage and durable straps.


Each strap is handcrafted by skilled Italian artisans. We aim to produce unique and unrepeatable timepieces.


We cooperate with some of the most experienced watch manufacturers, who have produced luxury watches for notorious brands. 
Pegasus Venezia Legionarius is made of 316L stainless steel, offering high resistance and reliability. All watches going out of our factory will be subjected to a vigorous Quality Control. We want you to be 100% satisfied with your watch.


MOVEMENT


We use some of the best input materials on the market for this watch. The Legionarius model is powered by the 2115 Miyota, a reliable and robust quarz movement. Miyota has been building reputable, reliable movements for brands like Citizen for decades. Their movements are very accurate and built to last for many years.



SPECIFICATIONS

  • Watch case: 316L stainless steel  
  • Water resistant: 10 ATM, 100 meters  
  • Glass: Mineral glass with non scratch surface finishing  
  • Strap size: 20 mm  
  • Watch Diameter: 40 mm  
  • Movement: Miyota 2115 by Citizen  
  • Strap: Handmade with genuine italian leather  
  • Buckle: Stainless steel buckle


Making Prototypes

After we completed the design and finalized the technical drawings, we partnered with manufacturers to create prototypes of the Pegasus Legionarius watch and its unique leather strap. We have established great relationships with reliable suppliers, who helped us greatly communicate exactly what we wanted.



We are convinced that each exclusive watch should be unrepeatable and, therefore, not mass produced. 
That's why every Pegasus Venezia Watch is hand assembled . You will be assured that you own watch is unique.


Your watch will be packaged with care in our exclusive box. It is handcrafted in Italy by a skilled artisan using only fine walnut wood.


Our box supplier is a leader in the market thanks to the introduction of a revolutionary box shape with rounded angles that make the product more resistant, lighter and better looking. 
This invention is patent protected.

 
The traditional distribution channel is based on different steps, involving extra costs for the final customer. 
We do things in a different way: we cut this chain. 
By skipping any intermediary we are able to offer you an exclusive Italian luxury watch at the price of €109.


We are convinced that a consumer should only pay for the quality of the watch and not for all costs related to distribution such as agent fees and traditional retail markup. 

For these reasons we expose all costs we support.




HOW DO I GET ONE?

In order to get your own unique timepiece you have to select the reward you prefer. Don't worry about the color of the strap . You will choose it later.



TIMELINE

We are now ready to make the Pegasus Legionarius watch available to our backers. We have completed the final design and all specifications. We have technical drawings ready. We have been testing several prototypes and are fully satisfied with the look, feel and quality of the watch. Our manufacturing partners have confirmed that they are ready to start production as soon as we give them the go-ahead.

Once we place the order with our suppliers, they will start the manufacturing and assembling of the different parts of the watch. The final product will then be shipped to us for final inspection and testing.





We have worked hard over the years in order to achieve these results in terms of quality and appearance but we are sure that with your support we can grow further. Together, let's make Pegasus Venezia a successfull story!


Risks and challenges

We have anticipated any potential risk and have devised a solid production plan. 
Our professional manufacturing partners have a long experience in the industry. 
If you have any question do not hesitate. 
Thank you very much for your precious support! 
We are enthusiastic to take this step with you, the Indiegogo community!

story:
To condemn another to poverty is a form of genocide.

Creating a fairer society that helps others depends on us all.
Our obligation is to struggle to make the world the fairer place

that we all wish to live in.

 

100% of all profits raised by the design, manufacture and sale of Ameli´s Jewelry Collection will go to help vulnerable families facing serious economic hardship support themselves.

Creating excitement and passion has been my life´s work.

It is one of the most rewarding things in life there is, but the reward of making dreams come true and helping others has a very special magic of its own. 

My name is Paquita Vizcaino, I work as an industrial and artistic designer.

I live in Castellón, Spain.

For as long as I can remember, I have been involved with humanitarian organizations and have happily dedicated hours of my time and money for worthwhile causes.

This Humanitarian Jewelry Collection was started with my own funds. Now, the collection needs your help to grow and reach greater numbers of vulnerable families facing serious economic hardship.

The families need foods, school clothes and books, help with medical expenses and finding a home.

100% of all profits raised help these vulnerable families support themselves.

Thank you for collaborating and helping us with this project.

Your interest is a vital part of the project, so please don´t hesitate to get in touch if you wish to learn more about Ameli Humanitarian Collection.

Please don´t forget to pass this project on and share it with your friends.

Thanks again.


Here are the jewels in the collection.

www.joyasameli.es

See part of my design work here.

http://www.joyasameli.es/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=78&Itemid=100

Facebook profile.

http://www.facebook.com/#!/PAQUITAVIZCAINO

The YouTube channel where you can see some of my jewelry, furniture and shoe designs.

http://www.youtube.com/user/paquitavizcaino?feature=results_main

My blog:

http://paquitavizcaino.blogspot.com.es/

Newsroom

Here are some links that mention the project.

EUROPAPRESS

http://www.europapress.es/comunitat-valenciana/noticia-disenadora-castellon-lanza-coleccion-joyas-solidarias-ayudar-personas-problemas-economicos-20111031114209.html

LEVANTE DE CASTELLON
http://www.levante-emv.com/juntos/2011/11/01/joyas-pobreza/853119.html


CADENA SER
Carrusel de Verano

<object width="353" height="132"><embed src="http://www.goear.com/files/external.swf?file=e1c19ff" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" quality="high" width="353" height="132"></embed></object>

http://twitter.com/CarruselVerano/status/232143151656214529

20MINUTOS.ES

http://www.20minutos.es/noticia/1205287/0/

 GRUPO DUPLEX
http://www.grupoduplex.com/diseno/disenadora-crea-joyas-contra-la-pobreza/

What do you get in exchange for helping?

As well as the personal satisfaction of taking part in a Humanitarian Project, in exchange for your help you will receive exclusive designer jewelry and have the option of your name and picture appearing in the Thank You videos that appear on Youtube.

You can see the results of our first humanitarian campaign here.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C3nawBCDvYE&feature=share&list=UUGs9PoG-pTvp9ufVTj8R-AQ

Please don´t forget to pass this project on and share it with your friends.

Thanks again.

 

For $5 we are offering this signed 50 x 50cm laminate of my jewelry designs and the option of your name and picture appearing in the Thank You videos that appear on Youtube.

The video will appear on my YouTube channel Paquita Vizcaino:

The file for you to print the laminate will be sent by email.

 

For $60 we are offering this 23x23 mm gold and silver leaf incrusted Murano crystal pendant, with 2 quartzes on a leather cord with a silver clasp.

In a choice of red or blue.

Free delivery.

Signed 50 x 50cm laminate of my jewelry designs and the option of your name and picture appearing in the Thank You videos that appear on YouTube.

The video will appear on my YouTube channel Paquita Vizcaino:

The file for you to print the laminate will be sent by email.

For $90 we are offering this 42x29 mm silver and lilac zirconium cross and on a leather cord with a silver clasp.

Free delivery.

The video will appear on my YouTube channel Paquita Vizcaino:

The file for you to print the laminate will be sent by email.

     

For $140 we are offering this set of earrings and necklace in a choice of red or blue

Free delivery.

Ladies gold and silver leaf incrusted 23 x 23mm Murano crystal necklace with 4mm white quartzes and gold-plated silver clasp.

For $190 we are offering this silver heart and silver earring set in a choice of 6 different designs.

Free Delivery

story:
Short Summary

Hi this is Taneesha's mom:

To be creators and have the power to produce things that we like and need is of great importance.  Equally important is to practice our awareness of the oneness of all things and go about creating in a way that lends to sustainability and the thriving of all natural systems.

Ever since my daughter showed an interest in designing and sewing we have nurtured it.  She started this journey with crocheting and then moved onto apparel deconstruction (taking my old clothes and creating looks for her baby sister.) 

And both of our interest has grown into wanting to create the textiles with eco-friendly fabrics and natural dyes and fully understanding the processes for both.

And to share what we learn...

story:
What's the BIG DEAL about 3D Printing?

                                                                                           

Until we can download CAD files and print Cell Phones/Laptops from the comfort of our homes.

TODAY it is one of the BEST tools used to create the most Unique Mass-Customized products used by people everyday. 

Products Like;

  

And NOW!

                     A CUSTOM BUILT SMART WATCH

 

Adjust the Watch Face;  

      

 

Or 

Create Your Own Links;

& Finish by Adding YOUR Name or Logo.

 

In the end you'll have a Smart Watch That was Made For & Co-Created by YOU!

The 3D Printer used to create the Smart Watch will be the Objet24 3D Printer.

I've choosen this Printer because of it's high quality and printing speed. The Watch will be made of a material quality similar to actual molded plastic and will perform just as described. The Models will then be dyed for the 5 avaialable colors. Please click the printer's image for further information on the printer.

Where are the iPod Nano's?

 

 

The main challenge is to raise enough funds to be able to afford the 3D Printer.

Once that goal is realized the immediate task would be to obtain everyone's specifications for their individual watch. To counter this problem the liasining and design work will begin once your contribution is received.

This will mean that at the end of the campaign, time would be dedicated to obtaining the printer and shipping the models.

I'm originally from Trinidad & Tobago but based in Brooklyn NY.

I'm a self-taught designer that had little knowledge of Product Design prior to working on this watch. My journey towards creating this template was very much a lesson in persistence.
I started by working with a designer who was considerably patient with my design demands, and at the end inspired me to learn product design.

Since then I’ve been through six versions of the watch before creating the final version and my knowledge of CAD programs has leapt from beginner status to a level consistent with any established Product Designer within a year. I'm as stubborn and determined as I was at the beginning of this journey and would apply this same attitude towards creating and delivering the individual designs this campaign hopes to create. 

 

Blogs & Features

story:
Hi There! 

Our campaign reached the goal and we are extremely thankful for all our backers!!

If you are new here: Welcome to our Indiegogo page!  Get to know more about our campaign below!  

We are building our dream webshop that gathers empowering design from around the world to one place. Our platform will bring amazing brands to you, the customer, to make sustainable choices simpler and through this support ethical buying. Our new platform will allow us to expand our outreach to more empowering brands and artisans globally and to strengthen the impact we can have on developing areas across the world. 

Join us and become a part of our dream to make ethical shopping easy! While we are building storeofhope.com you can order our lovely cashmere products from here. Check out the perks we offer below and choose your favorite!

_______________________________________________________________________

____________________________________________________________________________

____________________________________________________________________________

____________________________________________________________________________


The global push toward ethical consumerism and sustainable goods is growing, but current availability of varied products is limited and finding reliable information on product origins can be difficult.  It doesn´t make it any easier that small producers and brands are being largely invisible to consumers who would otherwise be motivated to make ethical purchasing choices.

Our mission is to empower underprivileged makers in developing countries by connecting them directly to ethical consumers like you.
 

Our company Store of Hope has been running for almost five years now. We started in 2012 with jewelry made by women who lived in a safe house in Nepal. Since then, we have created multiple product families in co-operation with local artisans in several countries.  Our first web store in Finland has helped to grow our reach and we'd love to expand on this success!

Through our work, we have seen first hand how difficult sustainable production and ethical business choices can be, when easier alternatives are everywhere.  Bringing better opportunities to local artisans and supporting growth in the developing world requires a lot of effort, as does reaching the needed, steady customer base.

By offering empowering brands a common platform that consumers trust, we believe all of us can stay focused on the important work all of us have the privilege to do. This is why we are building StoreofHope.com!

You can make an important and meaningful impact. 

With your help we can work towards a more sustainable world.  Your support to our fundraiser means you share our vision for a more equitable world. It means that you believe in the impact of ethical consuming.  

By building a business that supports producers toward economic independence we believe we can make a long lasting change. 

Through our work we want to give local artisans in developing countries opportunities to make their own living and through their work empower their communities to prosper. That is why all of our products come from small producer groups in the developing world.

Through StoreofHope.com we want to nurture a demand for the skills of talented artisans and makers in different parts of the world.

We know that throughout the world there is a great need for sustainable change, toward more societies where people can make their own living and prosper. Creating sustainable employment opportunities can permanently lift people out of poverty! 
____________________________________________________________________________

____________________________________________________________________________

Through the years we have worked in Nepal building different product lines, we have been searching for a good cashmere manufacturer. Knowing that Nepal is one of the biggest cashmere producers and knowing how great cashmere is in use kept our search on, though it wasn´t simple to find a producer to match our values and ethics. It took multiple trips and visiting several manufacturers to get to this point, but now we are happy to have quality cashmere products that we can proudly bring to our customers. We are glad we made the effort! 


Our cashmere products are made by a small Nepalese family business with 21 workers.  We have been working with them for over two years now, and we have been very happy with their work. One of the most important factors for us is that the company takes good care of every employee's well-being and feels passionate about doing so. The business takes pride in paying workers a decent salary, providing good working conditions, and taking care of workers in case of sickness or other problems that may occur in life. 

Our cashmere wool comes from goats living in the mountains of central Asia. During the cold winter goats grow a thick underwool that makes cashmere a fine, strong, yet light and soft material. Cashmere fiber is approximately three times more insulating than sheep wool. The properties of cashmere depend on the humidity of the air, meaning it is suitable for many different climates, even the warm ones. 

Cashmere works best when mixed with another fiber. That is why we use a combination of 50% lamb wool and 50% cashmere wool which ensures a durable product that will last for years.

____________________________________________________________________________


Why do we need crowdfunding?

Our goal is to gather 25 000 euros (26 501 USD) and launch the beta version of the web store this summer. Obviously in the fashion industry standards this sum we are collecting is quite small, but have the privilege to have support from some of the most notable e-commerce and digital marketing professionals in Finland who share our passion to work towards a more sustainable world. If this campaign goes through they will donate a huge amount of their time and work effort that will multiply the effect of this campaign.

This is our first fundraiser.  Through this crowdfunding campaign we´re collecting the amount we need to get our international web store platform running, including design work, marketing efforts and greater outreach.

With your support we can :

- kickstart our international web store platform 
- broaden the reach of empowering design
- make a greater impact in the lives of many
 

We understand that we bare the risk of failure, as does every company stepping in to new territory. We are a small business entering an existing market and building a new system within the market. However as we work at the grass root level with the goal of growing sustainably, the amount raised through this campaign can help us take our mission further. Our idea stems from our drive to make ethical business more available to consumers, sellers and producers by welcoming other companies like us to join our new platform.  Together we believe we can make a greater impact and thus the risk is worth taking. 

___________________________________________________________________________

Other Ways You Can Help.
 

If you can't financially contribute, we completely understand. You can still be an important part of the movement! Any help matters, so help us make some noise!


Here's exactly what you can do:

- share the campaign over social media (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, whatever works for you!) 

- send an email with a link to your friends who you think will love Store of Hope

- connect us with people you think might be able to help by emailing info@storeofhope.com. 

- follow us on social media and sign up for our emails

We are also contacting ethical brands around  the world to join Storeofhope. com. If you know a good empowering brand that you would love to see in our future web shop, let us now about it. If you yourself have an ethical and sustainable business, send us an email and become a part of our team!


We are grateful to have you on our side.  Thank you!

- Eeva & Anna

___________________________________________________________________________

Warm thanks to KAUAS creative for film making and Ashley Schulman photography for our campaign pictures!

story:
What We Need & What You Get

  • We've got this t-shirt design all set up and ready to be printed.
  • There will be a limited run of 25 shirts, if you pre-order the shirt through this crowdfund you will get the t-shirt, an artwork print, and a 'Gulfstream Flux' CD.
  • If we don't reach the funding goal, we will still get the t-shirts made. A little help is all we ask. If you're interested or will purchase a shirt, PLEASE contribute to the fund so we can get these made ASAP.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share this crowdfund with anyone you think would be interested.

Thanks for your interest!
story_txt:
What We Need & What You Get

We've got this t-shirt design all set up and ready to be printed.
There will be a limited run of 25 shirts, if you pre-order the shirt through this crowdfund you will get the t-shirt, an artwork print, and a 'Gulfstream Flux' CD.
If we don't reach the funding goal, we will still get the t-shirts made. A little help is all we ask. If you're interested or will purchase a shirt, PLEASE contribute to the fund so we can get these made ASAP.
Other Ways You Can HelpPlease share this crowdfund with anyone you think would be interested.Thanks for your interest!

story:
Just like many, I was pressured by society to be thin! I was once anorexic, then bulimic, and then ballooned up to over 210 lbs! It wasn’t until I became a mom that I finally understood that ‘STRONG IS THE NEW SKINNY”!

My name is Jennifer Nicole Lee! I’m a weight loss success story, now inspiring women to “love the skin they are in”, and fighting for equality for all! My mission in life is to end unhealthy, unrealistic body messages. My www.JNLClothing.com line all started by accident with one short yet powerful saying  “STRONG IS THE NEW SKINNY” that I had printed on a tank top! This one shirt was so powerful, magnetic, & life changing! Everyone who saw it smiled, laughed & wanted not only one but several! Thus giving birth to the www.JNLClothing.com line!

WE at www.JNLClothing.com NEED YOUR HELP!

I have been funding my mind-shifting, positive impacting www.JNLClothing.com line all by my own! But now, you can help me empower real people all around the world with this super positive clothing line by donating!

I have the exact business plan, which I have spent the past 3 years sharing. But “the  man” doesn’t believe and main stream “white collar” investors just don’t get it! So I need YOU! Real people who are really empowered and together we can get real results! I need “believers” like you & me to make the difference!  WE CAN DO IT!

The current JNL Clothing team will need $250,000 in crowd funding to take this already successful clothing line go to the next level! Remember Spanx? Well, this is another Spanx success story about to happen! I know it, and so does everyone else that wears it and buys it worldwide!

We can’t keep up with shipping as it flies off the shelves! We need a stronger sales team, a bigger office, and also a larger work space in order to keep up with the demand. Right now we have over $50,000 orders pending that we cant fill! So we really need your help and funding to keep this business alive and making powerful impacts in people's lives when they wear it! (Think of the young teenage girl who sees these shirts and how she feels knowing that its okay to be strong and fit, not forced to be skinny and thin!)

You see, we know it works! It works so well that now without you, we truly cant take this empowerment clothing line to the next level! The future of JNL Clothing lies within your power. So thank you for “taking this charity bowl’, dropping some ‘belief’ funds into it, and passing it along!

I know that we together can make a difference in so many lives!
You see, JNL Clothing is on the verge of either a break down as we cant keep up with the demands, or a success break through by obtaining all the crowd funding we need in order to take it to the optimal next level!

UNIQUE JNL CLOTHING PERKS! OMG! The perks are OUT OF SIGHT!

Some include a FREE “Strong is the New Skinny” tank top! Or a signature “KISS MY ABS” shirt! Or even to come to our new offices once we meet our goal, and you get to spend the day with me and our design team to see how YOU made this all come true!

I believe in angels, and I believe in dreams coming true! And when you believe, than happen! Thank you for being an angel, and increasing your positive KARMA by believing and contributing to this miracle.

BE LOUD AND PROUD!

Thank you for helping me make some BIG NOISE about my mad mission to make this world a happier, healthier and more empowered place with www.JNLClothing.com Please pass this Campaign to all of your fitness friends, colleagues, associates, friends and family! Thank you for helping me to never give up and never give in!

I believe in YOU!

Jennifer Nicole Lee

International Fitness Icon and World Ambassador for Equal Rights & Advocate for Woman’s Issues

Creator, Visionary, Artist, Fitness Fanatic, Weight Loss Success Story, Author, Mother, & President of www.JNLClothing.com
